K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:1b-2: a'arya [dd] buddha aa ba tang sa ka n'a ma ma h'a bee pu lyam s'u tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:1b-4: 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:1b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:1b-7: bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2a-1: chos thams cad shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2a-2: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyi sku mnga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skus shin tu khyab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2a-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2a-5: gsung gi nga ro shin tu bsgrags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2a-7: nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid mnyam pa nyid du rab tu snang ba'i spyod yul can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2a-8: nam mkha' ltar 'gro ba thams cad kun khyab pa'i snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa'i sku /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-0: byang chub sems dpa' rgya [dd] @2b mtsho thams cad kyi nang na rnam par snang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar shar ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba bstan pa rab tu spros pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-3: dus gsum gyi bsod nams rgya chen po rgya mtsho lta bus spyod yul yongs su dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-5: 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa mnga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-6: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsgribs pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-8: skra'i rtse mo thams cad du mtha' dang dbus med par rnam par 'phrul ba byin gyis rlob pa'i mthu mnga' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-9: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:2b-10: gdul ba la mngon du gyur par yongs su ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3a-0: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'phos pa med par gshegs @3a #//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3a-1: pa; yongs su ston pas khyab par mdzad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3a-2: dngos po med pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud pa; 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad du dus gsum rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bskal pa rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyi rlabs shin tu bsgrubs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3a-4: yul ma ga dha'i chos kyi dgon pa snying po byang chub rdo rje rin po che thams cad ltar gzhom du mi choms par sra ba'i sa phyogs nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gis sa gzhi brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3a-5: nor bu'i rgyal po dri ma med par 'bar bas rab tu bsgrubs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3a-6: rin po che mang po thams cad kyis rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa; yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3a-7: nor bu'i rgyal po 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-0: sgra dbyangs @3b kyi rgyal mtshan thams cad kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-3: rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-4: dra ba mang po thams cad rnam par bres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-5: rin po che'i kha dog zad mi shes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal pos shin tu bsgrubs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-6: me tog sna tshogs chu bo'i klong lta bu yongs su bstan pas brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-7: rin po che'i shing 'od zer gyi kha dog stug po dang ldan pa'i yal gas brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-8: rgyan thams cad du snang ba shin tu 'bar ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par sprul pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-9: yang dag par bstan pa'i sa'i snying po rin po che'i 'bru thams cad 'byung bas phyogs kun tu dpyangs shing brgyan pa'i snying po byang chub la byang chub chen po'i shing nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'brus bsgrubs pa'i sdong po dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-10: bee d'urya dang nor bu thams cad kyi rigs 'byung ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i lhun can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-11: yongs su yon tan mang po mtha' yas pa'i nor bu rin po che mang po'i 'brus shin tu brgyan cing rab tu 'phel ba'i yal ga can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-12: rin po che thams cad kyi lo ma shin tu 'od gsal bas phyogs kyi sprin du gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:3b-13: yal ga thams cad kyi rtse mo las me tog dang 'bras bu'i dra ba yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs can rab tu dpyangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-0: rin po che'i 'bras bu sna tshogs shin tu 'bar ba'i snying pos shing gi rgyan me tog thams @4a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-1: cad shin tu rgyas shing rnam par gsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-2: phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che rgya che zhing mang ba'i 'od zer lta bur rnam par snang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-3: nor bu'i yon tan zad mi shes pa'i char chen po rnam par sprul pa'i 'od yongs su bstan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-4: nor bu'i sgo thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i sprin 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-5: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-6: byin gyi rlabs kyis zad mi shes pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba'i drung na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang phyogs thams cad du mngon par snang ba rab tu 'phel ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-7: rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs yon tan mtha' yas pa'i ka ba bkye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-8: lhun rin po che'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa; rgyan mtha' yas pas shin tu klubs pa'i 'od zer snang bas sprin ltar khebs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-9: pho brang gi mtshams thams cad nas 'od kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bkye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rjes su 'dod pa'i snying po can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-11: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsung rgya chen po'i dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-12: sangs rgyas kyi 'od nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu'i dra bas thams cad yog pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4a-13: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par sprul pa'i 'phrul pa dmigs pa thams cad du byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-0: sems can thams @4b cad kyi khyim gyi gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-1: sems skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thams cad chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas par khyab par 'phro ba'i snying po can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-2: sengge'i khri chen po sangs rgyas kyi gdan du gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-3: rin po che thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-4: yid du 'ong ba'i spos sna tshogs kyi snying po can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-5: padmo'i dra ba 'od zer mtha' yas pa 'byung bas brtan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-6: rin po che dri ma med pa'i 'khor lo'i 'od kun tu bdal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-7: me tog gi phreng ba bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-8: kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas klubs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-9: nor bu'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las 'od shin tu bkye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-13: khang pa brtsegs pa rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-14: nor bu'i rgyal po 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po'i sprin thams cad du 'phros pa'i rgyan can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rgya chen po'i gtsug gi rin po ches bzung zhing 'od zer rnam par snang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-16: phyogs bcu'i mtshams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi snying po'i nor bu'i rgyal pos shin tu brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-17: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi sgra dbyangs rgya chen pos chos kyi dbyings khyab pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa la bzhugs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:4b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-1: chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thabs cig tu spyod spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-3: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan 'od mchog kun tu sgron ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu 'bar ba sengge'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzi brjid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od @5b zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri med 'od kyi snying po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padmo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i snying po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:5b-10: de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho gcig gis byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-0: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi 'khor yongs su rgyas pas snang ba @6a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-1: gyur pa; ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-2: dus gsum gyi dbyings thams cad du snang bas gsal bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag pas snang bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-4: so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho yangs shing zad mi shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-5: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang mthus snang bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-6: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-7: gdul bar brtsam pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis snang bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-8: chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po gcig tu tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyis snang bar gyur pa; sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo'i yul yangs pa la ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis snang bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-9: sa gcig las byung ba yongs su gnon pa'i rjes su 'brang bas shin tu snang bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-10: smon lam gyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa phyi ma'i mtha'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes thams cad kyi gnas pas snang bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa yongs su shes pas snang bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rjes su brtags pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu snang bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa kun tu 'od kyi dbyings dang gnas su rnam par spyod du dbang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6a-14: ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i sgo thams cad du rnam par rgyu bas snang bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-0: @6b ye shes snang ba thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la shin tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-1: chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-2: yongs su bstan pa la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-3: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor gtogs pa thams cad kyis khyab par byed pa'i lus can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-4: smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sbyor ba la phyi ma'i mur thug pa'i bskal par dpa' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing snying po byang chub tu nye bar 'dong ba yang dag par ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-7: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtshos sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi shes pa yongs su rgyas par 'grengs pa'i lus can rnams dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag na rdo rje dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-9: 'di ltar lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-10: lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-11: lag na rdo rje ri rab me tog 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-12: lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-13: lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-14: lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-15: lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:6b-16: lag na rdo rje sengge'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-1: stug po'i dpal gyi mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-2: lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug phud padmo 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-3: de dag la sogs pa lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang sngon bskal pa mtha' yas par de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par smon pas zham 'bring na 'brang bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-4: sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-5: dge ba dang bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa yongs su dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-6: ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul yangs pa la rnam par spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas pa khong du chud pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-10: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa'i yul la zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-11: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i lus can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-12: sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du lus shin tu ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-13: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyi 'phrul ba rjes su rtogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-15: gnas srung pa la shin tu brtson pa rnams dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-16: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-17: 'di ltar lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7a-18: 'od zer phyogs su snang ba dang sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-0: @7b rgyan bzang po me tog gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-1: spyod yul mtha' yas dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-2: snang ba'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-3: spos dri ma med pa'i sprin las char 'bab pa'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-4: srung 'dzin yongs su sdud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-5: sgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-6: khrel dang dpal mi g-yo ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-7: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha de dag la sogs pa kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur bar smon lam btab pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-9: rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-10: 'di ltar rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-11: rkang gis 'gro padmo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-12: rkang gis 'gro me tog gtsug phud kyi dpal dri ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-13: rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-14: rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-15: rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-16: rkang gis 'gro shing tsandan gyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-17: rkang gis 'gro padmo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-18: rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:7b-19: rkang gis 'gro me tog mang po'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-0: de dag la sogs pa rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang sngon bskal pa mtha' yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i @8a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-1: rjes su 'brang ba sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-2: snying po byang chub kyi lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste; 'di ltar snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-3: snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-4: snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-5: me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-6: 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-7: me tog gi phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-8: rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-9: mthu dam pa spos kyi mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-10: rdo rje sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-12: snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-13: de dag la sogs pa snying po byang chub kyi lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang sngon sangs rgyas rgya cher mchod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dag par byung ba sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-14: nam mkha'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-15: 'di ltar grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtse mo'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-16: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-17: rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8a-18: slos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong bas rnam par snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-0: @8b sgron ma shin tu rgyas pa'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-1: 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-2: bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-3: lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-4: spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-5: grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-6: de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang rab tu brgyan pa la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-7: sa'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-8: 'di ltar sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa'i dri ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-9: bsod nams brtan pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-10: shing gi yal ga sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-11: sems rin po che rgyas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-12: dus dus su dge ba'i mig rab tu ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-13: gser gyi mig gi dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-14: spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-15: sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-16: me tog gi glang po sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-17: kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyun dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:8b-18: sa'i lha khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-0: de dag la sogs pa sa'i lha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang bsod nams kyi dbyings gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang rab tu 'brel ba sha stag @9a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-2: ri'i lha tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-3: 'di ltar ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-4: nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-5: kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-6: rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-7: snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-8: stobs la thub pa med pas snang ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-9: kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-10: snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-11: kun tu mngon par lta ba'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-12: ri'i lha kun nas sra ba rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-13: de dag la sogs pa ri'i lha tshad med pa kun kyang tshul dri ma med pa'i mig gi sgo rab tu thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-14: nags tshal gyi lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-15: 'di ltar nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-16: nags tshal gyi lha 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-17: lo ma dri ma med pa'i phreng ba'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-18: yan lag rab tu 'phyang ba'i gzi brjid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-20: sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9a-21: kun nas spos mang po ldang ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-0: kun nas dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil @9b 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-1: nags tshal gyi lha me tog dang 'bras bu dang ro'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-2: de dag la sogs pa nags tshal gyi lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang dga' ba'i shugs mtha' yas pas gsal bar gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-3: sman gyi lha mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-4: 'di ltar sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-5: tsandan gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-7: ming kun tu grags pa glang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-8: spu'i klong kun nas 'od 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-9: mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par sbyong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-10: sgra dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-11: nyi ma'i 'od 'gro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-12: phyogs bcur rmongs pa med par lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-13: sman gyi lha mdangs bzang po kun tu 'gyed pa'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-14: de dag la sogs pa sman gyi lha mtha' yas pa kun kyang snying rje dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-15: lo tog gi lha mtha' yas pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-16: 'di ltar lo tog gi lha 'jam pa'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-17: dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-19: mdangs kyi ngad mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-20: sa kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-21: gtsug phud kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-22: yal ga dri ma med par grub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:9b-23: spos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-0: @10a *// bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-1: lo tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag cing 'od dri ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-2: de dag la sogs pa lo tog gi lha mtha' yas pa kun kyang dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-4: rangs pa shin tu thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-5: chu klung gi lha mu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-6: 'di ltar chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-7: ri dang chu kun la brten pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-8: rdul thams cad dri ma med par rnam par dag pa'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-9: nga ros khyab par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-10: srog chags kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa skyob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-11: gdung ba med pa rgya mtsho gdung ba med pa'i 'od dri ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-12: dga' bde kun nas 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-13: yon tan gyi shugs yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-14: 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal rnam par snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-15: chu klung gi lha tshogs chen po rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-16: de dag la sogs pa chu klung gi lha mu med pa kun kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i don du yid la byed pa la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-17: rgya mtsho'i lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-18: 'di ltar rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'byung ba'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-19: rdo rje kun nas sra zhing mi choms pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10a-20: rdul dang dri ma med pa'i gnas dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-0: skyabs @10b rin po che'i mig gi zla ba'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-1: klu'i dpal padmo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-2: chu lta bur ro mthun pa 'dzin pa'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-3: rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i me tog gi tshon gyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-4: ri rab sra ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-5: rgya mtsho'i lha 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgya mtsho'i shugs kyi dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-6: de dag la sogs pa rgya mtsho'i lha bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i mthar phyin par rgyas par byed pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-7: me'i lha grangs med pa dag dag yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-8: 'di ltar me'i lha gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-9: kun tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-10: 'od rgya chen pos phyogs rgyas par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-11: rgyal mtshan gyi rdul gyi sgos rgyas par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-12: gzi brjid mi zad pa'i gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-13: dka' thub sna tshogs kyi mig gi dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-14: phyogs khyim du gyur pa'i ri rab kyi spo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-15: 'od drag shul can gyi dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-16: mun pa dang rab rib sel cing phyogs rnam par snang bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-17: me'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-18: de dag la sogs pa me'i lha grangs med pa kun kyang sems can thams cad kyi gdung ba sel ba'i snang ba ston pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:10b-19: chu'i phung po'i lha tshad med pa dag dang lang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-0: 'di ltar chu'i phung po'i lha sprin dang na bun kun tu grub pa'i rgyal mtshan @11a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-2: sprin sgra'i shugs rgya mtsho'i sprin dang chu sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-3: bzang por 'khyil ba grub pa'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-4: kun nas spos dri ma med pa'i myu gu'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-5: dba' rlabs kyi sgra bsod nams stegs kyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-6: tshim par bya ba la dbang byed pa yongs su sgrub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-7: sa'i rdul snyed kyi sgo nas dbyangs 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-8: 'od kun tu 'gro zhing rgyas par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-9: chu'i phung po'i lha rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi nga ro'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-10: de dag la sogs pa chu'i phung po'i lha tshad med pa kun kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-11: bde ba'i skyabs su brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-12: rlung gi phung po'i lha tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-13: 'di ltar rlung gi phung po'i lha chags pa med par 'gro ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-14: kun tu rgyas par 'byung ba'i mthu'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-15: kun tu reg par byed pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-16: rgyan yid du 'ong zhing bzang po'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-17: chu drag po'i snying po skem pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-18: sgra chen pos 'gro ba'i dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-19: shing gi rtse mo'i me tog rab tu 'phyang ba'i gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-20: thogs pa med par phyogs kun tu rgyas par 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-21: rlung gi phung po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11a-22: rlung gi phung po'i lha 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mun pa kun nas snang bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:11b-0: de dag la sogs @11b pa rlung gi phung po'i lha tshad med pa kun kyang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i nga rgyal rnam par gtor ba la brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-13: me tog gi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-14: 'od kyi dpal snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-15: rin chen gtsug phud rnam par snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-16: mig kun tu snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-17: sa'i dpal gyi be'u 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-18: lha'i bu sgo thams cad skyob pa'i dpal gyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-19: de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu nyi ma'i ris su gtogs pa mu med pa kun kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-20: 'gro ba thams cad la phan par rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-21: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa brgya byin lha'i dbang po la sogs pa tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:15b-22: 'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-0: lha'i bu sgra kun tu grags pa'i dbang @16a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-2: byams par lta ba'i gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-3: rin po che'i 'od kun tu grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-4: dga' bde 'byung ba'i gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-5: dran pa yid du 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-7: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-8: me tog dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-9: ye shes nyi ma'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-10: lha'i bu yang dag par skul ba'i 'od kyi dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-11: de dag la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu tshad med pa kun kyang chos rgya chen po'i rang bzhin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-12: 'gro ba thams cad du skyes shing yang dag par bskul ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-13: rab mtshe ma la sogs pa mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste; 'di ltar lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-15: blo gros mi zad pa'i yon tan dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-16: 'phrul ba bzang zhing dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-18: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-22: lha'i rgyal po grags pa'i phyogs su rnam par lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-23: de dag la sogs pa mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po grangs med pa kun kyang dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16a-24: spro ba rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-0: lha'i @16b bu rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-1: 'di ltar lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-2: dga' ba rgya mtsho'i gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-3: yon tan mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-5: rab tu dga' ba'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-6: rin chen 'od zer zla ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-7: rnam par gnon pas rab tu brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-8: rdo rje'i mdog gi 'od bzang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-9: skar mas brgyan pa'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-10: lha'i bu dga' ba bzang po sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-11: de dag la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu byung ba thams cad rjes su dran par yid la bya ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-12: 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po mu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste; 'di ltar lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-16: sprin sgra shin tu 'phags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-17: snang ba spyod pa'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-18: gtsug phud yid du 'ong ba'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-20: me tog 'od kyi gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-21: lha'i rgyal po phyogs shin tu snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:16b-22: de dag la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po mu med pa kun kyang rnam par thar pa rab tu zhi bas sems can thams cad gdul ba la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-1: la sogs pa bgrang du med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-2: 'di ltar lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-3: lha'i rgyal po mig bzang po'i blo gros dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-4: cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-6: go 'phang rnam par gnon pa'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-7: 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-8: spyod yul zhi ba'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-9: 'khor lo ri mo bzang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-10: me tog blo gros sengge'i dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-11: lha'i rgyal po dbang po'i stobs ri mo bzang po'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-12: de dag la sogs pa dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po bgrang du med pa kun kyang chos kyi dbang rgya chen po la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-13: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshangs pa chen po dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-14: 'di ltar tshangs pa chen po rab tu snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-16: blo gros bzang po'i sems snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-17: kun tu dbyangs kyi sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-19: mig rab tu zhi zhing 'od shin tu zab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-20: phyogs su snang ba 'gyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-22: mig gi 'od zer mngon par snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-23: tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs rgya mtsho yid du 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17a-24: de dag la sogs pa tshangs pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems snang bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-0: sim par bya bar byams pa chen @17b po la gnas pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-1: lha'i bu gya nom snang ba'i ris su gtogs pa tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-2: 'di ltar lha'i bu snang bas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-3: dge ba sna tshogs kyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-5: dran pa'i blo dam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-6: dga' ba sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-7: legs par bsam pa'i dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-8: 'od 'gyed pa'i dbyangs rnam par snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-10: grags pa dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-11: lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pas shin tu 'phags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-12: de dag la sogs pa gya nom snang ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu tshad med pa kun kyang zhi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-13: dga' ba rgya chen po'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-14: dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-15: 'di ltar lha'i bu dge bar grags pa'i blo gros dang mchog tu snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-16: rab tu zhi ba'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-18: dran pa dge ba'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-19: dga' ba dam pa rnam par snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-20: 'jig rten dbyangs kyi blo gros dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-21: gzi brjid 'bar ba'i bdag po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:17b-22: chos kyi dga' bas 'phrul ba'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-0: de dag la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu grangs med pa kun kyang sgo yangs pa la gnas pas 'gro bar 'gyur zhing rnam par 'dul ba la rab tu brtson pa sha @18a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-2: lha'i bu 'bras bu chen po'i ris su gtogs pa tshad med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-3: 'di ltar lha'i bu chos kyi dpal gzi brjid dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-4: dri med sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-6: ye shes dbang po'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-8: sgo kun nas shes pa'i mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-9: dga' ba'i gtsug gi blo gros dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-10: yon tan blo gros bzang po'i 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-11: 'od zhi zhing dri ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-12: lha'i bu snang ba chen po dri ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-13: de dag la sogs pa 'bras bu chen po'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu tshad med pa kun kyang zhi ba'i chos kyi gzhal med khang la kun nas rab tu gnas pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-14: lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa grangs med pa dag dang yang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-15: 'di ltar lha'i bu shin tu 'od 'phro rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-16: lha'i bu dbang phyug grags pa rab tu snang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-17: lha'i bu dge ba'i mig dri ma med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-18: lha'i bu shes rab chen pos dga' zhing spro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-19: lha'i bu 'od mi sgul ba'i dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-20: lha'i bu mig shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-21: lha'i bu snang ba shin tu sems pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-22: lha'i bu ye shes chen pos dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-23: lha'i bu sna tshogs kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18a-24: lha'i bu grags pa rnam par snang ba'i brtul zhugs bzang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-0: de @18b dag la sogs pa dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu grangs med pa kun kyang spyod yul mtshan ma med pa'i mnyam pa nyid la rab tu brtson pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-2: sems can gyi ris thams cad yang dag par gzhol ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-3: sems can yon tan mtha' yas pa 'dus pa las yongs su byung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-4: phyogs kyi dbyings kun na shin tu gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-5: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi dbyings su rnam par gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-6: phan tshun 'dres pa med cing ji ltar 'ongs pa'i phyogs kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba la mngon par phyogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-8: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang sems kyi dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-9: sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-10: sangs rgyas lta ba la sgrib pa med pas snang bar gyur pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-12: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon bskal pa rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du bzhud pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung zhing thabs kyi sgo de dag gis yongs su smin par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:18b-14: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la rab tu bkod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa rab tu bskyed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-0: @19a *// bsod nams chen po'i stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-1: shugs rab tu thob pa dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-2: smon lam gyi tshul rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs shing spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhan dang gzhan yongs su dag pas yang dag par byung ba 'byung ba'i lam gzhan dang gzhan gyis shin tu 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong bas snang bar gyur pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-4: mos pa'i stobs gzhan dang gzhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-5: sangs rgyas lta ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis rnam par 'phrul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-8: lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa shin tu 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-9: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' ltar zhi ba'i tshul gyi mthu zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-10: lha'i bu dbang phyug grags pa rab tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-11: chos thams cad la dbang ba'i stobs la yang dag par gzhol zhing kun nas rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-12: lha'i bu dge ba'i mig dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-13: chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-15: brjod du med cing sbyar ba med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19a-16: lha'i bu shes rab chen po dga' zhing spro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-0: chos kyi tshul thams cad la mngon sum du gyur pa'i shes @19b rab rgya mtshos rnam par dpyod pa la rab tu snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-1: lha'i bu 'od mi sgul ba'i dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-2: sems can la bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-3: bde ba mtha' yas pa la mos pa bstan pa rgya chen po'i tshul yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-4: lha'i bu mig shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-5: mi shes pa'i mun nag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-6: 'jigs pa rnam par zlog pa'i spyod pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-7: lha'i bu snang ba shin tu sems pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-8: bsam pa'i yul mtha' yas pa'i las srid pa thams cad du mi 'byung ba la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-9: lha'i bu ye shes chen pos dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-10: chos thams cad kyi phyogs su 'gro zhing yongs su non pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-11: rten pa'i phyogs kyi mthu zhes bya'o; ;lha'i bu sna tshogs kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-12: sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu zhi ba la 'jug pa kun nas khong du chud pa'i gtsug rab tu snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-13: lha'i bu grags pa rnam par snang ba'i brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-14: rang gi gzhal med khang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:19b-15: blo'i yul nas dmigs pa tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-0: de nas dbang phyug chen po'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha shin tu 'od 'phro rgya mtshos sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad @20a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-1: la rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-2: mi zad chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-3: kun kyang sangs rgyas sku la rab tu gsal; ;de ni gzung med dngos med rab tu zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-4: 'gro ba'i skyabs su rang byung skyes shing byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-5: chos kyi sgron ma sangs rgyas shin tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-6: chos la mnga' rab mdzad pa 'jig rten byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-7: de yi spyod yul mtha' yas mi zad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-8: dbang phyug grags pa 'di 'dra'i mos la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-9: bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas snang ba byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-10: de yi mtshan nyid phyogs na med pa ste; ;rnam dag lam ni skye bo dag la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-11: shin tu dri med mig gis 'di 'dra mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-12: 'gro ba kun gyis bsam du mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-13: rgyal ba'i shes rab mtha' yas gang mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-14: gti mug sgrib pa'i sems can rnam par sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-15: de la shes rab chen po rnam par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-16: skye rgu kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-17: mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur; ;'gro ba'i dga' ba rgya chen rab tu bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-18: mi sgul dbang phyug lha yis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-19: sems can rgya mtsho gti mug mun bsgribs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-20: sangs rgyas chos nyid rab tu zhi ba ston; ;shes rab sgron ma 'gro ba 'di brjod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-21: dge ba'i mig ni 'di yi tshul la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20a-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam dag sku ston cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-0: thams cad phyogs su shin tu 'phags @20b pa'i sku; ;de yang dngos med 'jig rten mi gnas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-1: kun tu snang ba sems pa 'di ltar lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-2: mtha' yas chags med rgyal ba rnams kyi gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-3: snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag nyan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-4: sangs rgyas rnams las 'pho bar mi snang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-5: 'di ni shes pas dga' ba'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-6: thams cad phyogs sgo kun nas sangs rgyas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-7: mi yi dbang po rnam thar zhi la bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-8: sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang zhing rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-9: 'di ni sna tshogs rgyal mtshan rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-10: rgyal ba bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-11: 'gro ba kun don rnam par byang chub cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-12: sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul bas sems can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-13: rnam par snang bas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-14: de la lha'i rgyal po chos kyi dpal gzi brjid dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-15: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-16: the tshom rnam par lta ba'i sems kyi sprin la rab tu gzhol ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-17: lha'i rgyal po dri med sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-18: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i rnam pa thams cad yid la byed pa ston pa sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-19: lha'i rgyal po shes rab mchog gi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-20: chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i lus kyi rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:20b-21: lha'i rgyal po ye shes dbang po'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-0: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par sgom pa'i sems skad cig tu bsam gyis mi khyab @21a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-1: pa'i rgyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-2: lha'i rgyal po dga' ba zhi ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-3: skra'i sbubs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod rgu 'dzud pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-4: lha'i rgyal po sgo kun nas shes pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-5: chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rnam par lta bas 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-6: lha'i rgyal po dga' ba'i gtsug gi blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-7: sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-8: byed pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mngon par 'byin pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-9: lha'i rgyal po yon tan blo gros bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-11: 'jig rten gyi dgos pa thams cad chos gzhal du med cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-12: bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-13: lha'i bu 'od zhi zhing dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-16: 'byung ba thams cad kyi sgo la mngon sum du yang dag par spyod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-17: lha'i rgyal po snang ba chen po dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-18: sems can snod du gyur pa thams cad la rnam par lta zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-19: sangs rgyas skye ba'i chos nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21a-20: de nas lha'i rgyal po chos kyi dpal rab tu snang ba la mos pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-0: @21b 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-1: sangs rgyas yul rnams kun kyang bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-2: sems can kun gyis bsam par nus pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-3: sems can mos dang bsam pa yangs pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-4: mi zad pa dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-5: sangs rgyas blta bar sems can snod gyur la; ;rgyal ba rnams ni byin gyis brlabs mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-6: de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mngon sum mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-7: 'di ltar sna tshogs rgya mtsho mthong ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-8: sangs rgyas chos nyid gnas pa med pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-9: 'gro ba bkang zhing sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-10: rgyal ba 'byung med gnas pa yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-11: shes rab mchog gi 'od ni 'di sgom mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-12: sems can snyed kyi tshul dang bsam pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-13: bsam gyis mi khyab gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-14: sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas tshul ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-15: dbang po dpal gyi rnam thar rgya mtsho 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul yul rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-17: mi zad 'das pa'i zhing rnams thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-18: de dag spu yi dkyil 'khor gcig tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-19: chos kyi dkyil 'khor sgo mo gcig la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-20: chos kyi sgo mo mi zad rgya mtsho dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-21: sangs rgyas chos nyid rab tu des sgrog ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-22: shes pa'i mig ni 'di yi tshul la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:21b-23: phyogs bcu dag na zhing dbyings ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-2: rgyal ba de ni gar yang 'pho mi mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-3: dga' ba'i gtsug gi blo gros spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan 'dra ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-5: mgon po chos kyi gzhal med khang snang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-6: chos nyid rab tu zhi ba yang dag ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-7: yon tan blo gros bzang pos 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-8: rang byung rnams kyi spyod yul rnams la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-9: sems can kun gyi dbang po'i tshul bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-10: bsam yas 'byung ba'i sgo mos chos char 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-11: 'di ni zhi ba'i 'od kyi lha ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-12: thugs rje rgya chen rab tu bskyed byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-13: sems can phan phyir mgon po rnams 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-14: snod kyi tshul bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-15: snang ba chen po'i blo gros 'di ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-17: de la lha'i rgyal po dge bar grags pa'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-18: sems can thams cad rnam par thar pa'i tshogs kyi tshul la rnam par bltar 'dzud pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-19: lha'i rgyal po mchog tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-20: rang bzhin rnam par rig pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-21: lha'i bu rab tu zhi ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-23: sgo thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-24: lha'i bu dbyangs kyi ri bo'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22a-25: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i phyi ma'i mtha' thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sgyur ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-0: @22b lha'i bu dran pa dge ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su dran zhing sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-2: lha'i bu dga' ba dam pas rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-3: gzungs rgya mtsho la sgo kun nas rab tu brtan pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-4: lha'i bu 'jig rten dbyangs kyi blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-5: sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa'i bsam pa skyed pas mos pa sbyong ba'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-6: lha'i bu gzi brjid 'bar ba'i bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-7: sems can thams cad la chos kyi shugs kyis dga' ba skyed cing sgrol ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-8: lha'i bu chos kyi dga' bas 'phrul ba'i sems kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba mtha' yas pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pa'i sgor rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-10: lha'i bu 'phrul bas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-11: sems can gyi nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa'i snying rje dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-12: ye shes kyi rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-13: de nas lha'i rgyal po dge bar grags pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge chung dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-15: dge rgyas kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:22b-16: chags med spyod pa'i chos nyid 'di la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-1: phyogs rnams rab tu rgyas bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-2: bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas yul yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-3: rnam thar tshul gyi rgya mtsho zad mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-4: bde gshegs 'jig rten kun la mi gnas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-5: chos dbyings dam pa kun nas 'byung ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-6: mig yor spyod yul zhing rnams thams cad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-7: tshul 'di mchog tu snang ba'i lha yi 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-8: bskal pa rgya mtshor thabs la gnas pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-9: sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun na rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-10: chos dbyings de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-11: de la rab zhi dpal gyi lha 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-12: sems can gti mug rab rib sgrib pas bsgribs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-13: 'khor ba'i spyod yul mdongs gyur de dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-14: rgyal ba dge ba'i lam rnams rab ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-15: rnam thar de la dbyangs kyi ri bo 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-17: sems can kun gyis bsam par mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-18: rnam pa thams cad rgyal ba rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-19: de ni dran pa dge ba'i mig gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-20: zhing rnams rgya mtsho rdul dang mnyam pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-21: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi mgon rtag tu gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-22: sems can thams cad 'dul ba rnam par ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-23: dga' ba rnam par snang bas de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-24: sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-25: bskal pa rgya mtsho dag na bar 'ga' snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-26: de la mos pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23a-27: 'jig rten dbyangs kyi blo gros de la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-0: rgyal ba chos mthu @23b rgya che bsam yas dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-1: sems can kun la rnam par sbyong ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-2: dngos med chos nyid rgyal ba ston par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-3: gzi brjid 'bar ba'i lhas ni de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-4: dus gsum bde gshegs phun sum tshogs pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-5: de dag sems can yul du bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-6: dran nas bdag gi dga' ba rab skyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-7: de dag chos dga' sems pa rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-8: 'gro ba rnams ni nyon mongs rgya mtsho la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-9: gti mug ltas brnyogs 'jigs pa chen por bying //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-10: snying rje bskyed cing 'gro ba 'grel ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-11: 'phrul bas 'phags pa spyod yul de la lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-12: 'od zer dra ba rgyal ba rtag tu 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-13: 'od zer sgo kun rgyal ba mi zad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-14: sems can dbyings rnams 'dul bar rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-15: sna tshogs dbyangs kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-16: de la gya nom snang ba'i lha'i rgyal po snang bas dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-17: dga' ba dang bde ba rab tu zhi ba myong bar byed cing 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu gzhil ba la gzhol ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-18: lha'i bu dge ba sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-19: sems shin tu yangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-20: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnal 'byor yangs pa rgya mtsho snying rje dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-21: dga' ba'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-22: lha'i bu dbang po'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:23b-23: bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-0: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi mthu sems kyi skad cig gcig gis mngon par @24a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-2: lha'i bu dran pa'i blo dam pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-6: bsod nams sna tshogs nam mkha' lta bu yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-7: lha'i bu dga' ba sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-8: 'phags pa'i chos thams cad la dga' ba mtshungs pa med pa'i shugs rnam par spel bas rab tu tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-9: lha'i bu legs par bsam pa'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-10: tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dgod cing shin tu bstan pa'i don du yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-11: lha'i bu 'od 'gyed pa'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-12: dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba'i mchod pa shin tu rgyas pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-13: lha'i bu dbyangs zab mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-14: rdzu 'phrul la rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab rgya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-15: lha'i bu grags pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-16: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su thob cing 'gro ba la ston pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-17: lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24a-18: sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dga' ba 'byung ba'i shugs kyi snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-0: de nas gya nom snang ba'i lha'i rgyal po snang bas dga' bas sangs @24b rgyas kyi mthus dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-4: gya nom snang ba'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-5: sngon gyi rgyal ba'i spyod pa bdag gis dran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-6: rgyal ba mtha' yas grags pa cis mchod dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-7: ji ltar sngon chad dga' shugs yongs dag pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-8: de ni rgyal ba'i mthu yis bdag gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-9: rgyal ba dri med mtshan nyid med pa'i sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-10: 'gro ba'i mya ngan mang po rnam par bzlog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-11: byams dang thugs brtse thugs rje'i sa la bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-12: rnam thar 'di tshul sna tshogs 'od 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-13: sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di ni rgya che ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-14: zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po ji lta bur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-15: ji ltar 'byung dang ji ltar 'jig pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-16: rnam thar 'di ni dbang po'i dbyangs kyi yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-17: rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul mnyam med phyogs kun gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-18: zhing gi dbyings su yangs pa shin tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-19: da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba'i dge ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-20: dran pa dam pa'i rnam thar tshul 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-21: zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po'i rdul snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-22: bde gshegs de dag dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-23: de phyir mnyan pa rdul med don kyang yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-24: sna tshogs dbyangs kyi rnam thar 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-25: bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po yangs par yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-26: tshul gyi sa ni rgyal ba rgya chen gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:24b-27: rgyal ba kun la zad med mtha' yang yas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-0: legs bsam dbyangs kyi rnam thar @25a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-2: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas dbyings kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-3: 'pho dang rnam par 'tshang rgya tshul yang dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-4: sems kyi skad cig kun la rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-5: 'od 'gyed dbyangs kyi rnam thar sgo 'di yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-6: sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen bshad pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-7: rdzu 'phrul yul ni bde bar gshegs pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-8: dbang po bsam pa kun kyang rnam par sbyong; ;dbyangs zab 'od ni 'di la rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-9: rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-10: mnyam med chags med sangs rgyas 'jig rten spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-11: sems can kun la mchog sbyin mngon par gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-12: grags pa dri med tshul 'dir rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-13: rgyal ba sngon chad byang chub spyod mdzad tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-14: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yang dag mchod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-15: de dag kun gyi smon lam rab sgrub pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-16: de ni 'od 'phags dga' bar rab tu nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-17: de la tshangs pa chen po rab tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-18: chos dri ma med pa'i spyod yul la gnas shing phyogs bcur thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-19: tshangs pa chen po blo gros 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-20: sems can thams cad bsam gtan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-21: snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25a-22: tshangs pa chen po blo gros bzang po'i sems snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-0: chos kyi snang ba bsam @25b gyis mi khyab pa thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-1: tshangs pa chen po kun tu dbyangs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing rtogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-3: tshangs pa chen po 'jig rten dbang po'i sgra'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can thams cad bsdu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-5: gdul ba rjes su dran pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-6: tshangs pa chen po mig rab tu zhi zhing 'od shin tu zab pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-7: las kyis rnam par phye ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba'i dbyings shin tu ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-8: tshangs pa chen po phyogs su snang ba 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-9: rnam pa thams cad du sems can 'dul ba la mngon par phyogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-10: tshangs pa chen po sprul pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-11: chos thams cad dge ba'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-12: rab tu zhi ba'i chos la dpyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-13: tshangs pa chen po mig gi 'od zer mngon par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-14: dngos po thams cad la chags pa med cing mtha' yas pa'i brtsam pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:25b-15: tshangs pa chen po dbyangs rgya mtsho yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-0: mi zad pa'i chos gzhal du med pa la rjes su spyad par rtag tu phyogs shing rnam par blta @26a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-2: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-3: de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po chen po yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshangs ris dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-6: tshangs chen gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-7: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-8: rgyal ba'i sku ni zhi la rab tu zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-9: 'jig rten kun tu dri med snang zhing mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-10: mtshan nyid med cing gzugs brnyan med pa'i yul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-11: sprin dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-12: 'gro ba kun gyis bsam du mi nus te; ;sangs rgyas sku dang de bzhin bsam gtan yul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-13: thams cad tshul gyi sgo yis bsam du med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-14: tshangs pa blo gros 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-15: rgya mtsho'i chos rnams zhing gi rdul snyed kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-16: sangs rgyas gsung gcig yang dag bka' stsal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-17: bskal pa rgya mtshor gsungs kyang zad pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-18: snang ba sems pa'i rnam thar 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-19: sngon gyi rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-20: 'gro ba snyed de rgyud kun sems can shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-21: rgyal ba de la rtog dang dbyangs mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-22: tshangs pa kun tu sgra dbyangs 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum gshegs pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-24: byang chub spyod pa'i tshul la gang bzhugs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-25: de dag rgyal ba'i sku la thams cad snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26a-26: rnam thar 'di la 'jig rten dbang po 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-0: sems can @26b kun gyi las dbang gang yin dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-1: sna tshogs rgyu yi sgo yis rnam grol ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-2: 'gro ba bkang zhing sangs rgyas yang dag ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-3: zhi ba zab mo'i mig ni 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-4: rnam pa mtha' yas sgo yis rang byung rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-5: phyogs rnams ma las kun tu sems can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-6: sangs rgyas rtog dang rnam rtog mi mnga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-7: snang ba 'gyed pa'i spyod yul 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-8: rgyal ba'i sku ni mi zad nam mkha' bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-9: mtshan nyid mi mnga' phyogs la chags pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-10: sgyu mar gtogs pa'i chos nyid rab tu stan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-11: kun tu 'phrul dga'i spyod yul 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-12: bde gshegs sku dang ye shes rnam pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-13: de bzhin dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-14: chags med sems can sangs rgyas mngon du lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-16: chos rje chos kyi gzhal med khang bzhugs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-17: chos kyi sku yi sangs rgyas rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-18: chos kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas mtshan nyid med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-19: rnam thar 'di la rgya mtsho'i 'od 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-20: de la lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-21: mtha' yas pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo'i dbang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-22: spyod pa'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-23: lha'i bu mig bzang po'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:26b-24: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba dang bde ba la rnam par lta ba 'phags pa'i spyod yul gyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-0: lha'i bu cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par @27a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-2: sems can thams cad kyi 'byung ba sna tshogs don tha dad pa'i dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-3: lha'i bu go 'phang rnam par gnon pa'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-4: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sgo rjes su dran zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-5: rang gi yul la rnam par bya ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-6: lha'i bu 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-7: nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-8: snying rje chen po'i sgo nas rab tu zhi ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-9: lha'i bu spyod yul zhi ba'i sgo'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-10: 'gro ba thams cad kyi khong khro ba yang dag par 'dul ba rab tu brjod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-11: lha'i bu 'khor lo ri mo bzang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-12: phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mu med par khebs par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-13: lha'i bu me tog blo gros sengge'i dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba rnam pa thams cad rjes su dran pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27a-15: lha'i bu dbang po'i stobs ri mo bzang po'i 'od sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni; 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi chos nyid la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin rlabs kyi khyad par zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-0: de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang byed kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus @27b lha'i bu dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-1: chos dbyings mthar thugs bde bar gshegs pa'i sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-2: 'gro ba kun na mngon par rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-3: 'byams klas thams cad chos kyis sems can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-4: chos kyi mnga' bdag rgyal ba 'gro la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-5: 'jig rten bde ba sna tshogs ma lus pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-6: ji snyed de na 'phags bde zhi mchog yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-7: chos nyid yangs pa rgyal ba'i gnas yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-8: mig bzang bdag po 'di la rnam par lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-9: 'jig rten phyogs rnams bkang zhing sangs rgyas kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-10: bsam pa'i dbyings kyi tshul bzhin chos ston pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-11: sems can kun gyi nem nur dogs pa gcod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-12: cod pan sna tshogs rgyal mtshan rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-13: rgyal ba'i gsung gcig ma lus gsung ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-14: bskal pa rgya mtshor yangs pa'i chos sgrog ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-15: 'gro ba bkang zhing sangs rgyas gsung brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-16: 'di ni brtson pa'i blo gros rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-17: 'jig rten byams pa 'byams klas rgya chen kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-18: bde gshegs pa spu gcig gi dper mi rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-19: rgyal ba'i byams pa mkha' bzhin zad mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-20: bshad pa sna tshogs blo gros rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-21: nga rgyal ri dang mun sprin sgo 'joms shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-22: stobs bcus 'gro ba kun tu khyab byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-23: rgyal ba'i thugs rje'i 'od zer rab tu 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:27b-24: rnam thar 'di ni 'od bzang rgyal mtshan gyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-1: gshegs mthong bas gti mug rab tu 'joms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-2: 'gro la shes rab dkyil 'khor dge ba ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-3: de dag ngan 'gro'i tshul rnams rnam 'dul te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-4: zhi ba spyod yul sgo yi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-5: sangs rgyas spu yi khung nas 'od brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-6: sems can kun dang mthun par bde gshegs mtshan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-7: de dag bsam pa ji bzhin mtshan kyang thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-8: 'khor lo sna tshogs rgyal mtshan rnam thar yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-9: rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa tshad med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-10: de dag thams cad 'khor 'dir phyir snang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-11: chos dbyings nam mkha' rgyal bas rab rgyas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-12: me tog sengge dpal gyi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-13: bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po tshad med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-14: zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i yul brjod kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-15: sangs rgyas gshegs dang bzhud par gyur pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-16: dbang po dpal stobs rnam thar 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-17: de la lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-18: chos kyi rang bzhin sprul par rnam par sgom pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-19: lha'i bu sgras zhi ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-20: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-21: lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phrul pa'i sgra'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28a-22: sems can thams cad kyi gti mug gis yongs su mi zad cing rmongs pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-0: lha'i bu dbang chen sna tshogs kyi @28b rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung la yang dag par 'jug cing dga' ba tshad med pas rnam par snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-2: lha'i bu dran pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
