K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-4: bsod nams kyi tshogs la 'jug pa zad mi shes pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-5: lha'i bu sprin sgra shin tu 'phags pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-6: 'das pa'i bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rjes su dran zhing spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-7: lha'i bu snang ba spyod pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-8: sems can thams cad kyi shes rab chad dang bral ba rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-9: lha'i bu gtsug phud yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-10: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar nyi ma'i shugs kyis rgyu bas kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-11: lha'i bu dga' ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-12: brtsams pa thams cad zad mi shes pa la brtson 'grus kyi stobs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-13: lha'i bu me tog 'od kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-14: sems can thams cad kyi las la lta zhing bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o; ;lha'i bu phyogs shin tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:28b-15: sems can gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par sgrub pa sna tshogs kyi dran pas mngon du sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-1: lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dgas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'phrul dga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-2: 'jig rten las kyi rang bzhin bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-3: thams cad 'gro ba 'dir yang shin tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-4: rgyu dang rang bzhin rgyal ba sems can tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-5: 'jig rten 'di kun las kyi rnam par bris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-6: thams cad tshul du rang byung dngos po med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-7: phyogs rnams kun na'ang gzung ba yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-8: chos kyi sku la dngos med de yang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-9: sgra zhi 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-10: rgyal bas bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-11: 'jig rten gti mug mun pa rnam par bzlog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-12: de bas sangs rgyas shin tu dri med snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-13: rnam thar 'di ni stobs kyi 'od kyis shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-14: ji snyed 'jig rten sgra dbyangs zhi ba'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-15: kun kyang sangs rgyas sgra las nye bar 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-16: phyogs rnams zhing dbyings sna tshogs rnam par sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-17: 'di ni sna tshogs dbang gi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-18: 'gro ba'i bsod nams mthu rnams kun bsags kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-19: rgyal ba'i mtshan rab gcig tu mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-20: rgyal ba'i bsod nams nam mkha'i dpe lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-21: dran pa'i 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-22: dus gsum bskal pa mtha' dang mu med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-23: spu gcig rtse la rang byung rnams ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29a-24: de dag 'byung 'jig ji lta ba yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-0: 'di ni 'phags @29b pa'i dbyangs kyis rab tu shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-1: phyogs rnams nam mkha'i mtha' ni rnyed par rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-2: rgyal ba'i spu gcig mtha' ni thug pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-3: de ltar sangs rgyas chags med bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-4: yid 'ong 'od kyi gtsug gis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-5: sngon gyi rgyal bas bskal pa bsam yas par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-6: mi skyo'i thugs kyis brtson 'grus rab bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-7: pha rol phyin pa rgya chen rab tu bskangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-8: de ni dga' dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-9: 'gro ba rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-10: bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas ma lus gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-11: dri med rnam dag chos nyid de yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-12: de la me tog 'od kyi gtsug phud 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-13: rgyal ba'i spu gcig rtse la 'gro ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-14: thams cad snyed kyi gzugs kyi sku la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-15: 'on kyang 'gro zhing 'ong ba de la med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-16: rnam thar de ni phyogs su snang bas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-17: de la lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo phun sum tshogs pa mngon par sgrub pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-19: lha'i bu dga' ba rgya mtsho'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-20: nam mkha'i dbyings dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-21: lha'i bu yon tan mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-22: smon lam rgya mtsho'i dri ma med pas 'gro ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:29b-23: lha'i bu 'od zer zhi ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-0: chos rjes su srung ba'i sgo kun tu bstan pas rnam par @30a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-2: lha'i bu rab tu dga' ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-3: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams nam mkha'i dbyings ltar dri ma med par yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-4: lha'i bu rin chen 'od zer zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-5: 'gro ba rnam par gdul ba zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-6: lha'i bu rnam par gnon pas rab tu brtson pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la brtson zhing yang dag par byang chub mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-8: lha'i bu rdo rje mdog gi 'od bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-9: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa mi shigs par brtan pa'i rgyun thams cad dga' bas yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-10: lha'i bu skar mas brgyan pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-11: sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi drung du nye bar 'gro zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-12: phyogs bcu'i sems can rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i 'dul ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-13: lha'i bu dga' ba bzang po sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-14: bsam pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-15: sems skad cig gis yongs su bstan pa la mngon par phyogs pa'i snod yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30a-16: de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-0: de'i tshe tshigs @30b su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-1: chos dbyings dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-2: sems can kun dang mnyam nyid mnyam par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-3: bsam pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i chos nyid de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-4: dri med bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-5: sangs rgyas sku ni phyogs la thogs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-6: gzung ba med cing chags pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-7: 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi sgo rnams kun la snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-8: rnam thar de la dga' ba'i gtsug phud 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-9: smon lam rgya mtshos ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-10: sngon gyi rgyal ba'i spyod pa rnams la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-11: thams cad chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-12: de yi tshul la yon tan rgya mtsho 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-13: bde gshegs chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-14: chos kyi dbyings ni mig yor mtshan nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-15: thams cad chos kyi 'od zer snang ba gtong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-16: zhi ba'i 'od zer snang bas 'di ltar mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-17: 'gro ba nyon mongs las kyi mun pas bsgribs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-18: 'jigs dogs bag med dregs pa'i yul can la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-19: rgyal ba zhi ba'i chos nyid rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-20: dga' ba bzang po'i mig gis dga' bar mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-21: mgon po 'jig rten thams cad skyabs gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-22: gnas dang mgon du gyur pa rang 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-23: rgyal ba sems can kun la bde ba ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-24: de yi tshul la rtse mo'i zla ba 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-25: sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-26: chos dbyings dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:30b-27: thams cad chos dbyings pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-1: ni brtson pa'i blo gros dga' ba 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-2: phyogs bcu dag na sems can snod gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-3: bsod nams rgya mtshos rnam dag spyod yul can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-4: sangs rgyas yon tan thos shing byang chub 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-5: rdo rje rdul gyi 'od ni 'di ltar sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-6: zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul dang mnyam pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-7: phyogs bcu'i rgyal sras rtag tu kun 'du zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-8: rgyal ba mchod cing chos nyid nyan par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-9: brgyan pa'i dpal ni rnam thar 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-10: 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i sems ni bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-11: gnas med g-yo ba med cing rten pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-12: thams cad skad cig gcig la rgyal bas mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-13: dga' ba sna tshogs dga' bas 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-14: de la lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-15: sems can thams cad kyi mya ngan bsal ba dge ba'i sgo yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-16: lha'i bu dga' ba bde ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-17: dmigs pa thams cad khyab par byed pa'i yul zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-18: lha'i bu blo gros mi zad pa'i yon tan dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-19: nad thams cad rnam par sel cing phan par snying rje ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-20: lha'i bu 'phrul ba bzang zhing dge ba'i rnam par thar pa ni; bud med thams cad 'dul ba'i bsam pa rjes su rtogs pa'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31a-21: lha'i bu sa dang ri bo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-0: chos thams cad gzung ba la rmongs @31b pa med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo bde bar snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-1: lha'i bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-2: dmigs pa'i yul thams cad las kyi rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-3: lha'i bu 'khor lo'i gtsug gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-4: chos kyi 'khor lo'i shugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba bgrang ba'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-5: lha'i bu gzi brjid 'od 'phro'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-6: khams thams cad kyi mthar 'gro bas mig shin tu yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis kun tu blta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-7: lha'i bu 'od rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-8: las kyi dmigs pa dang 'grogs pa'i bdud kyi las thams cad zlog pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-9: lha'i bu grags pa'i phyogs su rnam par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-10: lha'i gnas thams cad kyi 'khor du dgos pa myong bar bya ba la sems rab tu dang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-11: de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab mtshe ma'i lha'i bu'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-12: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-13: bskal pa rgya mtsho yangs pa rgya chen du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-14: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rgya mtsho yongs sbyangs pa'i; ;dri med lam ni ye shes dkyil 'khor rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-15: yang dag brnyes pa'i sgron mas rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-16: rgyal ba'i sku ni mtha' yas rgya che ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:31b-17: phyogs bcur mu mtha' rnyed par yong mi rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-0: @32a *// tshul rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas tshad med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-1: de la dga' ba bde ba'i 'od 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-2: nad dag rga ba 'chi ba mya ngan gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-3: 'jig rten gtses shing rab tu gdungs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-4: de dag kun la thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-5: sangs rgyas blo gros zad pa med pas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-6: ye shes sgyu ma sangs rgyas thugs su chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-7: dus gsum kun la chags pa mi mnga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-8: 'gro ba thams cad spyod pa rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-9: 'di ni 'phrul pa dge ba'i spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-10: sangs rgyas dbus dang mtha' med gzugs rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-11: tha dad yang dag shes pa rgya mtsho gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-12: chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag rab tu bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-13: 'di ni sa yi ri 'od rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-14: sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin rgya chen ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-15: chos rnams thugs su chud pas rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-16: thams cad chos kyi yul ni bsam yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-17: blo gros bsam yas tshul las 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-18: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi byed pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-19: bsam gyis mi khyab tshul gyi 'khor lo bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-20: byang chub spyod pa rgya chen rnams kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-21: 'khor lo lta ba 'di yi sa la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-22: rgyal ba'i sku 'di sems can grangs bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-23: sprul pas 'jig rten yongs su khyab mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-24: 'gro ba kun la mngon par kun na gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-25: gzi brjid 'od 'phro'i spyod yul 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32a-26: sangs rgyas mthong ba tsam gyis 'gro ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-0: las kyi sgrib pa thams @32b cad bzlog par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-1: bdud kyi las rnams kun kyang de bzhin spong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-2: rnam snang 'od kyi spyod yul 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-3: rgya mtsho'i 'khor rnams thams cad kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-4: rgyal ba bzhugs pas mngon par rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-5: chos kyi sprin chen char yang rab 'bebs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-6: grags pa kun tu grags pa'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-7: de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-8: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-9: rnam par 'jig pa rgya chen po rjes su dran pa yid la bya ba la dga' ba chen po'i shugs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-10: lha'i bu sgra kun tu grags pa'i dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-11: sems can thams cad kyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i yon tan yongs su spyod pa'i shugs kyi snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-12: lha'i bu byams par lta ba'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-13: byams pa'i sprin gyis kun tu khebs par byed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis khyab par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-14: lha'i bu rin po che'i 'od kun tu grags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-15: 'jig rten thams cad kyi yon tan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-17: sems can gyi rnam pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:32b-18: lha'i bu dga' bde 'byung ba'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-0: sems can thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rnam par lta ba'i bsod nams yang @33a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-1: dag par 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-2: lha'i bu dran pa yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-3: sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-4: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rjes su dran pa rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-5: lha'i bu ri bo sgra'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-8: bskal pa'i me yongs su 'pho ba'i ye shes kyi rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-9: lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-10: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'byung ba sems can gdul ba'i rgyu dran pa'i rim pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-11: lha'i bu me tog dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-12: lha'i bu dga' ba thams cad la brtse ba rjes su dran pa'i rim pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-13: lha'i bu ye shes nyi ma'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-14: lha'i bu thams cad skye bar rab tu brjod pa'i dge ba la rmongs pa med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-15: lha'i bu yang dag par skul ba'i 'od kyi dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-16: lha'i 'khor thams cad yang dag par skul zhing phan tshun dgos pa'i the tshom rnam par gdon mi za bar gcod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33a-17: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-0: dus gsum bde bar @33b gshegs pa thams cad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-1: de dag spyod yul rgya chen de dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-2: de dag zhing 'byung 'jig pa ji bzhin dran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-3: rgyal ba'i mthu yis de dag dri med snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-4: sangs rgyas sku mang phyogs su rgyas byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-5: mnyam med gzugs kun 'gro la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-6: rgyal ba kun nas lham me lhang nge ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-7: grags pa'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-8: byams pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni rgya che zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-9: shin tu yangs pas 'gro ba kun bkang nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-10: sngon bsgoms sems can mtha' yas khams kyang btul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-11: dri med mig gi gtsug phud 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-12: bder gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho de dran nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-13: bdag gi dga' ba yang dag 'byung skyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-14: sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun na mnyam med mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-15: 'di ni grags rgyal dri med rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-16: las dge rgya mtshos 'gro ba kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-17: dri med ma lus rgyal bas bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-18: de las bsod nams yangs pa kun byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-19: dga' bde gtsug phud tshul ni 'di yin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-20: sangs rgyas skye ba yangs pas phyogs bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-21: bder gshegs 'gro ba rgyas par mngon du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-22: de dag rgya chen sems can 'dul la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-23: de yi tshul la dran pa'i rgyan 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-24: bder gshegs ye shes sku mnga' spyan yangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-25: 'byams klas zhing rnams thams cad kun bzhugs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-26: 'byams klas zhing gi rdul la kun kyang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:33b-27: rnam thar 'di la sprin gyi dbyangs 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-0: @34a *// rgyal ba'i sras kyi byang chub spyod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-1: ji bzhin yangs pa sbu yi rtse mo la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-2: rgyal bas de dag tshad med phun sum bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-3: dran pa'i blo gros 'di yi tshul mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-4: 'gro ba 'di ni rtse dga' gang bde ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-5: de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthu yis byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-6: bsod nams mnyam med rgyal ba byung la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-7: 'di ni me tog sna tshogs dri med kyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-8: sems gcig rgyud la rgyal ba'i yon tan gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-9: bder gshegs shin tu rgya chen sus dran pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-10: de la ngan song kun gyi 'jigs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-11: ye shes nyi me'i mig gi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-12: rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul chos nyid rgya che zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-13: bsam pa'i lam rnams thams cad kun nas gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-14: de dag the tshom nem nur thams cad sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-15: rnam thar 'di ni brjod dbang blo gros kyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-16: de la lha'i bu zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-17: 'gro ba thams cad bsdu zhing rnam par gdul ba'i snang bas chos kyi dbyings kun nas dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-18: lha'i bu 'od kyi me tog rgyal po'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-19: sems can thams cad kyi yul rnam par lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-20: mtha' yas pa'i chos 'byams klas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-21: lha'i bu dpal gyi tshogs sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34a-22: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho yongs su bzlog cing phan tshun gyi yul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-0: dmigs pa la yang dag @34b par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-1: lha'i bu 'jig rten dga' ba'i bde ba sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-2: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-4: rangs pa rgya chen po bskyed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-5: lha'i bu shing gi dbang po'i mig gi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-6: lo tog thams cad kyi myu gu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-8: dus yongs su bsgyur ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-9: lha'i bu 'od bzang po ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-10: 'gro ba thams cad bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-11: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba la byams pa dang snying rje'i sgos yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-12: lha'i bu kun nas spyod pa mi sgul ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-13: zla ba dri ma med pa 'dzin cing spyod pas phyogs yongs su 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-14: lha'i bu skar ma'i rgyal po'i bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-15: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar dngos po med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-16: mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-17: lha'i bu blo dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-18: sems can thams cad kyi skye ba kun kyang las kyi rang bzhin du yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:34b-19: lha'i bu gzi brjid chen po'i 'od zer mdzes pa'i rnam par thar pa ni; lha'i dgos pa thams cad la the tshom yang dag par gcod pa brjod pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-0: de nas lha'i bu zla bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus zla ba'i gzhal med khang du gtogs pa'i @35a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-1: lha'i bu'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-2: 'gro ba thams cad kun tu 'od bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-3: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun tu sangs rgyas snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-4: mun pa chen pos rmongs pa'i 'jig rten du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-5: bsam yas rgya chen chos kyi snang ba 'gyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-6: sangs rgyas yul ni mi zad mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-7: 'gro ba thams cad mtshungs med bskal par 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-8: rang byung de dag sems can kun la mngon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-9: rgyal ba de ltar snang ba'i gtsug gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-10: rgyal ba'i ye shes rgya chen de la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-11: sems kyi rgya mtsho tshad med skad cig la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-12: chos kyi 'khor los thams cad tshim par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-13: chu bo dpal gyi rnam thar 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-14: 'phags pa'i bde ba med pa'i 'jig rten rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-15: mtha' yas sdug bsngal nyam ngas rmongs pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-16: rgyal ba'i chos nyid rnam par dag pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-17: dga' bde sems pas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-18: rgyal ba'i thugs rje rnam dag ngo mtshar che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-19: srid pa'i rgyud du 'gro la phan phyir 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-20: dge ba rnam par mi 'jigs ston mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-21: shing gi mig gi 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-22: rgyal ba'i chos kyi 'od rnams rab bkye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-23: 'jig rten las kyi rang bzhin rnam par 'byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-24: dge dang mi dge'i lam rnams 'jig pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-25: 'od bzang mthong ba rnam thar 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35a-26: 'jig rten kun tu rang byung sa lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-0: sems @35b can thams cad bsod nams gzhis bzung zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-1: chos kyi phyogs rnams mya ngan med pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-2: spyod pa mi sgul tshul ni 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-3: chos dbyings thug pa med par rgyal bas khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-4: 'gro dang mnyam par bsam yas sku bkye ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-5: chos kyi tshul ni sems can kun la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-6: 'di yi tshul la gzi brjid bdag po 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-7: nam mkha'i dngos ltar dngos med 'gro ba na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-8: gzugs brnyan mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams snang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-9: 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i don du byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-10: dge ba'i dpal gyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-11: sangs rgyas sku yi spu rtse kun nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-12: 'gro ba kun la chos sprin ma lus gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-13: thos nas dga' ba rgya chen rab tu skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-14: rnam thar 'di la dag pa'i sems 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-15: de la lha'i bu nyi ma'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-16: sems can gyi dgos pa thams cad la phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par dri ma med pa'i snang bas phyogs bcu rgyas par byed pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-17: lha'i bu gzi brjid kyi 'od zer 'bar ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-18: sems can kun la dbang sgyur ba rjes su bsnyegs pa'i yon tan yongs su sbyangs pas shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-19: lha'i bu ri bo'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-20: sems can thams cad la dbang sgyur pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yongs su sbyangs pas shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:35b-21: lha'i bu rin chen dri med rmad du byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-1: thams cad la bde bar 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-2: lha'i bu phyir mi ldog pa rab tu gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-3: nyi ma'i 'od chags pa med pas kun tu rgyas par byed cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi mdangs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-4: lha'i bu me tog gi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-5: nyi ma'i 'od dri ma med pas sems can gyi dgos pa la snang ba rgya chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-7: mos pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-8: lha'i bu 'od kyi dpal snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni; 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'od rnam pa sna tshogs bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yang dag par 'grub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-9: lha'i bu rin chen gtsug phud rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-10: rgya mtsho'i dbyings su rin po che sna tshogs thams cad 'gro ma zhing yul du ma'i gzugs yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-11: lha'i bu mig kun tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-12: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mig gi dbang po yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par lta ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-13: lha'i bu dpal gyi be'u 'dzin pa'i rnam par thar pa ni; chu'i rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par 'jig pa med pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36a-14: lha'i bu sgo thams cad du skyob pa'i dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-0: nyi ma'i @36b gzhal med khang gis phyogs su 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-1: sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la snang bas yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-2: de nas lha'i bu nyi mas sangs rgyas kyi mthus nyi ma'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-3: bder gshegs ye shes shin tu yangs pa'i 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-4: phyogs rnams kun tu thams cad zhing bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-5: 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas mngon bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-6: thabs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-7: rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnam yangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-8: bsam pa thams cad yongs su bkang bstan cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-9: 'gro ba 'dir ni shes rab mnyam med brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-10: gzi brjid 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-11: rgyal ba sangs rgyas kun tu rab 'phags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-12: phyogs rnams rgyas par kun nas mdzes shing snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-13: rgyal ba'i sku ni mi mnyam dpag tu med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-14: ri rab 'od mchog rnam thar 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-15: mtha' yas srid par bskal pa rgya mtshor yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-16: rgyal bas 'gro don brtul zhugs spyad pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-17: de phyir sangs rgyas 'od ni nam mkha' bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-18: zla ba'i dpal gyis rgyal ba'i sku mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-19: rgyal ba'i gsung mchog chags med rnam grol bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-20: phyogs dang zhing rnams thams cad ma lus brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:36b-21: 'gro bar chos kyi ro rnams bsags pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-2: 'od kyi dra ba bsam yas btang bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-3: phyogs rnams kun tu sems can rnam par sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-4: mos pa rgya chen yangs pa rab tu bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-5: phreng ba snang ba'i dpal gyi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-6: 'gro ba dag na ji snyed 'od yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-7: de dag rgyal ba'i spu gcig dper mi rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-8: sangs rgyas 'od rnams de ltar bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-9: 'di ni snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-10: rgyal ba kun gyi chos nyid 'di 'dra ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-11: thams cad phyogs su byang chub shing dbang drung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-12: lam ngan song la lam rnams mngon du ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-13: gtsug phud sna tshogs rnam par snang bas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-14: 'gro ba gti mug mun par nub gyur pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-15: sdug bsngal can la rgyal ba mig skyes shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-16: de dag ye shes sgron mas rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-17: rnam thar 'di ni mig bzang snang bas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-18: thams cad tshul gyis rnam thar rang byung bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-19: gang du gang tshe mchod pa gzigs pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-20: thar pa'i 'bras bu rim gyis rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-21: 'di ni snang ba'i dpal gyi tshul dang sa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-22: chos rnams gcig gi sgo nas mtha' yas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-23: bskal pa stong du mi mgon rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-24: chos kyi don yangs phyogs rnams kun tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-25: 'di ni kun tu dpal gyi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-26: de la dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37a-27: kun tu rtse ba'i thabs thams cad kyis sems can sdud pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-0: dri za'i @37b dbang po shing mi 'am ci'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-1: chags pa thams cad kyi yon tan rnam par brgyan pas kun tu snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-2: dri za'i dbang po mig gtsang ma dga' ba rab tu skye ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mya ngan rnam par bzlog pas dga' ba'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-4: dri za'i dbang po me tog dang shing shin tu rgyas pa'i cod pan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-6: nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'jil ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-7: dri za'i dbang po dga' bas spyod pa kun tu sgrog pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-8: sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba la kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sprin gyi 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-9: dri za'i dbang po rab tu dga' ba rgyun du gnas pa'i mig bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-10: dga' ba thams cad rab tu gnas pa yangs pa la mos pa'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-11: dri za'i dbang po yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs sengge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-12: rin po che dgram pas phyogs thams cad du khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-13: dri za'i dbang po 'od zer kun tu 'gyed pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-14: dge ba'i lus thams cad yang dag par bstan pas dga' ba shin tu rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya'o; ;dri za'i dbang po rdo rje'i shing gi yal ga'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:37b-15: shing thams cad kyi mdangs 'byung bas rab tu dga' ba'i mig kun tu snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-1: dbang po rgyan thams cad la dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-2: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par dpyod cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-3: sems can gyi sgo rab tu brjod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-4: de nas dri za'i dbang po gnas srung pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus dri za'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-5: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-6: sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas sgo can yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-7: 'gro ba kun gyis 'jug par nus pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-8: bder gshegs nam mkha'i rang bzhin dri ma med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-9: rgyal ba 'gro ba kun tu lam yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-10: rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-11: ba spu'i khung bu kun na'ang shin tu yangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-12: 'gro ba kun la phan dang bde don mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-13: yid 'ong shing gi 'od ni 'di ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-14: 'gro ba'i don ni rgya mtsho yangs mang dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-15: sdug bsngal ma lus rgyal bas zlog par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-16: thabs dang thugs rje rnam pa sna tshogs mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-17: dge ba'i mig ni rnam thar 'di ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-18: phyogs rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas zhing gi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-19: kun tu rgyal ba'i 'od rab snang bar 'char //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-20: sems can lta ba'i dri ma rnam par sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-21: me tog shing gi gtsug phud cod pan tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-22: sngon chad bskal pa rgya mtsho rab mang bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-23: byams pa'i tshul yangs yongs su bsgoms pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38a-24: rgyal ba 'gro ba kun gyi dbugs kyang 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-0: kun tu sgra @38b dbyangs 'di yi tshul la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-1: rgyal ba mthong bas dga' ba kun dge dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-2: 'gro ba 'dir ni mi zad bde ba 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-3: thar pa'i 'bras bu rgyu rnams rim gyis ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-4: mu tig cod pan rnam thar 'di ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-5: sgrib dang rab rib gti mug stug por ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-6: sems can 'khor tshe rtag tu shin tu rmongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-7: de la rgyal ba chos nyid yangs pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-8: sengge'i rgyal mtshan 'di la rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-9: 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa mtha' yas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-10: bder gshegs gzugs rnams rab tu yangs pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-11: 'gro bar thabs rnams sna tshogs sgo nas snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-12: de ltar sgra dbyangs snyan pas bder gshegs mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi phyogs mtha' yas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-14: sems can dag la rgyas par rgyal bas bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-15: byang chub spyod mchog 'jug pa'i tshul yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-16: rdo rje shing gi rgyal mtshan rnam par sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-17: skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brgya mang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-18: sangs rgyas ston kyang 'pho ba yod med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-19: sems can rnams kyi bde ba thams cad bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-20: dga' ba mthong ba'i rnam thar tshul 'di yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-21: de la grul bum gyi dbang po 'phags skyes po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-22: mdud par 'dzin pa byung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-23: grul bum gyi dbang po klu bdag gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:38b-24: sgo mtha' yas par spyod pa rgya mtsho la spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-0: grul bum gyi dbang po legs par spyad pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par @39a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-2: rgyud thams cad du 'jig rten gyi bsam pa rgya mtsho snyed kyi sgo zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-3: grul bum gyi dbang po phan par spyod par 'phar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-4: snang ba dri ma med pa'i bya ba la kun nas spyod par gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-5: grul bum gyi dbang po 'jigs pa las sgrol ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-6: 'gro ba thams cad gdon pa'i lam 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-7: grul bum gyi dbang po rtsal sna tshogs bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-8: 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i sred pa rgya mtshos yongs su gdung ba zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-9: grul bum gyi dbang po ri rab legs par byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-10: 'gro ba rgyud thams cad du snang ba'i sprin yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-11: grul bum gyi dbang po sde dpa' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-12: kun tu snang bas sgrib pa'i ri yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-13: grul bum gyi dbang po dge ba'i mig gi 'od zer mtha' yas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-14: snying rje chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39a-15: grul bum gyi dbang po lha dang lha ma yin sgo mtha' yas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni; rgyud kun tu lus yang dag par ston par 'gro ba'i yul zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-0: de nas grul bum gyi dbang po 'phags skyes pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus grul bum gyi 'khor gyi dkyil @39b 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-1: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-2: 'jig rten mgon po bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-3: 'gro la phan don bskal pa bsam yas spyod; ;nga rgyal dregs myos spangs pas 'jig rten khams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-4: kun na rgyal ba'i sku gsal rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-5: sngon chad rgyal bas spyod pa rgya mtsho dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-6: spyad de thabs mang tshogs pas phan bskyed nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-7: phyogs bcur mtha' yas sems can smin par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-8: rnam thar mtha' yas 'di ni klu bdag gi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-9: sangs rgyas ye shes yangs pa 'gro ba'i mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-10: des ni sems can bsam pa kun kyang gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-11: sna tshogs 'phrul sgos sems can rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-12: rgyal ba mthong bas sna tshogs rgyal mtshan dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-13: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul bdag gzugs brnyan 'dra; ;'jig rten kun na phyi mtha'i bskal par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-14: chos kyi 'khor lo mkha' 'dra yang dag dngos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-15: de ni phyin spyod rgyu bas mthong ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-16: mi bzad rab rib bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten du; ;rgyal ba'i 'od ston rnam thar lam dge ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-17: mgon dang skyabs gyur sdug bsngal thams cad spong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-18: 'jigs las sgrol bas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-19: sred pa rgya mtshos gdungs 'gro sdug bsngal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-20: rgyal ba'i ye shes 'od kyis ma lus zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-21: sbyangs shing rgyal ba sangs rgyas chos nyid ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:39b-22: sna tshogs khyim ni rnam thar 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-2: thabs sgo tshogs pas sems can 'dul ba snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-3: chos sprin char 'bebs gsung gi 'brug sgra sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-4: rnam thar 'di ni ri rab blo gros kyi'o; ;sangs rgyas 'od ni dri med 'gro kun tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-5: don yod 'gro ba'i sgrib kun kun nas sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-6: sangs rgyas yon tan snang mdzad sgra yang 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-7: rnam thar mtha' yas tshul 'di dpa' sdes mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-8: bskal pa snga tshe thugs rje'i sgo mang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-9: 'gro kun phan bde'i don du rgyal bas bsgoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-10: 'byams klas sna tshogs thabs kyis sdug bsngal bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-11: de ni mtha' yas dge ba'i zer gyis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-12: rgyal ba'i sku ni mtha' yas kun tu rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-13: 'jig rten kun tu'ang byon dang bzhud mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-14: kun na'ang rang byung rnam par 'phrul ba snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-15: de ni lha dbang mtha' yas sgo yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-16: de la klu'i dbang po mig mi bzang gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-17: klu'i 'gro ba'i rgyur thams cad kyi 'bar ba zhi bar bya bas yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-18: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-19: sems skad cig gis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sems can dang klu rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i lus dang kha dog rab tu ston pa zhes bya'o /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-20: klu'i rgyal po sprin sgra sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40a-21: srid pa'i rgyud thams cad du ming gi 'khor lo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dge ba'i nga ror sgrog pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-0: @40b klu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba'i sgo rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dgod cing rnam par dbye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa yang dag par ston pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-3: klu'i rgyal po kun nas ri'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-4: 'gro ba thams cad la bsod nams rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i dga' ba'i shugs shin tu yangs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-5: klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-6: 'jigs pa'i sgra skad thams cad yongs su skem pa'i skyabs dri ma med pa zhes bya'o; ;klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas par 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-7: gzugs kyi sprin rgya chen po shin tu ston cing bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-8: klu'i rgyal po mdzod spu'i gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-9: sems can thams cad la dga' ba'i shugs yangs pa dang yang dag par mos pa rgya mtsho shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-10: klu'i rgyal po kun tu spyod pa rgya chen po'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-11: sgra thams cad 'byung ba la yang dag par gzhol zhing yid du 'ong bas thogs pa med par kun tu rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:40b-12: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-0: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la snying rje'i sgo kun nas sprin gyis 'gengs shing rab tu zhi ba @41a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-1: dang yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-2: de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus klu'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-3: rgyal ba kun gyi chos nyid de dag ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-4: drang srong chen po 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-5: mi bzad klu yi rgyud du lhung ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-6: byams pa'i stobs kyis rim gyis 'don pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-7: 'gro ba kun snyed gzugs kyi sgo rnams kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-8: rgyal bas spu gcig rtse la mngon par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-9: thams cad rdul la 'phrul gyis mngon par 'phrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-10: rgyal ba'i rnam thar rgya mtsho'i klu yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-11: rgyal ba de yi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-12: sangs rgyas mtshan kyang 'gro snyed rgya mtsho 'o; ;de dag sems can bsam pa ji bzhin nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-13: sprin sgra'i rgyal mtshan de 'dra'i rnam thar ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-14: khro ba rgya mtshor 'gro ba 'di dag kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-15: bsgribs shing g-yogs pa'ang khro ba'i rgya mtshor te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-16: de la rang byung byams dang thugs rjes 'dzin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-17: 'di ni 'od 'phro sgo yi klu yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-18: 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams mthu yi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-19: sangs rgyas spu gcig rtse la mngon par ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-20: bsod nams 'jug pa rgya mtsho kun kyang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41a-21: 'di ni ri sprin rgyal mtshan klu yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-0: 'jigs pa ches mnar sems can sdug @41b bsngal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-1: rgyal ba'i 'od chen shin tu yangs pas bskyabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-2: ba spu'i sgo nas yid 'ong sgra yang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-3: rnam thar 'di ni 'jog po klu yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-4: dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-5: sku ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-6: de bzhin bskal pa brgyud pa'i zhing mang yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-7: mtha' yas goms pa'i klu yis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-8: rgyal ba'i spu gcig rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas bkang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-9: zhing mang mtha' yas kun kyang der zhugs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-10: de na bzhugs par rgyal ba 'khor gyis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-11: rnam thar de ni 'od 'bar klu yi 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-12: ji snyed rgyal ba rgya mtsho mchod byas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-13: sngon gyi rgyal ba'i chos nyid rab mthong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-14: de la dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-15: shugs lam klu ni 'di la rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-16: rang byung gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-17: 'gro ba thams cad chos kyis ngoms par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-18: rgyal ba'i gsung ni zhi zhing dga' 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-19: de ni kun tu spyod pa'i klus thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-20: srid pa kun tu sdug bsngal gzir mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-21: nyon mongs las kyis 'khor zhing mgon med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-22: sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos rab tu 'grel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-23: rnam thar 'di ni ma dros klus mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-25: de la rgyal po chen po ngal bso po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:41b-26: dga' ba'i sgo rnam par lta ba'i yul gyi rgyud kyis phan par sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-1: po dbyangs chen dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-2: sgo thams cad la dbang byed pas rnam par lta zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-3: sems can phan par sbyor bas yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-4: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rtsal shin tu gtum pa'i mtshon cha'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-5: gtum pa dang drag shul gyi rgyud las srung ba kun nas mang po 'byung ba zhes bya'o; ;gnod sbyin gyi dbang po blo gros chen po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-6: 'phags pa'i yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la rnam par blta bas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-7: mos par sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-8: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po mig 'od 'phro ba'i bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-9: sems can thams cad la shes rab dang ye shes dang snying rjes rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-10: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po mig rdo rje lta brtan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-11: 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba sna tshogs su sbyor ba dang srung ba mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-12: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sde mchog dpa' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-13: chos thams cad kyi don gyi dbyings la yang dag par 'jug pa'i mthu zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42a-14: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sde'i rgyan chen pos rab tu gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-0: 'gro ba thams cad lam la dgod par gti mug med pas bsrung ba phun @42b sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-1: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dge ba'i tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-2: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par spel bas kun tu dga' ba myong ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-3: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po ri bo'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-4: sangs rgyas kyi stobs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rjes ye shes kyi 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-5: de nas rgyal po chen po ngal bso pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-7: lha dbang sems can ma rungs gang dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-8: bskal pa brgya mang sangs rgyas mi mthong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-9: srid pa dag na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-10: de dag yongs su dgrol bar sangs rgyas byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-11: sangs rgyas sems can phan dang bskyab pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-12: 'gro ba kun la mngon par kun na bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-13: nyam nga 'gro ba'i 'khor lo dag nas 'don //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-14: 'di la dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gnod sbyin 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-15: mi bzad las kyis bsgribs pa'i sems can la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-16: rgyal bas zhi ba'i tshul rnams shin tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-17: 'gro ba rnams la chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin; ;rnam thar 'di ni gtum pa'i mtshon chas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-18: rang byung bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:42b-19: rgyal ba'i yon tan phyogs bcu kun tu bsgrags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-2: 'di ni blo chen gnod sbyin bdag pos mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-3: rgyal ba'i shes rab mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-4: sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-5: de bas thams cad phyogs su rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-6: 'od 'phro mig gi bdag po'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-7: mi yi dbang po 'gro ba thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-8: yid 'ong dbyangs sgrog sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-9: phan don skyabs mdzad chos rnams shin tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-10: tshul 'di rdo rje'i mig legs rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-11: don dbyings rgya chen ji snyed de dag kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-12: rgya mtsho'i mdo tshul 'gro ba'i grangs snyed rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-13: mi yi dbang pos dbyangs gcig sgo nas bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-14: 'di ni blo gros dpa' bo'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-15: 'gro ba lam ngan gnas pa thams cad la; ;sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab las ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-16: snod du gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun na bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-17: 'di la slob pa sde yi rgyan yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-18: 'gro ba'i bsod nams rgyu ba ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-19: rgyal ba'i 'od la thams cad rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-20: sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-21: rnam thar 'di ni gnod sbyin nor bdag mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-22: rgyal ba'i stobs rnams gang du yongs dag ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-23: bder gshegs stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-24: sngon gyi bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab dran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43a-25: 'di ni ri bo'i stobs 'joms rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-0: de @43b la mi 'am ci'i dbang po lha'i blo gros 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-1: bya ba thams cad la yang dag par rdzogs par 'jug pas dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-2: mi 'am ci'i dbang po me tog dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-3: dga' ba thams cad kyi bde ba myong ba las bla na med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-4: mi 'am ci'i dbang po rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-5: yon tan thams cad kyis yang dag par ngoms pas mos pa rgya chen po sbyong ba'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-6: mi 'am ci'i dbang po nga ro yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-7: sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba la thogs pa med pas kun tu bsgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-8: mi 'am ci'i dbang po shing rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-9: snying rje'i rgyud la 'gro ba 'god cing sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul ba la dmigs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-10: mi 'am ci'i dbang po mthong na dga' zhing spro bar byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-11: gzugs kyi lus dge ba thams cad mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-12: mi'am ci'i dbang po rgyan gyi dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:43b-13: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i rgyan thams cad kyis mdangs rab tu bskyed pa'i rang bzhin gyis dga' ba'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-0: mi 'am ci'i dbang po me tog tshon bzang po'i rgyal mtshan @44a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-1: gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-2: 'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rigs la rnam par lta zhing yang dag par sgrub pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-3: mi 'am ci'i dbang pos gzhi'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-4: 'gro ba thams cad rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-5: mi 'am ci'i dbang po drag shul gyi bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-6: mi 'am ci'i 'khor thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta zhing 'dren pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-7: de nas mi 'am ci'i dbang po lha'i blo gros 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi 'am ci'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-8: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-9: ji snyed 'gro ba dag na bde 'byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-10: de dag thams cad rgyal ba mthong bas 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-11: mgon po de ni skyabs dang mgon yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-12: sems can thams cad gnas yin phan mdzad pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-13: sems can kun gyi mi zad bde ba'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-14: ji snyed 'byung ba rab tu yod pa kun; ;de dag kun la 'dren pa don yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-15: de ni dpal gyi dkyil 'khor mi cis thong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-16: sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho mi zad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-17: de yi mtha' ni 'gro bas mi rnyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-18: phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par mdzes shing 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-19: sna tshogs rgyan gyi rnam thar 'di 'dra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-20: sems can kun gyi yid du 'ong ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44a-21: sgra dbyangs sangs rgyas yang dag rnam sgrog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-0: @44b mya ngan med pa'i chos nyid ston pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-1: sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba'i mi cis thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-2: sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pas spyad pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-3: rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bdag gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-4: rgya chen thugs rjes rnam par shin tu sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-5: shing gi 'od kyi mi 'am ci yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing thos pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-7: 'gro ba rnams la bskal pa bye bar dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-8: sangs rgyas mtshan gyis kun nas shin tu brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-9: dga' bde mos par byed pas 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-10: bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-11: sems can kun gyi bsam pa zhal mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-13: 'di ni rgyan dbang mi 'am ci yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-14: 'byams klas las ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-15: de phyir sems can bde dang sdug bsngal kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-16: bde bar gshegs pas thams cad rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-17: me tog rgyal mtshan mi 'am ci yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-18: sangs rgyas gshegs thabs rnam par 'phrul pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-19: sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-20: sa rnams thams cad gcig tu 'dus par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-21: de ltar sa yi 'od kyi mi cis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-22: 'khor du rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-23: rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad ston mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-24: 'od zer 'khor gyis bskul ba'ang de bzhin mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:44b-25: 'di ni drag shul bdag po'i spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-0: de la lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po'i gzi brjid kyi rnam par @45a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-2: rdzu 'phrul gyi dbyings thams cad rab tu gnon pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-3: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po gzi brjid kyi dbyangs la rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-4: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par byang bas sim par byed cing yongs su sbyong ba 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-5: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros sna tshogs mchog gi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-6: sems can thams cad kyi rnam par dpyod pa dge ba la kun nas yang dag par gzhol bas mos par byed pa zhes bya'o; ;lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po mig bzang po'i bdag po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-7: chags pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-8: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po sgron ma'i skyabs kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-9: sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par ldog cing lam gyi phyogs yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-10: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po snang ba shugs bzang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-12: 'phags pa'i yon tan la 'jug pas dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45a-13: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po sengge'i phru gu'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-0: stobs dang brtson pa kha na ma tho ba med pas sems can @45b skyob pa'i bdag po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-1: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rgyan sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-2: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bde ba dang dga' ba mtha' yas pa rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-3: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po ri rab kyi bu'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-4: sgrib pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mi sgul ba'i pha rol tu 'gro zhing dga' ba kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya'o; ;lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'od yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-5: sems can gyi rgyud mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa nyid kyi lam gyi phyogs ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-6: de nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po'i gzi brjid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-7: sangs rgyas chos nyid rgya chen yangs la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-8: sems can kun gyi mdangs dang bde ba 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-9: nad med 'chi med lam yang shin tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-10: sdug bsngal thams cad rab zhi gnas kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-11: rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul chos nyid de yang ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-12: phyogs rnams kun tu mngon par rab tu 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-13: 'jig rten kun tu thub pa mngon par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-15: nyon mongs las kyi sgrib pas stug bsgribs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:45b-16: srid pa'i rgya mtsho gting ring nub pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-1: can rnams la zhi ba'i spyod yul ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-2: gzi brjid rdul med dbyangs kyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-3: sangs rgyas ye shes mnyam med bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-4: 'gro ba'i bsam pa ma lus thugs su chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-5: de dag kun la rnam dag chos nyid ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-6: lto 'phye chen po sna tshogs gtsug phud 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-7: bsam gyis mi khyab bsod nams rgya mtsho'i dbyings /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-8: mtha' yas yang dag 'byung ba rgyal bas gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bsod nams zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-10: mig bzang bdag po lto 'phye chen pos mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-11: sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'jigs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-12: ji snyed de dag rgyal bas kun nas bskyabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-13: rgyal ba chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-14: de ni sgron ma skyabs kyi spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-15: sangs rgyas ba spu re re'i yon tan yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-16: 'jig rten kun gyis shes par mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-17: mgon po rnams ni mi zad nam mkha' bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-18: 'di ni shugs kyi rgyal mtshan rnam par mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-19: thams cad chos dang stobs kyi mthar phyin pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-20: sangs rgyas ri bo lta bur bskyod mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-21: de yi chos nyid rgyal ba rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-22: sengge'i phrug pa dpal ni 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-23: rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam thar la dga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-24: bskal pa snga tshe rgya cher spel bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-25: de phyir 'gro ba kun bltas yid du 'ong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46a-26: sna tshogs sgra dbyangs rnam thar 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-0: rgyal bas pha rol phyin pa @46b rgya mtsho rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-1: yongs bskangs chos dbyings sku dang spyod yul med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-2: 'jig rten thams cad skyabs gyur sgron ma ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-3: ri rab bu ni tshul bzang 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-4: de la nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mthu stobs chen po'i shugs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-5: thogs pa med pa'i mig la sgrib pa med pas sems can gyi khams rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-6: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mi shigs pa'i sems rin chen gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-7: phyogs bcu'i sems can yongs su smin par bya bas chos kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-8: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs dri ma med pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-9: sgo kun nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-10: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shugs kyi mthus 'jug pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-12: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chos bstan pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-13: sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes rab tu phye ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-14: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po cod pan sna tshogs dpal gyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:46b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi grong khyer rab tu brgyan pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-0: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gzhi kun tu khyab @47a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-1: bar ston pa'i shugs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-2: stobs kun nas yang dag par sgrub pas thub pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-3: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dge ba rgya mtsho kun nas lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-4: sems can gyi ris thams cad rnam par sgom pa'i tshul mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-5: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po klu'i sgra yangs pa kun tu lta ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-6: sems can mtha' yas pa skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-7: 'chi 'pho ba shes pa'i ye shes la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-8: de nas nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mthu stobs chen po'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dab ma bzang po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-9: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus dbyings bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-10: 'jig rten mgon po rgya chen spyan gyis gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-11: sems can 'dul ba de la tshad kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-12: rang byung rnam thar rgya chen shin tu yangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-13: 'jig rten mgon gyi 'phrul stobs chags pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-14: phyogs bcu'i snying po byang chub kun na bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-15: rgyal ba'i mdo sde sprin rnams thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-16: rin chen sna tshogs gtsug phud mkha' lding nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47a-17: sngon gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-0: pha rol phyin pa rgya chen byang ba @47b mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-1: sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yang dag byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-2: 'dab ma bzang po shugs bzang de brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-3: skad cig sems la byang chub spyod mtha' yas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-4: thams cad rgyal ba'i spu rtse kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-5: rgyal ba'i spyod yul tshad med ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-6: de ni rgyan bzang nam mkha' lding gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-7: rgyal ba'i spyod yul yangs pa bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-8: 'gro ba kun gyis bsam par sla ba min; ;ye shes yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-9: rnam thar 'di ni mkha' lding 'gro 'dzin gyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mtha' yas 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-11: 'gro ba'i gti mug dra ba ma lus sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-12: rgyal ba 'jig rten thams cad kun gyi mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-13: de 'dra chos brtan 'dzin pa'i 'dab bzang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-14: chos kyi grong khyer mi zad thams cad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-15: sangs rgyas rgya chen 'jig rten kun tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-16: mtha' yas chos kyi sgo mo du ma nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-17: 'dab bzang sna tshogs gtsug phud 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-18: thams cad stobs la rang byung rab tu bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-19: rgyal ba kun dang sku gcig chos kyi sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-20: de bzhin nyid dngos rnam par rtog mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-21: kun tu rgyu ba'i 'dab bzang 'di brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-22: rgyal ba'i 'od zer 'jig rten kun bkye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-23: sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can khams kyang 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-24: srid pa snga tshe bsdus pa rnam par spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-25: rnam thar 'di ni mig bzang dam pa'i'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:47b-26: dri med rgya mtsho'i las la gnas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-2: de dag kun tu rgyal bas chos char 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-3: rgya mtsho rgyu ba'i mkha' lding 'di ltar lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-4: de la lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-5: dbang chen pos shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-6: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-7: sgo kun nas byin gyis rlob pa rnam par gzhog pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-8: lha ma yin dbang po bde ba'i mchog gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-9: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa rdul med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-10: lha ma yin gyi dbang po mtshon cha chen po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-11: brtul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad la gnas pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-12: lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-13: phyogs bcu rab tu bsgul ba'i yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-14: lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-15: 'jig rten thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-16: lha ma yin gyi dbang po rdo rje sra ba sna tshogs kyi yan lag gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-0: lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs rgya chen po'i rgyu'i blo @48b gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-1: snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'i stobs la gti mug med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-2: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dpal gyi be'u rab tu 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyong zhing sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-4: lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtul zhugs bzang po'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-5: 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'khor lo la yang dag par 'jug cing gti mug med pa la yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-6: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha ma yin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-7: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-8: phyogs rnams rgya che de dag thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-9: rgyal ba'i zil gyis 'byams klas 'khor kyang gnon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-10: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kun tu 'od 'phro ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-11: thams cad sgo nas 'gro bar mngon par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-12: skad cig sems kyis bskal pa brgya mang gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-13: sangs rgyas yul rnams ma lus thams cad ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-14: 'dul ba kun la 'od rnams rab tu 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-15: rnam thar de ni thag bzang ris kyis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-16: sangs rgyas spyod yul gzhal med bdag gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-17: sna tshogs sgo nas sems can don kyang mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-18: sdug bsngal thams cad bder gshegs zhir mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:48b-19: rnam thar 'di la bde ba'i mchog 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-2: dge ba rgyal bas bskal pa brgyar spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-3: de phyir rgyal ba'i ye shes kun tu sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-4: dra ba bzang pos sangs rgyas 'di ltar brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-5: zhing dbyings thams cad rgyal ba g-yo bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-6: 'jigs pa mi ston skrag pa yod ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-7: bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul chags med gzhal du med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-8: lha min dbang po stobs can de ltar ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-9: sangs rgyas skye ba bde bar 'byung ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-10: 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-11: thams cad mkhyen gyi ye shes phyogs kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-12: rnam par snang ba 'di ni rab tu brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-13: 'gro ba'i bsod nams rgya chen dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-15: rgyal ba'i mthu yis de dag byung ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-16: thar pa'i phyogs kyi lam yang rgyal ba ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-17: chos dpal 'di mthong 'di la rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-18: bder gshegs thugs rje'i sku ni mnyam pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-19: chags med spyod pa thams cad kun tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-20: 'gro ba thams cad mig yor mtshan nyid de; ;rgyu yi blo gros sangs rgyas yon tan brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-21: sangs rgyas yul na ngo mtshar mnyam pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-22: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings kyi klong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-23: byang chub shing drung kun na rab tu bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-24: dpal gyi be'u lha min bdag pos mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-25: 'gro ba kun gyi 'khor lo dbyings dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49a-26: sngon chad bder gshegs spyod pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-0: 'gro ba'i sdug @49b bsngal ma lus rab tu bkrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-1: de ltar lha min dbyangs snyan rab tu brjod //
