K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-2: de la nyin mo'i lha khyim dang gzhal med khang gi gzugs shin tu ston pa'i rnam par thar ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-3: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyud la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-4: nyin mo'i lha brtsam pa'i blo gros mtshams sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-5: sems can gyi don thams cad yongs su rgyas par bya bas shin tu tshim par bya ba la rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-6: nyin mo'i lha kun nas dga' ba'i dpal gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-7: dga' ba dang mgu ba mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-8: nyin mo'i lha me tog dang spos yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-9: sems can mtha' yas pa'i mos pa yang dag par rgyas pa la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-10: nyin mo'i lha kun nas yid du 'ong ba'i sman ston pa sgrub pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-11: kun tu 'od kyi stobs yang dag par sgrub pa rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-12: nyin mo'i lha lhag pa'i mig bzang pos tshim par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-13: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal chos kyi dga' bas snang bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-14: nyin mo'i lha tshul rgya chen po'i phyogs kun nas byung ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:49b-15: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tha mi dad pa'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-1: snying rje rgya chen po'i gzi brjid kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-2: sems can thams cad la bde ba yang dag par ston cing skyob pa'i stobs la shin tu brtson pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-3: nyin mo'i lha snang ba rgya chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi 'bral ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-4: mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' ba'i yon tan kun nas rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-5: nyin mo'i lha me tog gi phreng ba kun nas 'phyang ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-6: 'gro bas mthong na don yod pa'i grags pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o; ;de nas nyin mo'i lha khyim dang gzhal med khang gi gzugs shin tu ston pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus nyin mo'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-7: sems can kun gyi spyod pa rgyal bas mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-8: rgyal ba dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-9: rgyal ba'i ye shes mi zad nam mkha' bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-10: rgyal ba'i 'od kyis phyogs rgyas shin tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-11: 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs chud nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-12: don gyi tshig rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang; ;rnam phye rgya chen tshig gis rgyal ba gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-13: phun sum tshogs pa'i blo gros lha yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50a-14: rgyal ba'i 'od kyis sems can kun dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-0: rgyal ba mthong thos don @50b du 'gyur ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-1: go 'phang dam pa rgya chen zhi ba ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-2: dpal gyi 'od ni de yis rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-3: sangs rgyas mthong bas 'gro ba rgya chen gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-4: dga' ba tshad med dge chos kun kyang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-5: chos sprin gzhal med rgyal ba char 'bebs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-6: de la me tog brgyan pa'i lha dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-7: chos kyi dkyil 'khor stobs la 'jug pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-8: sems can bsdu ba'i sgo la rnam dpyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-9: rab yangs spyad pa spyod tshe rgyal bas sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-10: 'di ni yid 'ong 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-11: rgyal ba mthong zhing thos pa don med min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-12: dga' dang bde ba spro ba yangs pa skyed; ;'byams klas thabs rnams kun gyis sems can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-13: des ni mig bzang de yi dga' skyed byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-14: chos dbyings 'byams klas phyogs su rab 'jug pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-15: 'gro bar stobs bcus ma lus bstan mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-16: bder gshegs dngos yod ma yin dngos med min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-17: 'phags pa'i dpal gyi nyin mo'i lha yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-18: sems can mi bde thibs por nub pa rnams; ;gzigs nas rgyal ba 'jig rten mchod pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-19: sdug bsngal rgyu rnams thams cad rgyal bas bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-20: 'di la snying rje'i gzi brjid lha 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-21: 'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs las bsgribs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-22: dga' ba 'byung ba'i bde ba rgyal ba gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-23: chos kyi dga' ba rab kyis sdug bsngal 'jil //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:50b-24: bsod nams shugs ni rnam thar 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-1: 'dra rgyal ba'i bsod nams dkyil 'khor rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-2: 'jig rten dge bas gtso bo mchog byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-3: chos rnams kun la bder gshegs 'khrul mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-4: me tog phreng gi rnam thar 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-5: de la mtshan mo'i lha dpal dri ma med cing kun nas zab pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-6: bsam gtan rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba kun nas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-7: mtshan mo'i lha kun nas skyob pa'i mdangs kyi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-8: snang ba 'jig rten thams cad la mngon du lta zhing 'gro ba 'dul ba ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-9: mtshan mo'i lha rab tu dga' ba'i mig gis 'gro ba la rnam par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-10: kun nas dga' ba rgya chen po dri ma med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-11: mtshan mo'i lha sgras zhi ba rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-12: dga' ba yangs pa 'byung ba'i sems kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-13: mtshan mo'i lha mtshan mo thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-14: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra zab mos rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-15: mtshan mo'i lha shing thams cad rab tu rgyas par byed pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51a-16: dga' ba dang smon lam dang mos pa rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-0: mtshan mo'i lha kun nas skyong zhing srung ba'i dpal gyi rnam @51b par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-1: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-2: mtshan mo'i lha dge ba thams cad kyis dga' bar rtse ba la dbang bsgyur ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-3: byams pa mtha' yas pas 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-4: mtshan mo'i lha mdud par 'dzin pa thams cad zhi bar bya bas dbang po rab tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-5: snying rje'i sgo nas char 'bebs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-6: mtshan mo'i lha dge ba'i bsod nams 'byung ba'i dpal ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-7: 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya bas kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-8: de nas mtshan mo'i lha dpal dri ma med cing kun nas zab pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mtshan mo'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-9: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-10: sangs rgyas spyod yul shin tu yangs la ltos; ;stong pa zhi ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-11: dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-12: rgyal ba dri med phyogs su rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-13: thub pa 'jig rten kun blta dka' ba ste; ;bskal pa rgya mtsho dag na bar 'ga' snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-14: thugs rjes kun tu rgyas byas mgon po byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-15: 'gro ba lta ba'i lha yis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:51b-16: 'dren pa 'gro ba'i skyabs su gyur pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-0: @52a *// 'gro ba dag ni mngon du kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-1: lam gyi rgyud ni thams cad rnam par sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-2: skyob pa'i mdangs kyi dpal ni 'di la sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-3: dga' ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-4: rab tu yangs pa sngon chad bsgoms pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-5: de phyir rgyal ba 'jig rten blta na mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-6: zhi dbyangs mtshan mo'i lhas ni 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-7: sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-8: phyogs rnams bkang zhing zhi ba'i 'brug sgra sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-9: sems can bsam pa rgya chen rnam par spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-10: mtshan mo 'byung ba'i dpal ni 'di la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i bsod nams skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-12: bsod nams dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-13: dri med zhi ba'i sa yang ston mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-14: 'di la rgyas pa'i 'od ni rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-15: sangs rgyas 'phrul gyis phyogs rnams rab bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-16: sems can thams cad rnam par 'dul ba ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-17: thams cad gzugs su sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-18: mtshan mo'i lha ni dpal gyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-19: 'dren pas sems kyi skad cig kun la snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-20: byams pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams rnam sbyangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-21: 'jig rten thams cad ma lus rgyas par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-22: bsod nams brtse ba mtshan mo'i lhas mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52a-23: sems can gti mug things pos 'khrugs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-0: gtum sems 'khon @52b 'dzin dam pos bsgrigs gzigs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-1: thugs rje bskyed nas rgyal ba byung bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-2: 'khon 'dzin zhi ba mtshan mo'i lha dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-3: sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-4: mgon po sngon chad spyod pa spyad pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-5: de phyir rgyal ba yon tan mtshan rgyas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-6: bsod nams lta ba'i bdag po'i spyod yul yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-7: de la phyogs kyi lha phyogs kyi dbyings na rab tu gnas shing kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-8: kun tu skyob pas 'gro ba'i rgyan byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-9: phyogs kyi lha mnyam pa nyid la mngon du lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-10: dgos pa thams cad dang rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs kyi 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-11: phyogs kyi lha snang ba spyod pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-12: chags pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snang bas dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-13: phyogs kyi lha kun tu rgyu zhing rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-14: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran pa don yod pa ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-15: phyogs kyi lha rmongs pa byed pa'i gtsug yongs su grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-16: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ming gi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la rnam par lta ba'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:52b-17: phyogs kyi lha nam mkha'i rgyud kun tu spyod pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-0: sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba thams @53a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-1: cad myong bar byed pas dga' ba rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-2: phyogs kyi lha rnam par dpyod pa'i sprin rgya chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-3: klu'i sprin 'byung ba dka' ba sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-4: phyogs kyi lha mig tha dad pa med pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-5: 'gro ba thams cad kyi las tha dad pa med pa la yang dag par lta ba'i bdag po'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-6: phyogs kyi lha 'jig rten gyi bya ba kun nas spyod pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-8: las rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-9: phyogs kyi lha phyogs su rnam par lta ba'i phreng ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-10: sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin par bya bas rab tu dga' ba rtsom pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-11: de nas phyogs kyi lha phyogs kyi dbyings na rab tu gnas shing kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-12: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-13: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin bya'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-14: sangs rgyas rang byung 'jig rten spyod pa byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-15: thams cad mkhyen par yongs su smin bya'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-16: chos kyi phyogs la rab tu 'jug pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53a-17: rdzu 'phrul stobs ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-0: rnam pa du ma @53b sems can bsam pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-1: rgyal ba mthong bas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal 'grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-2: kun tu mngon par lta ba'i spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-3: sems can rgya mtsho mun pas bsgribs pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-4: sangs rgyas chos kyi sgron ma snang ba ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-5: rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas 'od kyang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-6: snang ba spyod pa rnam thar 'di la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-7: chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-8: sems can nyon mongs zhi mdzad thogs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-9: dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-10: kun nas 'khyil ba'i dpal gyis rab tu 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-11: 'gro ba'i ming gi 'khor lo ji snyed pa; ;sangs rgyas mtshan gyis de dag thams cad 'thon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-12: sems can rnams kyi gti mug rnam par zlog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-13: 'di ni gti mug rnam dag spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-14: sangs rgyas mngon sum sems can gang 'gro ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-15: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas gsung snyan nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-16: dga' ba rgya chen shin tu yangs pa 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-17: 'di ni nam mkha'i rgyud kyi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-18: skad cig sems rgyud kun la tshad med pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-19: chos kyi sprin char rgyal ba 'bebs pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-20: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'jil //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-21: 'di la sprin gyi rgyal mtshan lha 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-22: sems can kun gyi rgya mtsho'i las rnams kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-23: sangs rgyas rnam pa gzhan min yang dag ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-24: sems can nyon mongs las las rab tu bkrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:53b-25: 'jig rten bya ba spyod bdag spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-1: rgyas sngon chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-2: sems can don du thugs rje rab bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-3: pha rol phyin pa thams cad rgyas par bkang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-4: sna tshogs phreng ba'i 'od ni 'di la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-5: phyogs rnams sems can rgyal bas snang mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-6: bsam pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-7: de dag mtha' yas phyogs kyi chos 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-8: mig bzang gtsug phud tshul 'dir rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-9: de la nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-10: 'gro ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-11: nam mkha'i lha mtha' yas shing zab pa kun tu rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-12: chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-13: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zab mo la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-14: nam mkha'i lha rlung kun nas 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-15: yul mtha' yas pa rnam par sgom pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lus zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-16: nam mkha'i lha sgrib pa thams cad dang mi gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-17: sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54a-18: nam mkha'i lha rgya chen po kun tu gnon pa sna tshogs kyi gtsug bud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-0: 'gro ba rgya mtsho rgya chen po la rnam par lta zhing @54b rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-1: nam mkha'i lha 'od zer snang ba'i 'od thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-2: 'gro ba log par lhung ba thams cad snying rje'i 'od kyis skyob pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-3: nam mkha'i lha stobs kyi rgyun thogs pa med pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-4: bsod nams thams cad kyi stobs dang dga' ba bsdu ba la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya'o; ;nam mkha'i lha phyogs dri ma med par snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-5: sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i sems kyis sgrib pa rnam par zlog par gnas pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-6: nam mkha'i lha dbyangs shin tu 'phags shing zab pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-7: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od rab tu 'phags pas phyogs kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-8: nam mkha'i lha phyogs bcur mngon du ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-9: sgo thams cad nas phyogs thams cad du 'pho ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-10: de nas nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus nam mkha'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-11: rgyal ba'i spyan ni rgya chen yangs pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-12: sems can rgya mtsho ma lus kun gzigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:54b-13: 'gro ba kun la mngon par rab tu bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-0: @55a *// sangs rgyas dri med nam mkha' rab tu 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-1: sangs rgyas sku yi rgya chen 'od kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-2: phyogs bcu'i 'gro kun khyab cing rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-3: thams cad phyogs su mngon par rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-4: kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-5: rgyal ba nam mkha'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-6: 'di la gzung ba snang ba gang yang med; ;thogs pa med cing rang bzhin med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-7: rlung gi 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-8: bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya phrag mang por yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-9: sangs rgyas sems can sgrib pa sel bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-10: lam yangs rnam par thar pa rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-12: sngon chad sangs rgyas byang chub spyod pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-13: 'gro ba kun la phan dang bde don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-14: ji ltar byung ba de dag bdag gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-15: 'di ni sna tshogs gtsug phud spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-16: 'khor ba rgya mtsho kun tu rgyu ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-17: sems can log par lhung zhing 'khor ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-18: sangs rgyas 'od ni sdug bsngal zhi ba'i rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-19: snang ba'i 'od kyis rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-20: bsod nams dge ba thams cad snying po ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-21: chags med stobs dang ye shes rgya chen mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-22: 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams zhing gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55a-23: sangs rgyas de ltar chags med stobs sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-0: mun pa stug @55b po'i spyod yul rnam rgyu ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-1: sems can sgrib pas rab tu blong ba la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba rab 'gyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-3: dri med phyogs snang lhas ni de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-4: sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu 'phags pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-5: mtha' dang dbus yang dmigs par mi rung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-6: zhing kun 'gro la mngon par 'od kyang snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-7: zab mo'i 'od kyis de ltar sangs rgyas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-8: phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun na spyod pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-9: sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-10: sangs rgyas smon lam rgya chen shin tu yangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-11: mngon par lta bas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-12: de la rlung gi phung po'i lha chags pa med par 'gro ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-13: 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos su yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-14: rlung gi lha kun tu rgyas par 'byung ba'i mthu'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-15: sangs rgyas mchod pa'i yul mtha' yas pa rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-16: rlung gi lha kun tu reg par byed pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-17: sems can thams cad kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-18: rlung gi lha rgyan yid du 'ong zhing bzang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:55b-19: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri 'joms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-0: rlung gi lha chu drag po'i snying @56a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-1: po skem pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-2: bdud kyi 'khor lo sgo kun nas 'joms pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-3: rlung gi lha sgra chen pos 'gro ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-4: sems can mtha' yas pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par zlog cing zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-5: rlung gi lha shing gi rtse mo'i me tog rab tu 'phyang ba'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-6: chos thams cad kyi tshul tha dad pa med par yang dag par shes pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-7: rlung gi lha thogs pa med par phyogs kun tu rgyas par 'gro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-8: 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par dgod pa'i tshul gyis 'dul ba'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-9: rlung gi lha rlung gi phung po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-10: bsam gtan gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i shugs kyis gti mug rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-11: rlung gi lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi mun pa kun nas snang bar byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-12: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su bsnyegs pas thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-13: de nas rlung gi lha chags pa med par 'gro ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus rlung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56a-14: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-0: rgyal ba @56b kun gyi chos nyid zab mo 'dzin pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-1: chags med thams cad tshul gyis de la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-2: 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-3: de ni mtshan med gzugs brnyan yod pa min; ;sangs rgyas thams cad mthu la rnam par ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-4: byang chub spyad pa mtha' yas spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-5: skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas mchod cing bstod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-6: de la rgyas byed 'od kyi lha 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-7: sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab 'gro ba'i mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-8: tshul rnams kun gyis sbyor ba chud za med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-9: sdug bsngal kun las sems can ma lus skyob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-10: rgyal mtshan reg pas rnam thar 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-11: 'gebs dang sgrib pa shin tu stug po yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-12: mi bdes bsgribs shing bsod nams med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-13: sems can sdug bsngal kun las ma lus bkrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-14: rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhas ni 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-15: rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-16: rnam pa kun gyis bdud rnams shin tu 'joms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-17: tshul gyis 'dul ba de la rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-18: gzi brjid drag po'i mthus ni 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-19: rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo rnams thams cad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-20: 'gro ba kun 'gengs sgra yi dbyangs 'byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-21: de dag sdug bsngal 'jigs pa thams cad med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-22: 'di ni sgra sgrog lha yis rab tu shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-23: 'gro ba kun mnyam rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:56b-24: so so yang dag rig pas bder gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-2: shing gi gtsug phud 'phyang ba de la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-3: rgyal ba'i ye shes thabs rnams kun sgo nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-4: kun tu chags shing thogs pa med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-5: spyod yul gzhal yas kun tu mtha' yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-6: 'di ni chags med 'gro ba'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-7: rgyal ba'i spyod yul mtha' yas dag la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-8: rab zhi sku mnga' mtshan med sangs rgyas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-9: thabs sgo kun nas 'on kyang rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-10: phung po sna tshogs bdag po'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-11: mi mgon bskal pa mtha' yas spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-12: de 'dra'i chos kyis 'gro kun tshim mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-13: thams cad stobs la sangs rgyas rab tu bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-14: 'jig rten stobs 'dzin lha yis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-15: de la me'i lha gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-16: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dba' rlabs thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-17: mun pa thams cad dang mi gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-18: me'i lha kun tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-19: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dba' rlabs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-20: rab tu gdung ba rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-21: me'i lha 'od rgya chen pos phyogs rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57a-22: bsod nams kyi stobs mi sgul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-0: snying rje ba dang byams pa'i @57b snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-1: me'i lha rgyal mtshan gya rdul gyi sgos rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-2: nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyis g-yog pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-3: me'i lha gzi brjid mi zad pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-4: nam mkha' mtha' yas pa snang bas gsal bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-5: me'i lha dka' thub sna tshogs kyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-6: dge ba dang bsod nams sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i 'od rab tu zhi ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-7: me'i lha phyogs khyim du gyur pa'i ri rab kyi spo'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-8: 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad me ltar 'bar ba'i sems can gyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-9: me'i lha 'od drag shul can gyi dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-10: 'jig rten thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i rtsom pas rab tu gnon pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-11: me'i lha mun pa dang rab rib sel cing phyogs rnam par snang bar byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-12: chags par lta ba'i gti mug thams cad rnam par spong ba'i 'od snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-13: me'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:57b-14: chags pa thams cad la mi gnas pa'i stobs 'byung ba yang dag par sgrub pa'i nga ro zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-0: de nas me'i lha gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus me'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams @58a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-1: cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-2: rgyal ba'i brtson 'grus stobs la rnam par ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-3: bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-4: 'gro ba'i don du phan pa rab brtsams te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-5: sems can kun gyi mun pa rnam par bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-6: nyon mongs dba' rlabs ldan pa'i 'gro ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-7: lta la gnas shing gti mug bsgribs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-8: nyon mongs me ni mgon pos zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-9: de la rgyal mtshan dkyil 'khor rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-10: rgyal ba'i spyod yul rgya chen bdag gis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-11: phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa rgya mtshor yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-12: rgyal ba'i byin gyis brlabs rnams rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-13: mthong nas snang ba'i 'od ni rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-14: rgyal ba'i bsod nam mi zad nam mkha' bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-15: de yi mtha' ni kun tu mi rnyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-16: rgyal ba'i thugs rje bskyed du yong mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-17: 'di la dpal gyi sprin sgra rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-18: bskal pa bye bar spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-19: chos tshul gang rnams bstan pa de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-20: mtha' ni nam yang rnyed par sla ba min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-21: rnam thar 'di ni gzi brjid gtsug phud kyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-22: phyogs bcu'i 'khor rnams shin tu yangs pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-23: sangs rgyas mgon po thams cad mngon du lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58a-24: 'gro ba kun la thub pa rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-1: 'gro ba kun na thub pa rab tu 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-2: khang khyim thams cad dag na bzhugs par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-3: rnam par yangs pa'i chos kyi char yang 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-4: 'di ni phyogs snang byed pa'i spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-5: rgyal ba nyid kyi chos rnams zab pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-6: thams cad chos kyi 'gro bar rang byung zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-7: ngo bo nyid kyi chos nyid ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-8: de la drag shul 'od ni rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-9: lta ba'i mun nag gti mug bsgribs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-10: 'jig rten bag med 'khrugs pa thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-11: rgyal bas chos ni rab tu bstan mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-12: de la rnam par snang ba'i lha dga' 'o; ;rgyal ba'i smon lam sngon chad byung ba'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-13: ci 'dra bsam gyis khyab par mi rung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-14: stobs dang pha rol phyin pas rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-16: de la chu'i lha sprin dang na bun kun tu grub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-17: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-18: chu'i lha sprin sgra'i shugs rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-19: chos kyi sprin mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-20: chu'i lha chu sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-21: 'gro ba snod du gyur pa thams cad la rnam par lta zhing sdud pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:58b-22: chu'i lha bzang por 'khyil ba grub pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-0: sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo'i @59a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-1: 'od kyi char pa'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-2: chu'i lha kun nas spos dri ma med pa'i myu gu'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-3: sangs rgyas kyi 'od dri ma med pa rnam par lta ba la yang dag par 'jug pa'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-4: chu'i lha dpa' rlabs kyi sgra bsod nams stegs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-5: chos kyi dbyings mtshan nyid med cing dri ma med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-6: chu'i lha tshim par bya ba la dbang byed pa yongs su sgrub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-7: snying rje rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya'o /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-8: ;chu'i lha sa'i rdul snyed kyi sgo nas dbyangs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-11: chu'i lha 'od kun tu 'gro zhing rgyas par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-12: bsod nams chags pa med pa shin tu rgyas pas kun tu snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59a-13: chu'i lha rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyi nga ro'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-0: 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i sbyor ba nam mkha' lta bus 'dul bar spyod pa zhes bya'o; ;de nas chu'i lha sprin dang na bun kun tu grub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus chu'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i @59b tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-1: rgyal ba'i mtshan rnams re re thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-2: sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-3: byams pa mngon du gyur pas byung ba bzang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-4: sems can kun gyis blta zhing mi ngoms so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-5: 'gro ba kun tu rgyal ba rnams drung du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-6: skyo ba med par spyad cing rnam sbyangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-7: rnam pa sna tshogs chos kyi sgo yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-8: rgya mtsho'i shugs ni 'di yi tshul la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-9: rgyal ba rnams ni 'pho bar mi snang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-10: phyogs rnams bcu nas byon par snang ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-11: snod kyi tshul bzhin sems can rnams kyang lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-12: chu yi gtsug phud dkyil 'khor de la lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni gzhal du med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-14: sems can kun gyis bsam par mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-15: phyogs rnams kun tu khyab par sgra sgrog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-16: 'di ni snyan pa'i gtsug phud yul yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-17: sangs rgyas 'od ni mi zad gnas pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-18: bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dbyings kyis klas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-19: sems can thams cad 'dul ba rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-20: spos kyi phung po sna tshogs lha yis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' mnyam pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-22: phyogs rnams kun tu dri med mtshan nyid med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-23: phyogs rnams kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-24: dba' rlabs sgra yi bsod nams 'od kyis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-25: snying rje'i sgo ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:59b-26: sems can kun dang mnyam par sngon bshad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-0: sprin dang 'dra bar 'gro ba mngon sum @60a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-1: mo; ;de ltar de ni dga' ba 'byung bas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-2: phyogs rnams bcu na zhing rnams gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-3: de dag kun na sangs rgyas gdan bzhugs snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-4: shin tu rgyas pa'i byang chub mngon sangs rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-5: dga' ba rdul med dbyangs kyis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-6: sangs rgyas spyod yul chags pa med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-7: shin tu rgya che phyogs rnams kun tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-8: rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal ba ston mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-9: de la 'phro ba'i 'od kyi lha 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-10: sbyor ba'i spyod pa rnams la mtha' med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-11: 'gro ba kun dbyangs thub pa med par 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-12: rgyal ba'i byin gyi rlabs ni 'di 'dra ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-13: nga ros 'gengs pa rnam thar 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-15: de la rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni; 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho rin po che 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-16: rgya mtsho'i lha rdo rje kun nas sra zhing mi choms pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad srung ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-18: rgya mtsho'i lha rdul dang dri ma med pa'i gnas dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-19: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho mang po rnam par sel ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-20: rgya mtsho'i lha kun nas chu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60a-22: khyim gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-0: 'gro ba thams cad kyi @60b ngan song dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-1: ngan 'gro'i lam rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-2: rgya mtsho'i lha skyabs rin po che mig gi zla ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-3: shugs chen pos gti mug rnam par sel ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-4: rgya mtsho'i lha klu'i dpal padmo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-5: rgyud thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-6: bde ba 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-7: rgya mtsho'i lha chu lta bur ro mthun pa 'dzin pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-8: sems can thams cad kyi lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-9: rmongs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-10: rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i me tog gi tshon gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-11: rin po che'i rigs thams cad 'byung zhing byang chub kyi sems rab tu skye ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-12: rgya mtsho'i lha ri rab sra ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-13: sems rgya mtsho mi sgul ba'i bsod nams la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-14: rgya mtsho'i lha 'brug sgra sgrog pa rgya mtsho'i shugs kyi dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'jug pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:60b-16: de nas rgya mtsho'i lha rin po che'i 'od 'byung ba'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgya mtsho'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-0: @61a *// bskal pa rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-1: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rgya chen mang mchod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-2: 'gro ba dag la bsod nams mtshos spel bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-3: de phyir rgyal ba lham me lhang nge 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-4: 'gro ba kun tu rgyal ba mngon par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-5: sems can kun gyi dbang po bsam rgyud du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-6: chos kyi rgya mtsho rgya chen ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-7: rdo rje sems dpa' sra ba'i dpal dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-8: 'gro ba kun tu 'jig rten mgon po ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-9: chos kyi sprin las char chen yangs pa 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-10: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zhi mdzad zad mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-11: rdul dang dri med 'di yi mtshan la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-12: sems can thams cad mnyam med nyon mongs bsgribs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-13: lam rgyud rgya mtsho'i sdug bsngal nang na 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-14: de dag la ni rgyal ba'i yul ston te; ;dpal bcu'i lha ni 'di la rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-15: bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po bsam yas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-16: rgyal bas spyod pa mi zad rnams spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-17: 'gro ba'i gti mug dkyil 'khor rnam par bzlog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-18: rin chen zla ba'i dpal ni 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-19: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sdug bsngal chen po na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-20: sems can 'khor zhing mi bde kun gzigs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-21: rgyal bas bla na med pa'i lam yang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-22: klu dpal padmo gtsug phud 'di la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-23: sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61a-24: chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-0: @61b 'gro ba'i gti mug dra ba rnam par sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-1: de skad chu 'dzin shugs ni smra zhing brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-2: sangs rgyas dra med bsam gyis mi khyab can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-3: 'jig rten kun gyi yul du rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-4: spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-5: sna tshogs dpal gyi me tog spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-6: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad rgya che ba'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-7: 'byams klas thugs kyi skad cig gcig gis btul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-8: rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab mi g-yo ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-9: rdo rje rdul 'dzin tshul ni 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-10: chos kyi dbyings ni 'byams klas kun bkang zhang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-11: phyogs bcu rnams su rgyal ba'i gsung yang grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-12: sangs rgyas spyod yul ting nge 'dzin las skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-14: de la chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-15: chos kyi chu bo mtha' med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-16: chu klung gi lha ri dang chu kun la brten pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-17: nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-18: chu klung gi lha rdul thams cad dri ma med par rnam par dag pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-19: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang 'grogs pa'i snying rje'i tshul gyis kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:61b-20: chu klung gi lha nga ros khyab par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-0: sems can thams cad kyi sgra yid du mi @62a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-1: 'ong ba zlog cing phan pa skyed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-2: chu klung gi lha srog chags kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa skyob pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-3: sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba med pa'i byams pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-4: chu klung gi lha gdung ba med pa rgya mtsho gdung ba med pa'i 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gdung bar mi nus pa'i sgo kun nas ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-6: chu klung gi lha dga' bde kun nas 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-7: sems can thams cad kyi 'jungs pa sel cing gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-8: chu klung gi lha yon tan gyi shugs yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-9: thams cad tshim par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-10: chu klung gi lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-11: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par byang bar byed cing 'khon du 'dzin pa dam po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-12: khro ba'i shugs dang bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-13: chu klung gi lha tshogs chen po rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-14: 'gro ba thams cad bde ba phun sum tshogs pa myong bar byed cing thar pa rgya mtsho la 'dzud pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62a-15: de nas chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-0: @62b sangs rgyas kyi mthus chu klung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-1: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-2: chos rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-3: sngon chad rgyal bas sems can don du sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-4: 'jig rten bkang zhing nyon mongs gdungs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-5: sprin chen char bzhin rab tu zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-6: bskal pa brjod du med par rgyal bas sngon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-7: smon lam 'od kyis sems can dbyings sbyangs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-8: 'gro ba yongs smin dbang po chos kyang mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-9: 'khyil ba zhes bya chu klung lha dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-10: 'gro dang mnyam pa'i snying rje'i tshul bsgoms shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-11: mgon po sems can nyon mongs dri ma sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-12: yongs smin sems can rgyal ba mngon du blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-13: de la dri med mig gi lha yang mos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs snyan rgya chen ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-15: kun tu bsgrags pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-16: sangs rgyas dbyangs snyan thos nas dga' mgu'i yid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-17: rnam thar 'di ni sgro dbyangs sgrog pas thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-18: bskal pa rgya mtsho 'gro la phan don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-19: sngon chad byang chub spyod pa spyad pa mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-20: de phyir de ni phyogs bkang 'jig rten mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-21: lam rgyud skyob pa rjes su dran zhing dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-22: rgyal ba sngon chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-23: sna tshogs sgo nas sems can smin par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:62b-24: de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho sdug bsngal 'jil //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-1: byed chu klung lha ni des dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-2: sbyin pa'i sgo mo tshad med mi zad mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-3: 'gro ba 'dod pa kun la yongs btang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-4: rgyal bas 'gro ba'i 'jungs pa yongs su bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-5: kun nas dga' dpal rnam thar de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-6: thabs tshul rgya mtsho thams cad bsgoms pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-7: yon tan mang po brgya phrag mang pos byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-8: rgyal bas 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-9: rgya chen sgra dbyangs shugs ldan lha yang dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-10: sgrib pa'i klong dang 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dri //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-11: 'gro ba rnams la byams pa bskyed sbyangs pas; ;mkha' mnyam 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-12: rnam par mdzes pa'i chu klung lha dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-13: sangs rgyas rang byung yon tan rgya mtsho ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-14: bsod nams zhing ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal 'dor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-15: byang chub lam la rim gyis yongs smin mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-16: rgya mtsho'i tshogs dpal rnam thar 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-17: de la lo tog gi lha ngad 'jam pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-18: ro dang mdangs thams cad skyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-19: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku rab tu 'thob pa ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-20: lo tog gi lha dus kyi me tog rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63a-21: 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas dga' ba chen po'i shugs kyi tshim pa skyed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-0: lo tog @63b gi lha rtsal dam pa'i stobs kyi rnam par thar ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-1: chos thams cad kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pas shin tu dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-2: lo tog gi lha mdangs kyi ngad mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-3: snying rje mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu 'gyed cing rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-4: lo tog gi lha kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-6: sangs rgyas rnams la yon tan yang dag par skyed pa ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-7: lo tog gi lha gtsug phud kha dog sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-8: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i me tog yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-9: lo tog gi lha yal ga dri ma med par grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-10: sems can la phan pa'i byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-11: bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-12: lo tog gi lha spos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-13: chos thams cad la spyod pa kun tu gnon pas rtsom pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-14: lo tog gi lha bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-15: 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhum pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-16: yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par zlog cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:63b-17: chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-0: lo tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag @64a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-1: cing 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-2: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par lta zhing chos kyis 'khor gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o; ;de nas lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lo tog gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-3: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-4: rang byung ye shes sgron ma skyes pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-5: 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang mgon gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-6: ma lus 'gro ba'i bde ba yang dag skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-7: bsod nams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bla na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-8: sangs rgyas mnyan na don yod yon tan sprin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-9: 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-10: chos rgya chen po mi zad rab tu skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-11: dus kyi dkyil 'khor lha ni 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-12: bder gshegs stobs ni ma lus yongs su rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-13: 'gro ba dag ni chos kyi legs pas mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-14: 'gro ba kun 'dul kun tu rnam par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-15: stobs dang gzugs kyi mthu yis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-16: sems kyi skad cig kun la 'gro mnyam pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-17: thugs rje rgya mtsho sngon chad rnam sbyangs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-18: de phyir rdzu 'phrul rnams ni mtha' yas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-19: de ni mdangs mthong lha yis rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64a-20: thabs rnams kun gyi sgo rnams don yod par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-0: sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun tu khyab @64b gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-1: 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs dag par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-2: 'di ni thams cad sgo mo'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-3: 'gro ba 'di na mos yangs gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-4: de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthus byung ste; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-5: nags tshal rgyan gyi gtsug phud de la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-6: 'jig rten rnams la byams pa che bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-7: sems can rnams la phan phyir rang byung skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-8: lam rab dge ba zhi la rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-9: zhi ba sna tshogs dpal gyi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-10: phyogs su sems can yongs smin byed pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-11: bder gshegs spyod pa ji ltar rnam dag pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-12: byang chub shing las de dag sgra yang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-13: spos zhim dpal gyi lha yis de thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-14: rgyal bas 'jig rten yid du 'ong ba spong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-15: dge ba ma lus rnams kyang rab tu skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-16: 'gro ba kun gyi dbang po rnam par sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-17: dge bar snang ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-18: 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas shin tu 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-19: skye bo kun gyi bsam pa des mkhyen te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-20: sna tshogs sgo nas 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-21: rnam dag kha dog 'od kyi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-22: de la sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-23: bsam pa kun nas rnam par lta ba'i gnon pas 'gro ba rab tu gnon pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:64b-24: sman gyi lha tsandan gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-2: sman gyi lha 'od rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-3: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bas rdul dang bral pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-4: sman gyi lha ming kun tu grags pa glang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-5: ming bsgrags pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho yang dag par 'phel ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-6: sman gyi lha spu'i klong kun nas 'od 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-7: nad thams cad la snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-8: sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par sbyong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-9: 'gro ba ldongs pa lta bu thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-10: sman gyi lha sgra dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bsgrags pas don gyi dbyings 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-12: sman gyi lha nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i mchog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-13: 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes su ston cing dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-14: sman gyi lha phyogs bcur rmongs pa med par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65a-15: mos pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dag pa'i snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-0: sman gyi lha mdangs dang 'od kun tu @65b 'gyed pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-1: sems can thams cad kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed cing sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-2: de nas sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sman gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-3: sangs rgyas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-4: 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-5: thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs sgo dag nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-6: sdug bsngal kun las sems can rab tu 'grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-7: sangs rgyas chos nyid de ltar bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-8: de yi mthu ni thams cad don kyang yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-9: skye rgu rnams ni sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-10: tsandan shugs dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-11: sngon chad rgyal ba'i chos nyid dag la ltos; ;bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' med spyod pa na'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-12: srid pa kun la chags pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-13: de la rdul med 'od kyi lha 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-14: rgyal ba bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-15: mthong zhing mtshan thos de bzhin shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-16: tshul rnams kun tu rang byung don yod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-17: de la rgyal mtshan mchog ni de ltar 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-18: rgyal ba'i spu yi sgo rnams kun nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-19: nad las rab tu 'grel ba'i 'od bkye bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-20: 'jig rten nyon mongs ma lus zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-21: sbu mdangs rgyun gyi rnam thar 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:65b-22: sdug bsngal las dang nyon mongs sna tshogs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-0: @66a *// 'gro ba rtag tu ldongs shing rmongs gyur rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-1: sangs rgyas ye shes 'od kyis rnam par sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-2: de ni mun dang bral ba'i lhas mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-3: rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-4: chos kyi sgo mo thams cad kun kyang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-5: de ni sems can ma lus kun kyang shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-6: 'di ni sgra dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-7: rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-8: srid par sems can yongs su smin byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-9: de la 'gro kun mi mgon mngon du snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-10: nyi 'od zhi ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-11: sangs rgyas thugs rje'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-12: 'gro ba kun phan don du de skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-13: 'gro ba kun la lam rnams shin tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-14: de ni phyogs su snang ba'i lhas shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-15: sangs rgyas 'gro dbang rnams kyi 'od yangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-16: phyogs rnams thams cad ma lus kun tu gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-17: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i gzi brjid skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-18: mdangs dang 'od du ldan pa'i rnam thar to; ;de la nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-19: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho yangs shing mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-20: nags tshal gyi lha 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66a-21: dge ba rgya chen po kun nas spungs pa'i shugs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-0: nags tshal gyi lha myu gu yid @66b du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-1: mos pa sna tshogs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel ba dang yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-2: nags tshal gyi lha lo ma dri ma med pa'i phreng ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-3: yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su sbyong zhing rnam par sgom pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-4: nags tshal gyi lha yan lag rab tu 'phyang ba'i gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-5: shes rab dri ma med pa'i sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la dmigs shing kun nas rnam par dmigs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-6: nags tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-7: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-8: nags tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-9: sems can thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra la bzod pa rab tu thob pas chos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya'o; ;nags tshal gyi lha kun nas spos mang po'i ngad ldang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-10: spyod pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor spyod pas yongs su dag par byed cing phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:66b-11: nags tshal gyi lha kun nas dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-0: 'gro ba la phan pa'i don chos thams cad @67a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-1: kyi yon tan gyis rgyas par yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-2: nags tshal gyi lha me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-4: ro'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-5: sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad la dga' bar lta zhing rjes su dran pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-6: de nas nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus nags tshal gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-7: bsod nams stobs dang ye shes stobs rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-8: sngon tshe byang chub spyod pas sangs rgyas byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-9: stobs rnams kun gyis rang byung pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-10: 'gro ba kun na 'phags shing rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-11: 'gro ba thams cad snyed kyi thugs rje'i sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-12: de bzhin gshegs pas sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-13: rang byung de bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-14: sna tshogs spungs 'od rnam thar 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-15: sems can kun gyis bde gshegs mthong ma thag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-16: mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-17: rgyal ba kun gyi lam yang yang dag ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-18: myu gu yid 'ong 'od kyi rnam thar yin; ;rgyal ba kun gyi ba spu'i yon tan 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-19: bskal pa rgya mtshor zad par mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67a-20: 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-0: rnam thar 'di ni phreng ba'i dpal @67b gyis mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-1: sngon chad rgyal bas sangs rgyas gang gi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-2: zhing mang rdul snyed mchod pa de dag dran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-3: kun tu shes rab dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-4: yal ga 'od kyi brjid kyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-5: 'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-6: skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas thugs su chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-7: rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med shin tu yangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-8: sna tshogs rgyan gyi 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-9: bder gshegs gsung ni zhi ba rab zhir gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-10: dga' ba yangs pa chen po rnam par skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-11: sems can mos pa ji bzhin de dag shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-12: 'di ni sgra rnams sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyis thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-13: phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-14: sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-15: rgyal ba'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-16: kun tu dri zhim 'od dpal 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-17: ma rungs sems can yon tan med pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-18: myos shing 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-19: de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen lam ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-21: sems can ma rungs sbyor ba spyod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-22: bskal pa bye bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-23: gzhan ni bder gshegs skad cig gcig gis lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-24: ro yi 'od kyi lha yis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:67b-25: de la ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-1: la dben pa'i snang ba la rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-2: ri'i lha nags tshal sna tshogs me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni; 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i byams pa sgom pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-3: ri'i lha kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-4: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po la 'jug pas mngon par snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-5: ri'i lha rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-6: bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o; ;ri'i lha snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-7: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rnam par bstan pa ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-8: ri'i lha stobs la thub pa med pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-9: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug yongs su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-10: ri'i lha kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68a-11: chags pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rgyan gyis sdug bsngal yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-0: ri'i @68b lha snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i yon tan snang ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-2: ri'i lha kun tu mngon par lta ba'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-3: sems can thams cad kyi rmi lam gyi mthar yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-4: ri'i lha kun nas sra ba'i rdo rje'i mtshams kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-5: don rgya mtsho rgya chen po mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-6: de nas ri'i lha rin po che rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus ri'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-7: rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul mi zad tshad med ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-8: sngon tshe spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-9: rnam thar zhing gi rdul snyed bsgoms mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-10: 'gro ba ma lus dga' ba'i shugs kyang bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-11: sangs rgyas spu nas dri med dpal bkye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-12: yan lag mtshan rgyan 'gro ba kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-13: byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-14: nags tshal rgyas pa'i gtsug gi rnam thar to; ;sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas 'gro bar mngon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-15: 'jig rten kun tu phyogs bcu bkang zhing 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:68b-16: dbang po dang ba'i sems can rangs shing dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-2: rang byung mkha' mnyam 'jig rten chos ma chags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-3: bskal pa kun spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-4: sna tshogs khams 'gro sbyor ba ma lus 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-5: dga' ba dri med gtsug phud rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-6: 'jig rten kun ni ldongs gyur mun stug zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-7: thugs rje der bskyed sangs rgyas 'od bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-8: 'gro khams yun ring nyal ba sad par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-9: rig nas dga' 'od lha yi rnam thar to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-10: srid pa'i rgya mtshor spyad pa sngon spyod tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-11: zhing rdul mnyam pa'i sems can gtso mchod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-12: de dag dgyes bzhin sems can byang chub bkod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-13: zhi ba'i sa 'di stobs 'chang lha 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-14: las kyi sprin sgrib g-yogs shing bsgribs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-15: srid par sems can sdug bsngal 'khor gzigs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-16: de dag mun pa ye shes 'od kyis bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-17: gzi brjid dpal 'od rnam thar 'di sems so; ;rgyal ba'i spu las sangs rgyas yon tan kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-18: phyogs dbyings sems can bsam pa bzhin du grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-19: rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskal pa kun tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-20: 'od mang rdul gyi chu bo'i lha 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-21: sems can kun spyod dge ba rgya mtsho kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-22: de la phyogs bkang sangs rgyas mngon par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69a-23: sna tshogs thabs kyis 'jig rten chos kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-0: @69b tshul mngon mig gi lha yis de thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-1: chos sgo rgya mtsho mi zad tshad med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-2: sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-3: bskal pa kun brjod 'jig rten mang la ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-4: rdo rje tshul mig 'di yi gnas la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-5: de la sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-6: skad cig skad cig cing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-7: sa'i lha bsod nams brtan pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-8: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi stobs dang shugs kyi rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-9: sa'i lha sems rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-10: ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs sgom pa rnam par 'byed pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-11: sa'i lha dus dus su dge ba'i mig rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-12: sems can thams cad dga' zhing bde ba dang rtse ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-13: sa'i lha gser gyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-14: lus thams cad yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshul ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-15: sa'i lha spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:69b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par sgom pa brjod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-0: sa'i lha sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa'i rnam par @70a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-2: 'gro ba thams cad smra ba'i sgra rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-3: sa'i lha me tog gi glang po sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-5: sa'i lha kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-6: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyi rlabs kun nas rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-7: sa'i lha khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi tshul la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyun sgom pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-9: de nas sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa'i lha'i dpal gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-10: sngon chad skad cig skad cig bder gshegs kyis; ;brjod du med pa'i snying rje'i sgo rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-11: byams pa'i sgo yang mi zad bsgoms pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-12: de phyir sangs rgyas sku ni mi shigs sra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-13: dus gsum gtogs pa'i sems can bsod nams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-14: ji snyed byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70a-15: rgyal ba'i spu gcig de snyed bsod nams 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-0: bsod nams de mthong rab tu dga' @70b bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-1: 'byung ba med cing byon pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-2: ting 'dzin zhi ba rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-3: sems can rgyan gyi sa 'di rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-4: 'di ni sna tshogs shing gi ze ba'i sa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-5: sngon chad thub pas spyod pa spyad pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-6: 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnam par zlog pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-7: rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyi sa yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-8: rnam thar de la dga' bar lha lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-10: 'jig rten kun tu skad cig skad cig ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-11: dus tshod yang dag ston pa'i sa yi lha //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-12: dga' bar sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-13: sangs rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-14: sems can kun bsgrags nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-15: gser 'od mig gi dpal ni rab dga' bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-16: sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-17: sangs rgyas sprul pas rnam pa kun gzugs su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-18: phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-19: spu las dri zhim 'od kyi sa yi lha //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-20: sangs rgyas sems can 'dul ba de la lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-21: phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-22: 'gro ba 'di ni phyi mtha'i bskal par brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-23: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs sa yi lha //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-24: rab tu dga' bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-25: rgyal ba'i spu las sems can mnyam pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:70b-26: spos kyi 'od bkye 'jig rten kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-2: me tog gtsug phud 'phyang bas yang dag mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-3: de bzhin gshegs sku rdo rje lta bu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-4: mtshams su mi phyed sra ba'i ri bo 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-5: 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bskyod mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-6: rdo rje rdul gyi lha ni des dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-7: de la grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtse mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-8: sems can la phan pa yang dag sbyar ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-9: grong khyer gyi lha rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-10: 'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-11: grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-12: sems can thams cad bsod nams dang dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
