K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-13: grong khyer gyi lha slos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-16: snying rje chen po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-17: grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma shin tu rgyas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-18: shes rab kyis kun tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-19: grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni; thabs kyi sgo kun nas ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71a-20: grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-0: 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams @71b 'byung bas snang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-1: grong khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-2: sems can rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-3: grong khyer gyi lha spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug phud kyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-4: nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i dri ma rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-5: grong khyer gyi lha rin chen dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-6: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-7: de nas grong khyer gyi lha rin po che'i rtse mo'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus grong khyer gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-8: mgon po'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-9: snang ba brnyes shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-10: sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin mdzad pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-11: sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-12: sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-13: de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro bar mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-14: rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-15: sna tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-16: rgyal bas bskal pa mtha' yas yang dag spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:71b-17: sngon chad rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag bzung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-0: dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag @72a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-1: blangs; ;rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-2: 'gro ba 'dir ni thugs rje byams bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-3: de bzhin gshegs pas sngon chad sems can rnams; ;kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par bzlog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-4: nyon mongs yongs su sbyong ba 'di la dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-5: rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya che mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-6: tshad med nam mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab rnam spyod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-8: mar me me tog 'od kyi lha dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-9: de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro mnyam sku gzugs rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-10: 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-11: de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu sgom pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-12: mngon du 'od 'phro'i lha de rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-13: bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-14: sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-15: de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam lta bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-16: bsod nams dpal gyi 'od de rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-17: srid par rab tu rmongs pa'i sems can rnams; ;'khor gyur rab rib ldongs pa gzigs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-18: de dag phan phyir sangs rgyas mngon du byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-19: dri med 'od kyis rnam thar 'di thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-21: 'gro la sprin 'dra mtha' dang dbus kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-22: de dag bstan cing 'gro ba rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72a-23: spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-0: sems @72b can rmongs pa mun pas ldongs gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib pas bsgribs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-2: sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par kun shes 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-3: rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni 'di la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-4: de la snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-5: sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa yang dag par 'byung zhing sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-6: snying po byang chub kyi lha ri rab spo'i rin po che'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-7: 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon sum du byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub cing 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-8: snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-9: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas ston cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-10: rmi lam gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-11: snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-12: dka' ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-13: rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-14: snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-15: 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:72b-16: snying po byang chub phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-0: snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug @73a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-1: phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-2: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chos tshul zab mo dran pa ston pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-3: snying po byang chub kyi lha rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-4: dga' ba yang dag par myong ba mtha' yas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-5: snying po byang chub kyi lha mthu dam pa spos kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-6: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-7: snying po byang chub kyi lha rdo rje sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-8: snying po byang chub kyi lha rnam pa mtha' yas pa yang dag par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-9: snying po byang chub kyi lha padmo'i shing snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-10: byang chub kyi shing yongs su zhi bas phyogs rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-11: snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sna tshogs yang dag par rgyu ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73a-13: de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-0: bskal @73b pa mang po mtha' dang dbus med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar sngon spyad dran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsgrubs pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-3: de phyir de yi bsod nams nam mkha'i tshad; ;zhing rnams mtha' yas tshad med 'dra med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-4: mi zad gtong ba'i sgo nas sngon btang bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-5: ri bo'i spo yi 'od kyi lha de ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-6: bder gshegs dran zhing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur; ;bder gshegs sprul pa rnam pa mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-7: de dag zhing rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-8: 'gro bar sangs rgyas rmi lam bzhin ston cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-9: sprin gyi sgra dbyangs lha de rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-10: mtha' yas bskal par dka' ba rab spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-11: dang ba'i spyan gyis 'gro la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-12: rgya mtsho'i spyan yang yongs su sngon btang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-13: de la me tog mig gi lha dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-14: yon tan rin chen 'od 'phro mtha' yas sprin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-15: 'gro ba kun tu snying po byang chub nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-16: rab tu bkye ba'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-17: 'od 'phro 'gyed pa'i lus kyi lha yang dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-18: sems can rnams kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-19: de la rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-20: ji ltar mos par nem nur rnam par sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-21: de yis gtsug phud 'phyang ba dga' ba thob; ;rgyan gyi char 'bebs mig bzang lha de ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-22: sems kyi skad cig gcig gis tshad med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:73b-23: chos don dbyings kyi bye brag mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-0: rgya mtshor tha dad yang dag @74a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-2: zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-3: 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas legs brjod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-4: de phyir yon tan sangs rgyas zhing kun grags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-5: de ni rjes su spos mig lha yang dran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-6: mtha' yas shing gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-7: byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-8: rdo rje sna tshogs sprin gyi lha de ni; ;byang chub shing la dga' bar rnam par lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-9: sangs rgyas ye shes snying po byang chub la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-10: phyogs rnams kun tu mtha' dang mu med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-11: padmo snang zhing gsal ba'i lha de ni; ;rnam thar rnam yangs 'di la rab dga' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-12: sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs dag bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-13: snying po byang chub 'dir ni kun kyang grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-14: yang dag bsgrubs pas byung ba de dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-15: thams cad sna tshogs snang ba'i 'od nyan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-16: de la rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-17: dga' ba yangs pa rin po che'i char gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-18: rkang gis 'gro padmo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-19: sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od zer gyi kha dog padmo'i dra ba thams cad du ston pas dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74a-20: rkang gis 'gro me tog gtsug phud kyi dpal dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-0: sems kyi skad cig thams cad la de bzhin gshegs @74b pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-2: rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-3: gom pa 'dor ba thams cad du sems can mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-4: rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-5: skad cig gcig gis padmo'i dra ba sna tshogs sprul pa byed cing rin po che'i char pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-7: snang ba kun tu 'gyed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-8: rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-9: dga' ba'i shugs dang nyams bde ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-10: rkang gis 'gro shing tsandan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-11: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du spos kyi ngad sprin du ldang ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-12: rkang gis 'gro padmo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-13: padmo'i gseb thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyangs 'byung bas snang ba skyed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-14: rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-15: lus kyi 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi dra bas snang ba 'byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-16: rkang gis 'gro me tog mang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:74b-17: sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtshos yang dag par bskul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-1: 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rkang gis 'gro'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-2: dga' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi shugs bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-3: bskal pa mtha' yas sngon chad spyod pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-4: zhing rnams kun rdul shin tu phra mnyam pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-6: skad cig sems la padmo brjod yongs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-7: dri zhim sna tshogs mngon par sbrul mdzad nas; ;zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba gshegs mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-8: snang ba'i 'od zer lha des rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-9: 'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-10: 'khor rnams kun tu 'byams klas mtha' yas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-11: rnam par 'phrul pa mi zad rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-12: me tog gtsug phud lha des de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-13: phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-14: thams cad kun tu gshegs shing bzhud pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-15: sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-16: shin tu mdzes pas dga' bar de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-17: sems can snyed kyi sprul pa kun 'phros pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-18: re re'i sku yis chos kyi dbyings kyang 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-19: rin chen dri med 'od kyang rab tu gtong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75a-20: rkang 'gro dpal gyi mtshan gyis 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-0: @75b de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-1: 'khor du rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-2: bder gshegs de yi 'khor na dgar gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-3: dga' sgra dbyangs kyis rnam thar de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-4: sangs rgyas dbyangs ni mkha' dang mnyam pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-5: dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-6: 'jig rten kun bkang sems can rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-7: tsandan shing gi 'od ni de la nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-8: spu rtse kun nas rgyal ba rnam 'phrul dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-9: dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshan gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-10: sgra bsgrags thos shing dga' ba skyer 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-11: de ni rdo rje 'od kyi lhas mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-12: de bzhin gshegs sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-13: gom pa gom par yon tan rgya mtsho ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-14: de dag sems can ji ltar mos pas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-15: rdul gyi 'od kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-16: 'jig rten mgon po rnam 'phrul rnam mang gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-17: phyogs bcur sems can yang dag skul bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-18: me tog 'khor mang rkang pas 'gro ba'i lha; ;mthong zhing dga' ba yangs pa rab tu thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-19: de la lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:75b-21: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-1: khams mu med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-2: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-3: sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad la brjod cing yang dag par bskul bas dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-4: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rgyan bzang po'i me tog gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o; ;lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-7: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-8: sems can thams cad gso ba dang 'dres pa'i mdangs kyis dga' ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-9: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spos dri ma med pa'i sprin las char 'bebs pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-10: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mngon par sel ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76a-11: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha srung 'dzin yongs su sdud pa'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-0: sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang @76b rmongs pa rnam par zlog pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-1: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgo kun nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-2: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal ba rnam par dmigs par mngon du ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-3: lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dpal mi g-yo ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni; sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-4: de nas lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-5: ri rab rdul phran shin tu phra snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-6: bskal pa de dag pha snga'i bskal pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-7: rdul ces bya bar 'od mdzes 'od zer rgyal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-8: mchod de smon lam btab pa bdag gis dran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-9: sangs rgyas sku las 'od 'phro rab bkye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-10: de yi 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-11: rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba sems can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-12: 'od 'phro 'od zer lha yis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-13: dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-14: sangs rgyas gsung ni zhing rnams kun tu sgrog //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:76b-15: 'gro ba ma lus thams cad yang dag skul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-2: rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-3: sku gzugs du ma'ang mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-4: 'gro ba kun na'ang bzhugs par rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-5: me tog gtsug gis ji bzhin nyid du mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-6: 'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-7: sems can de dag dad pa ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-8: la la bzhugs dang bzhengs dang gshegs par mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-9: de yang spyod lam 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-10: rgyal ba'i tshems kyi mtshams rnams thams cad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-11: dri zhim 'od 'phro sgron ma'i sprin bkye bas; ;'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-12: dri med spos kyi sprin gyis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-13: sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabs su byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-14: nyon mongs rmongs shing sdug bsngal gzir ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-15: mgu bar mdzad cing nyon mongs thams cad bcil //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-16: snang ba'i phreng ba 'chang bas 'di mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-17: 'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-18: rang byung 'jig rten don mdzad skyes pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-19: 'jig rten kun gyi dbul ba rnam par sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-20: khrel yod dpal gyi 'od snang de skad smra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-21: sems can nyon mongs sgrib pas nyon mongs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-22: bdud kyi las kyis dkrugs te 'phyan pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-23: de dag rgyal ba rnam thar lam ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77a-24: srung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-0: de bzhin @77b gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-1: sangs rgyas sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings mnan cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-2: 'jig rten dbang po gnas su sems can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-3: kun sgo'i mig gi dpal gyi spyod yul lo; ;de la lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-4: yon tan mtha' yas pa dang gzugs kyi sku rnam par dpyod pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-5: lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ba spu las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-7: lag na rdo rje ri rab me tog 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-8: rnam par 'phrul ba rgya chen po bstan pas yon tan mtha' yas pa'i lus su 'phrul ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-9: lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-11: lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-12: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-13: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-14: lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba thams cad ma lus pa la yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:77b-16: lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-0: @78a *// shing gi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyan yid du 'ong bas brgyan pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-1: lag na rdo rje sengge'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-3: lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro stug po dpal gyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-4: sems can mi rungs pa'i rgyud la lus 'jigs 'jigs ltar rab tu ston cing kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-5: lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug phud padmo 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-7: de nas lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-8: chos rgyal chos kyis mdzes pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-9: chos nyid de la rnam par ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-10: yon tan mtha' yas sku gzugs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-11: 'jig rten kun tu rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-12: sangs rgyas ba spu thams cad nas; ;'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-14: phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78a-15: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-0: chos kyi dbyings su khyab @78b byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-1: 'gro ba kun gyi mngon sum du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-2: mi zad sku ni shin tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-3: sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-4: zhing rnams kun tu rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-5: gsung gi sems can thams cad kyi; ;bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-6: 'jig rten dbang po kun gnas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-7: thub pa rab tu bzhugs par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-8: de dag thams cad 'khor rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-9: 'dren pa dag ni chos ston mdzad; ;rgya mtsho chos kyi sgo bskul bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-10: gzhan dang gzhan gyi tshul dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-11: thams cad chos kyi bye brag don //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-12: rgyal ba zad med rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-13: rgya chen mtha' med tshul dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-17: zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-18: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-19: bsod nams rgya chen nam mkha' bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-20: kun gyis 'dren pa rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-22: thams cad zhing du ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-23: 'gro la sangs rgyas mngon sum du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-24: byang chub snying por rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-27: chos dbyings kun tu khyab byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-28: sangs rgyas spyod yul rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:78b-30: de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-0: tshul gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug @79a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-1: ste; 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-2: 'gro ba 'dul ba la mthar thug par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa nas sar smon lam rgya mtshos rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-5: sgo thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings su bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-6: zhing thams cad du rang gi ming bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo sgrog pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-7: rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs su byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-8: rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79a-9: dus gsum gyi bskal pa skad cig gcig tu ston pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul phan tshun du 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par @79b thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-1: gang 'di chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par rang gi lus kyi sprul pas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-2: gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun du ston pa rgya chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa bdag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-4: sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-5: zhing rnams rgyal bas dri med rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-6: mkha' yangs rdul bzhin yon tan tshad kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-7: sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-8: de la bsam yas chos sprin char yang phab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-9: ji ltar rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs snang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-10: de bzhin rdul sbubs ma lus kun na'ang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-11: 'on kyang bder gshegs gshegs dang 'pho ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-12: zhing rnams kun tu yul med rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-13: sa yi tshul la 'jug pa tshad med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-14: spyod pa thub pas byang chub sems dpa' bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-15: bsam gyis mi khyab tshul ni kun gsungs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:79b-16: rgyal sras rnams ni chos kyi dbyings la 'jug //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-2: mtha' yas phyogs su mtha' dang dbus med sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-3: rdul phran sbubs su rgyal ba 'phrul ba spros //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-4: 'gro ba'i bsam pa kun kyang rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-5: phyogs rnams thams cad zhing rnams kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-6: 'jig rten gtso mtshan 'gro dang mnyam par byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-7: thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-8: 'dul bas sems can thams cad rnam par sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-9: rdul sbubs kun tu mtha' dang dbus med pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-10: rnam 'phrul yangs pa rang byung shin tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-11: sngon chang thub pa'i byang chub spyod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-12: ji bzhin kun kyang snying po byang chub brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-13: yangs dus bskal pa ji snyed yod pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-14: skad cig skad cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-15: der ni sems can 'byung zhing 'jig pa'ang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-16: 'jig rten gtso bo'i ye shes bsam yas ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-17: 'byams klas mi zad mtha' yas lo grangs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-18: rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas sa lta ste; ;thams cad sgor yang sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-19: rgyal sras kun gyis shes par smra ba min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-20: sangs rgyas mkhan 'dra rnam par mi rtog ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-21: chos nyid mi gnas chos kyi sprin dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-22: sprul pas spyod tshe kun tu rgyas mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-23: shing mchog kun drung byang chub 'tshang rgya bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80a-24: sangs rgyas gsung de rab tu brjod pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-0: chos gnas @80b thams cad ma lus brjod pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-1: 'gro ba thams cad re re'i sgo dag nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-2: sangs rgyas chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-3: de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-4: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i rgyan byed pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-5: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'ong mchog kun tu sgron ma'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-6: sems skad cig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo zad mi shes pa ston cing chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-7: rnam par 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-8: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bar ba sengge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-10: zhing yang dag par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-11: byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-12: rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyis rnam par spyod pa don yod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-13: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:80b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-0: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs @81a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-1: pa'i spyod yul ye shes kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su kun nas song zhing chos kyi dbyings la rnam par spyod pa'i sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-3: byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-4: 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mchod par nye bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-7: byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-8: rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-9: byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa sku med pa las sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su @81b bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-1: ji snyed gang dag phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-2: rgyal bas de kun skad cig dgongs pas sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-3: 'gro bar kun tu zhi ba med pa'i gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-4: sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-5: skad cig dgongs pas chos dbyings kun bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-6: mtha' yas spyod yul dbyangs rnams rgyal ba ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-7: 'gro ba kun lam snying po byang chub tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-8: byang chub 'tshang rgya rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-9: bskal pa brgya phrag stong rnams tshad med du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas sngon chad spyod spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-11: nam mkha' 'dra bar byas nas rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-12: sangs rgyas zhing 'di sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-13: mtha' dang dbus med bskal par la la yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-14: skyo ba med par rgyal ba'i yul bsam yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-15: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs la mtha' dbus med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-16: phyi ma'i mtha' yi bskal pa kun tu 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-17: rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul la rnam par ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-18: phyogs bcu'i zhing rgyan de dag rnam dag pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-19: rgyal bas 'dir ni kun kyang rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-20: skad cig skad cig sna tshogs gzugs kyang snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-21: bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-22: rgyal ba'i ba spu gcig mtha' shes par dka'; ;tshul rnams kun sgor sangs rgyas chags pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-23: 'gro ba 'di na rgya chen bsam yas mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:81b-24: sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro kun tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-2: de bas 'jig rten gtso la chos dbyings rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-3: kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya chen 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-4: phyogs rnams bkang ste sangs rgyas byung ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-5: rdul gyi sbubs su tshad med zhing yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-6: de dag yul du mi zad mtha' yas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-7: bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-8: sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro don spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-9: thugs rje'i rgya mtsho tshad med rab bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-10: 'gro ba rgya mtsho kun nas 'khor ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-11: 'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-12: sangs rgyas mtshan med sku med rdul dang bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-13: de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-14: 'gro ba kun na mtha' yas gzugs su snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-15: 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal kun zhi mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-16: de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa'i shugs kyis sems can gyi khams kyi tshul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri med 'od kyi snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82a-20: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems skad cig la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyim sna tshogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-0: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin chen @82b 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-1: bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon sum du yon tan dri ma med pas yongs su dag pa sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu thog ma 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi phyogs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-4: byang chub sems dpa' padmo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug phud kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang tha mi dad par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-6: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-7: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub par bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-8: byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-9: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya mtha' dang dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:82b-10: byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-0: sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes pa'i dkyil @83a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-1: 'khor yang dag par sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-3: rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-4: byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-5: sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la kun nas rab tu gnas par rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-7: pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-8: sa yi dkyil 'khor rgya chen kun kyang yongs su rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-9: tshad med sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-10: sangs rgyas zhing yangs rnams kyang rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-12: sangs rgyas sems can khams sbyin 'dul mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-13: skad cig dgongs pas chos kyi 'khor lo dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-14: mtha' yas 'gro mnyam bsam pa tshim par gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83a-15: bskal pa rgya che mi zad mu med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-0: rgyal ba 'gro la mngon @83b sum kun nas bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-1: mgon pos sngon chad ji ltar sbyangs tshul du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-2: rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-3: chos rgyal de dag ji ltar rnam 'phrul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-4: phyogs rnams rgya mtsho ma lus kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-5: snying po byang chub kun na'ang rgyal ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-6: 'khor gyis bskor cing chos rnams gsung ba snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-7: 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad tshim mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-8: 'jig rten dag na sangs rgyas tshul kun mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-9: dbang po ji bzhin chos kyi char pa 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-10: sangs rgyas chos sku yangs pa rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-11: de bzhin nyid ltar mtshan nyid lus med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-12: rgyal ba dri med 'od gsal chos kyi sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-13: ye shes zhi ba'i sku ni tshad med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-14: phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char yang 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-15: chos rje thams cad stobs kyis rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-16: bder gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-17: rgya chen 'gro ba mtha' dbus med bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-18: rgyal ba stobs la 'jug pa rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-19: sangs rgyas 'od kyis chos dbyings kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-20: sangs rgyas spyod pa thams cad rdzogs par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-21: rgyal bas sngon tshe ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-22: de bzhin ye shes sa rnams rgyal bas bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-23: phyogs rnams kun tu rang byung rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-24: smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa ma lus ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-25: ji ltar sngon tshe rgyal bas yongs sbyangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:83b-26: rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba kun nas sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-2: dbus dang mtha' med gzhal med mtha' yas dbyings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-3: chos dbyings kun tu chags med brnyas pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-4: sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na shin tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi sengge'i khri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-6: padmo'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-7: nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-8: 'khor lo'i lte ba thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-9: me tog gi ze ba'i dri thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-10: stegs bu'i ngos thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-11: rta babs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-12: nor bu'i gzugs kyi ngos thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-13: rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgo thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-14: 'od zer sgron ma'i sgo thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-15: sengge'i khri'i rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po thon par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-16: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-18: byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-19: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84a-20: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-0: byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya padmo @84b sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-1: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshul padmo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyangs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-5: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'di ltar nor bu rin po che'i me tog gi sprin thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-7: spos kyi sprin thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-9: rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-11: yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'phro ba'i bdug pa'i sprin ni; rnam par 'gyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-12: nor bu nyi ma'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-14: sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-16: rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma'i sprin gyis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-18: nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las me tog gi dog pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-20: rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pa zad mi shes pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i char ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:84b-22: rgyan mdzes pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85a-1: de lta bu dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed cing lhags par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85a-2: bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char mngon par phab nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du bltas nas sengge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs du ma'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85a-4: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang spyod yul rgya mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85a-5: sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chags pa med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85a-7: so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85a-8: rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so; ;sgo kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85a-9: gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin pa rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-0: dus gsum @85b mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-1: dga' ba'i shugs rgya chen po'i rab tu thob pa rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-2: bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa yongs su dag pa rnams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-3: chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa la rab tu brtson pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-6: sangs rgyas rnam par sangs rgyas mnyam nyid mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-7: chags med brnyes pas nam mkha' lta bu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-8: phyogs rnams zhing kun rab tu snang byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-9: 'byams klas 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-10: bder gshegs rang byung mtha' dang dbus med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-11: thams cad phyogs kyi chos dbyings kun rgyas par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-12: dbang phyug chen po kun gyis mchod bskor cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-13: shing gi rgyal po kun gyi drung na bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-15: skad cig sems la mi zad yon tan gzugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-16: rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan dag thob pas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:85b-18: bskal pa rgya mtshor sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-1: bzhin gshegs pas srid pa rgya mtsho 'dir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-2: sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can smin byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-3: de dag rgyal ba de yi chos 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-4: yongs dag dri med 'khor rnams 'khod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-5: thams cad sangs rgyas lta zhing rnam par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-6: padmo'i snying po padmo'i gdan bzhugs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-7: tshogs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-8: sangs rgyas gang la bzhugs pa'i sengge'i khri //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-9: rin chen nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-10: spos 'phro'i sprin rnams mtha' yas rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-11: snying po du ma'i me tog phreng dpyangs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-12: rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin ni rtag tu 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-13: 'od zer sgron ma rgya chen rab tu 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-14: rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-15: thub pa de bzhugs mngon par rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-16: sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-17: rin chen tshon du sna tshogs padmo 'phyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-18: nor bu'i rgyal pos skar khung kun nas brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-19: sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-20: zla gam rin chen mang pos yongs su bzung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-21: rdo rje 'od 'phro snang ba'i snying pos brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-22: gtsug na nor bu'i byang chub sems dpas bzung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-23: sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par shin tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-24: phyogs bcur sprul pa'i dra ba rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra yang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-0: gzugs brnyan bzhin du zhing rnams @86b kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-1: thub pa de 'dra'i sengge'i gdan la bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-3: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-4: 'di ni bder gshegs sangs rgyas byin rlabs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-5: byang chub spyod pa sngon chad spyad pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-6: sangs rgyas mchod pa'i mchod pa du ma dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-7: rgyal ba'i gdan las de dag thams cad snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-8: spos 'od snang ba nor bu'i rgyal po can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-9: me tog snying po sengge'i gdan gyi 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-10: rgyan rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan gyur pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-11: 'khor rnams de dag thams cad kun bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-12: skad cig skad cig rgyan gyi kha dog kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-13: rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas gdan las snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-14: sems can ji ltar mos pa de dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-15: 'khod cing sangs rgyas tshad med gdon la lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-16: rin chen lda ldi padmo mang btags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-17: phye zhing byang chub sems dpa' mang po rnams; ;sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab 'byin cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-18: sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs la bstod pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-19: sangs rgyas bsod nams tshad med nam mkha' bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-20: 'di dag rgyan kun de las rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-21: sa rnams re re'i rgyan rnams gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-22: 'gro ba kun gyis de dag bsam mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:86b-23: mi phyed mtshams kyi rdo rje sna tshogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-2: nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-3: byang chub shing gi sa yi 'khor kun to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-4: sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i gdan yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-5: kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen sna tshogs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-6: me tog mngon gtor rin chen rnam par bkram //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-7: gser tshon mdzes pas de ni rab tu brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-8: sa yi lha mo de dag rab dga' zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-9: skad cig sems kyis mi zad sa yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-10: kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du mngon lta zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-11: kha dog thams cad rgyan gyi sprin gtong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-12: rin chen sgron ma mang po gsal bar 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-13: spos mang dri zhim mang po rtag tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-14: dus dang tshod kyi rnam pa mang ston cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-15: lha rnams kun kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-16: phyogs rnams bcu na zhing rnams ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-17: de dag sa rgyan phun sum tshogs yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-18: de dag kun kyang sa dkyil 'di na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-19: sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa med pas byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug phud kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-21: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-22: sngon chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-23: zhing kun phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87a-24: snying po byang chub 'khor gyi sa 'di la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-0: mi @87b zad sa dang de dag rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-1: rnam thar yangs pa gang na snang ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-2: sa la rin chen mdzes kun rnam par bkra ma //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-3: rin chen mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-4: sangs rgyas 'od kyis sprin kyang rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-5: sa rnams kun brgyan shing gi dam pa'i drung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-6: kun nas nor bu'i rgyal pos brgyan byas las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-7: bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-8: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshul yang rab tu brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-9: rin chen mang po sgron ma'i char phab cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-10: rin chen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-11: sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-12: sa yi lha rnams sa yang yang dag ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-13: rin chen 'od 'phro sgron ma rnam par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-14: 'od zer sprin ni sa las rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-15: nor bu dra ba sil ma kun nas bkram //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-16: rin chen sna tshogs rigs kyis yan lag brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-17: sa rnams kun nas mdzes pa 'di dag ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-18: rin chen mang po tshon bzang rgyan du bkye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-19: 'gro pa dag la chos kyi rgya mtsho sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-20: de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-21: ma lus phyogs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-22: byang chub shing gi phun sum tshogs pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-23: sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di na kun snang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-24: de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-25: sangs rgyas gdan las chos rnams rgya mtsho yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:87b-26: chos sgo bde bar gshegs pas gang gsungs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-0: sems can kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin @88a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-1: du; ;sa 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-2: dri zhim 'od rnams rtag tu 'byung bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-3: de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro ba 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-4: srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-5: sa 'khor de nas de 'dra rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-6: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun sum gang dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-7: dri med sa ni gang gis mdzes gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-8: phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams re re zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-9: bskal pa bye ba dag tu'ang brjod mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-11: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-12: 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa tshim mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-13: sangs rgyas chos kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-14: 'byams klas phyogs rnams kun tu mngon sum du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-15: sangs rgyas 'gro gtso gzhal med khang na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-16: rin chen kun gyis snying po rab tu brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-17: rgyan rnams kun gyis de bzhin mdzes shing 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-18: sangs rgyas pho brang 'od ni bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-19: de na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas rab tu mdzes; ;ka ba'i rgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-20: phyogs rnams kun sgor rta babs sprin kyang bres //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88a-21: stegs bu'i phreng ba kun nas rgyan du bkod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-0: gser gyi dril bu'i sprin kyang @88b rnam par brgyus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-1: me tog bla re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-2: rin chen shing sdong dar gyi bla re bres //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-3: nor bu thams cad sgo nas phreng ba 'bul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-4: de na ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-5: spos dri rgyal mtshan rin chen dra ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-6: 'od zer sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun tu g-yog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-7: rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun nas shin tu bres //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-8: de na sangs rgyas rab tu 'phags pa bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-9: phyogs rnams kun sgo sprul pa'i sprin gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-10: dbyangs kyis 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-11: 'byams klas phyogs kyi sems can rnams 'dul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-12: sangs rgyas pho brang 'di na de dag grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-13: me tog shing dang rin chen spungs spel ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-14: 'phags par phyogs rnams kun tu mngon par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-15: de la dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-16: gzugs brnyan gyur par de dag rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-17: phyogs rnams kun tu rin chen mang bkye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-18: de dag sna tshogs mdzes par rnam par 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-19: phyogs rnams kun tu skar khung mdzes par brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-20: rta babs mda' yab sna tshogs mang pos brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-21: de la dri med 'od zer kun nas snang ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-22: sangs rgyas pho brang rnam pa bsam yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-23: gzhal med khang mang thams cad de la snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-24: de dag kun na'ang rgyal ba bzhugs shing mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-25: phyogs rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:88b-26: rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun zhugs kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-0: @89a *// mtha' dang dbus med mu yang de bzhin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-1: rang byung sangs rgyas pho brang de na bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa de dag thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-3: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-4: sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu phra snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-5: bsod nams rgya mtsho rnam par rab sbyangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-6: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon lam yang dag byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-7: snying po byang chub dri med rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-8: spos zhim thams cad rtsa nas yang dag rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-9: yid bzhin nor mchog rgyal pos kun nas brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-10: rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu rgyal pos bris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-11: shing sdong rtsa ba rin chen kun las byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-12: rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu 'khor lo 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-13: lhun rnams thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-14: yal ga stug po sprin ltar kun nas 'khyil; ;snying po byang chub de na rgyal ba mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-15: yal ga dog pa kun nas mngon pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-16: 'khor rnams snum 'jam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-17: me tog 'bras bu rgyun rnams kun kyang 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-18: snying po byang chub rgya che bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-19: 'od rnams bkye ba phyogs su rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89a-20: dri ma med pa'i 'od 'bar zad mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-0: yal ga'i @89b sgo nas sprin kun char yang 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-1: snying po byang chub smon lam yangs pas byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-2: me tog nor dang rin chen mi zad nor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-3: mu tig nor bu phyogs rnams kun nas brgyus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-4: phye ma nor gyi gnas kyi sprin 'gyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-5: snying po byang chub phyogs rnams kun tu 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-6: bde gshegs snying po byang chub 'di la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-7: padmo'i dra ba nor bu dri med mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-8: rin chen 'od zer dkyil 'khor kun nas 'phro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-9: dril bu'i dra ba'i sprin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-10: phyogs bcu'i shing bzang gzugs rnams gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-11: 'byams klas zhing gi ma lus thams cad dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-12: byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-13: de drung sangs rgyas dri med rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-14: yal ga kun nas rin chen mi zad nor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-15: byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang rtag 'byung zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-16: bsod nams rgya chen dkyil 'khor char phab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-17: phyogs bcur rgyal ba mchod phyir de dag 'dong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa sngon chad cir gyur dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-19: byang chub spyod las byung ba 'di dag ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-20: yal ga kun las rin chen nor mi zad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-21: sangs rgyas yul kun bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:89b-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya ba padmo sna tshogs kyi gtsug phud kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-2: de dag rin chen sgo nas kun kyang grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-3: de ni mtha' dang dbus kyang med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-4: snying po byang chub 'di la kun snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-5: me tog mang po'i phreng ba dbyangs bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-6: 'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-7: byang chub shing la gnas pa'i lha tshogs rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-8: sangs rgyas lta zhing rtag tu mchod pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-9: spos kyi rgyal mtshan nor bu sna tshogs 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-10: spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-11: 'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhim //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-12: shing gi rgyal po de phyir phyogs su mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-13: padmo 'phrul ba stug cing gser mdog 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-14: rgyal ba'i sprin sgra rtag par rab tu 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-15: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyab byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-16: sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-17: rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshad med rgya che ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-18: phyogs rnams kun nas snying po byang chub la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-19: gzugs brnyan snang zhing dri med 'od mchog 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-20: byang chub shing gi rnam 'phrul 'di dag ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-21: smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar me rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-22: rin chen sna tshogs yal ga kun las 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-23: srid pa rgya mtsho kun na sngon chad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-24: rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-25: byang chub lha rnams zhing gi rdul snyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90a-26: de dag thams cad snying po byang chub gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-0: thub pa'i byang chub @90b shing la skad cig cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-1: rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan mang de dag ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-2: rang byung spyad pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-3: sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-4: de dag mtshan bcas sngon gyi sbyor bcas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-5: thams cad rin chen sgo nas rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-6: phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed snod gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-7: de dag thams cad 'di las sgra 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-8: de dag cis 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra ba'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-9: snying po byang chub 'di las kun brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-10: byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-11: bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyi sprin can dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-12: mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyan can thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-13: sngon chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs sbyangs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-15: srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang chub spyod mdzad tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-16: mos pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-17: gnas dang gnas min stobs rnams thugs chud pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-18: bder gshegs sa stobs rnam par dag pa mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-19: bskal pa kun tu rgya mtsho las sbyangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-20: mnyam nyid chos bsgoms ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:90b-21: sangs rgyas 'od las de bzhin phyogs bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-1: rnams rgya mtsho de bzhin rab tu brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-2: sna tshogs thabs kyis 'byams klas stobs spyod tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-3: bskal pa snga mar 'gro ba'i dbang po bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-4: yongs su smin byas de bas 'khor kun kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-5: sems dag sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-6: 'jig rten kun gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-7: bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ba rnam spyod pa; ;de dag ji bzhin rgyal pa chos ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-8: rang byung mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-9: phyogs rnams ma lus zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-10: 'byams klas sems can khams dang chos kyi khams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-11: nam mkha'i khams rnams mnyam nyid mkhyen mi rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-12: rang byung spu rtser khams mkhyen stobs kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-13: bder gshegs ye shes rgya chen kun tu 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-14: skad cig gcig gis dus gsum ma lus 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-15: phyogs dang zhing dang bskal pa 'gro bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-16: sems can kun la stobs 'jug mngon par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-17: bsam gtan rnam thar stobs mtha' dbus med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-18: ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul ni 'gro kun snyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-19: thams cad rgyal ba'i sku la bstan pas na; ;sems can bsam pa'i gnas kyi nyon mongs sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-20: sangs rgyas ye shes dus gsum bsgribs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91a-21: skad cig kun la dus gsum spu rtser ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-0: zhing dang @91b sems can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-1: de ltar rgyal bas rjes su dran stobs bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-2: thub pa'i spyan ni nam mkha' mnyam pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-3: des ni chos dbyings ma lus gsal bar gzigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-4: thams cad tshul gyis chags med gzhal yas sa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-5: brnyes pas ye shes spyan ni rnam mang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-6: 'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-7: 'gro ba'i bag chags bag nyal ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-8: thabs sgo kun nas nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-9: rgyal ba 'jig rten gang bar kun nas byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgrog pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-11: rgya chen sangs rgyas byin rlabs phyogs kun tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-12: sangs rgyas ston kyang rtog pa mi mnga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-13: pha rol phyin pa rgya chen yongs bkang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-14: byang chub spyod pa rgya chen de dag snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-15: 'gro ba rnams la thugs rje che bskyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-16: sbyin pa'i mthar phyin sngon chad spyad pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-17: de phyir thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-18: 'gro ba kun gyis blta zhing dga' ba skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-19: bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha' yas sngon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-20: tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-21: de phyir bskal pa phyogs su dri med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-22: shin tu 'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:91b-23: ma log mnyam pa nyid la dad bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-1: chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam sbyangs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-2: 'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon tan kun ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-3: de bas phyogs su 'od rnams shin tu 'phro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-4: bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por sngon spyod tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-5: 'gro ba rnams kyi bsgribs pa thibs po bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-6: de phyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-7: zhing rab drung na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-8: bsam gtan yan lag rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-9: bskal pa yangs par rgyal bas rab tu sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-10: de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med dga' ba skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-11: nyon mongs dri ma 'grib pa kun kyang sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-12: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-13: shes rab mthar phyin rgyal bas sngon bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-14: 'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa yongs su bsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-15: de bas rgyal ba kun tu rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-16: 'gro ba kun mnyam thabs sgo thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-17: yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnam sbyangs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-18: phyogs rnams kun na kun la mngon par bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-19: phyi ma'i bskal bar 'gro ba mngon du lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-20: smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab sbyong tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-21: bskal pa rgya mtsho shin tu rgya che zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-22: phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin mnyam par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-23: spyad pas de phyir 'gro ba kun na mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-24: rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92a-25: bskal pa gzhal yas mang por yongs su sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-0: de phyir @92b rang byung stobs kyi pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-1: phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun na de phyir 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-2: thams cad mkhyen nyid nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-3: ye shes kun gyi sgo nas sngon sbyangs pas; ;de phyir chags med ye shes pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-4: phyogs bcu kun na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla bas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-6: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul ni phyogs rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-7: 'gro ba'i rgyud dbyings nam mkha' mnyam par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-8: sa rnams yangs pa ji ltar sngon bskyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-9: de bzhin kun kyang rin chen sgo nas brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-10: dang po'i sa ni dga' ba'i shugs kyi yul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-11: phyogs dbyings kun gyi bder gshegs rnams mthong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-12: gzhal med bskal par dri med yongs sbyangs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-13: chos dbyings yangs la ye shes rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-14: thams cad chos la dri med sa gnyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-15: bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por rnam spyad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-16: rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mchod byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-17: 'gro ba tshad med dri med sbyangs pas byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-18: bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od ni sa gsum ste; ;snying po bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor lhag mthong brtan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-19: gang du de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-20: chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen rab tu thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:92b-21: 'od 'phro rgya mtsho ldan pa gzhal med sa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-2: zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-3: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs kun nas rnam sbyangs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-4: dka' rgyal snying po mnyam dbyings mnyam nyid de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-5: zhing rnams kun tu 'gro zhing zhi la gzhol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-6: sa rnams chos yul kun nas rab tu skyes //
