K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-7: de yang rnam dag ji bzhin rgyal bas bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-8: shes rab rgya mtsho yangs pa'i sprin la spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-9: 'byams klas chos kyi mthar thug rnam pa kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-10: zhing rnams kun la mngon sum nam mkha' 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-11: de 'byung byang chub shing chen 'di las grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-12: chos dbyings mkha' dang 'dra ba'i lus can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-13: 'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snang byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-14: 'byams klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-15: ring du song mchog de ni rgyal bas bstan; ;thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-16: zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyang mnyam rtogs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-17: bskal ba kun tu 'gro mchog mi g-yo ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-18: gzhal med sa de'i sprin kyang rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-19: tshad med yul can stobs kyis rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-20: rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-21: 'di ni rdul med dge ba'i blo gros sa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-22: bskal pa rgya mtshor byang chub shing las brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-23: chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-24: dus rnams kun 'gengs nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93a-25: sangs rgyas yul gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-0: rgyal @93b ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa gti mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-2: rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams gnas pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-3: dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-4: rgyan dang yul rnams kun la rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-5: de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-6: phan tshun smon lam rnam dag spyod yul te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-7: dag pa mtha' yas bya ba rab tu byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-9: gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-10: bder gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-11: la las rgyal ba'i chos sku de nyid la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-12: kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal med chags med pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-13: mtha' yas chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-14: la las rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-15: phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-16: yon tan mtha' yas 'od sprin rab 'bar ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-17: 'gro ba dang tshul sprin du gyur par mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-18: la la rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-19: dus gsum mnyam nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-20: 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-21: sangs rgyas stobs la rab tu 'jug par mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-22: sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs pa med 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:93b-23: phyogs kun zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-1: snod yin skul bar byed pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la la la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-3: la la sangs rgyas snang ba sna tshogs 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-4: sna tshogs snang bas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-5: rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-6: sangs rgyas 'od ni la las der yang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-7: ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rab bkye ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-8: 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin la la la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-9: sngon chad rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-10: la la dga' zhing rgyal ba shes par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-11: la las bsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-12: bder gshegs bsod nams 'byung ba ji bzhin mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-13: pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-14: ji ltar dag gyur mtshan kyang la las mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-15: sgo rnams kun nas rgyal ba tshad med de; ;mtha' dang dbus med chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-16: sangs rgyas byin rlabs rab tu brjod pa kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-17: rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas yul ni la las mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94a-18: de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-5: 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag thams cad re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par rab tu phab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-6: 'di ltar spos kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char thams cad rab tu phab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-7: rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin dang rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i padmo'i dra ba thams cad kyi sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-8: nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-9: rin po che kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-10: mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-12: tsandan rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-13: rin po che'i gdugs thams cad kyi sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-14: nor bu'i rgyal po sgra dbyangs bzang po yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-15: nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba mang po'i sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-16: rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams cad kyi sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-17: rang rang gi lus las rgyan thams cad 'phyang ba'i sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:94b-18: de lta bu dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du mngon par phab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-0: ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams @95a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-1: rab tu dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin gyi char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu phab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-3: dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-4: ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-6: yang dag par sgrub pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-7: dga' ba'i shugs kyis spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-8: phyogs kyi tshul gzhan dang gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-9: chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-11: yul dang stobs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95a-12: rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa khong du chud par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-0: 'di na ji lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na @95b yang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-1: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-2: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-3: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-7: 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la byin gyi rlabs ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi stobs ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi bsnyengs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:95b-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrog pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi snyan ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi shangs ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-22: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96a-23: ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96b-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa @96b rgya mtsho thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96b-1: ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96b-11: ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96b-13: ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96b-15: ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96b-17: ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho rnams ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:96b-20: ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la yang thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du @97a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-2: sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-3: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-4: sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-5: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-6: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-7: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-8: sangs rgyas kyi shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan par mdzad grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-9: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-10: sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang snyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-12: mtha' yas rgya chen bskal par rab spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-13: byang chub shing drung rang byung yang dag skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-14: phyi mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-15: de bzhin gshegs pas sku ni byin gyis brlabs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-16: 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi the tshom gcod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97a-17: mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-0: sems can sdug bsngal mtha' yas @97b zhi bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-1: sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba thams cad 'god //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-2: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas zhing rdul snyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-3: de bzhin gshegs la lta zhing kun nas gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-4: de dag bsam pa spyod yul ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-5: the tshom bsal bar chos rnams rab bstan gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-6: rgyal ba kun gyi sa ni ji lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyud rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-8: sangs rgyas byin rlabs mtha' dang dbus med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-9: de dag tshul ni rnam dag bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ci yis 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-11: rgyal ba'i mkhyen la ji ltar 'jug pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-12: rgya chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam sbyang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-13: rgyal sras kun la yang dag bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-14: sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-15: mi bsnyengs chos nyid ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-16: rdzu 'phrul mthu yang mtha' dang dbus med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-17: 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams la bsgrag tu gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-18: ji ltar chos rgyal pho brang mnga' mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-19: rgyal ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrog dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-20: sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-21: thugs brtse'i slad du yang dag bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-22: rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar tshad med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-23: snyan dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-24: sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:97b-25: 'di dag tshul la 'jug pa bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-0: zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar @98a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-2: chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-3: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-4: 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan du gsol; ;pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-5: rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-6: chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-7: byang chub snying por thams cad bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas zhal gyi sgo tshams kyi mtshams kyi gseb nas 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bkye ba 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-9: rin po che'i ze ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-11: chos kyi dbyings su dbyangs sna tshogs kyis rgyan byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-13: 'od shin tu phra ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-15: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-16: snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-18: rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98a-20: rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams @98b cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-2: rin po che'i rdo rje dri ma med pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-7: de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-8: 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-9: 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-10: de dag rab tu 'phros nas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nas 'od zer gyi sgo de dag thams cad kyi mthus gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:98b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-0: 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshigs su bcad @99a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-1: pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-2: bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-3: phyogs rnams rgya mtshor sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-4: sems can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-5: rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-6: phyogs rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-7: spu rnams kun nas sprul pa'i sprin rnams 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-8: des ni sems can snod bzhin bskul byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-9: byang chub sbyor ba chags med rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-10: srid pa'i rgyud na sngon chad 'khor ba'i tshe; ;rgyal bas sems can yongs su smin mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-11: de dag skad cig gcig gis rab tu bkrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-12: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag mtha' yas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-13: rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun tu 'od kyang snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-14: byang chub shing ni yal ga rin chen 'phyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-15: 'od rnams bkye ba kun tu rnam par brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-16: byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab der sangs rgyas; ;phyogs rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-17: sems can kun gyi sems bzhin tshim byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-18: sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-19: de las chos nyid zhi sgra rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-20: zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed sngon chad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-21: spyod tshe pha rol phyin kun rgyas par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99a-22: stobs rnams kun la sangs rgyas rab bzhugs kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-0: rgyal ba de @99b yi zhal bltar kun kyang deng //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-1: zhing gi rdul snyed phyogs rnams thams cad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-2: rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' ste lhags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-3: mchod pa sna tshogs char pa rab 'bebs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-4: thams cad 'khod de rgyal ba mngon sum lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-5: gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas mdo yi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-6: rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-7: 'gro kun yid bzhin chos kyi char 'bebs kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-8: rkang gnyis gtso bo de la bltar yang deng //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-9: dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-10: skad cig thugs la de dag mngon sum ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-11: rgyal ba byang chub shing drung ston mdzad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-12: rgyal ba'i drung du smyur te 'dod bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-13: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes mtsho //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-14: 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-15: de yi chos nyid ji ltar ji 'dra de dag ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-16: sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon sum chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-17: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul ba'i rnams byang chub sems dpa' rang rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'phags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:99b-18: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100a-0: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang 'dabs chags su @100a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100a-1: shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho padmo'i dpal dri ma med par snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100a-3: nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal padmo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing rin po che'i char gyi 'od zer padmo'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100a-5: rin po che'i ri bo'i zom gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100a-6: nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100b-0: rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun @100b nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100b-1: sil snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100b-2: phye ma'i shing gi mdzod kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100b-4: bdug spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100b-5: spos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100b-6: de dag la sogs pa mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100b-7: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te me tog snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sengge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:100b-8: de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad snang bas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang @101a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-1: chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-3: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-4: nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i snying po'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-5: nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-6: nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-7: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-8: nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-9: nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi yal ga sna tshogs kyis snying po byang chub kyi rgyan byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-10: nor bu'i rgyal po sgo kun nas rin po che'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101a-11: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101b-0: nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang ma 'dres par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du @101b gzugs brnyan ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101b-1: nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro shin tu sdug pa'i sgron mas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101b-2: nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101b-4: nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyi dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101b-5: de dag la sogs pa nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra mo snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101b-6: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs su brten te aindra n'i la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101b-8: padma r'a ga sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sengge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:101b-9: de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su nub phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag las 'jig rten @102a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102a-1: gyi khams gos kyi stan yongs su 'byung ba na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mngon du snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102a-4: me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102a-5: nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pas brgyan par khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102a-6: rin po che'i sgron ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102a-7: spos 'od 'phro ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102a-8: mu tig thams cad kyi khang ba brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102a-9: rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102a-10: rin po che'i phreng bas yongs su brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102b-0: 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'phro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan @102b thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102b-1: rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan cing rgyan du ma yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102b-2: phyogs thams cad rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102b-3: sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102b-4: dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102b-5: de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102b-6: bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs su brten te sengge'i khri rin po che'i padmo chen po lo ma sna tshogs gser las byas pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:102b-7: de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su byang phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bee d'urya padmo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog autpa la'i rgyan na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang @103a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-1: chub sems dpa' sengge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-2: spos dang nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-3: sgo thams cad nas lo ma'i dog pa'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-4: shing gi gzugs thams cad las rgyan mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-5: me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu nar pa'i me tog gi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-6: rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-7: tsandan gyi phye ma thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed yang dag par ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103a-9: sngon gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103b-0: kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gos kyi mdzod @103b kyi nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103b-1: sgra dbyangs thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra kun tu gtong ba'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103b-2: de dag la sogs pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103b-3: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te sengge'i khri nor bu sgron ma'i padmo'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103b-4: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su byang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103b-5: shar gyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103b-6: shel gyi kha dog tshon gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:103b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi snying po na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104a-1: khri rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i padmo'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104a-2: sengge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun tu mngon pas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104a-3: sengge'i khri rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104a-4: sengge'i khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgro na ma sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104a-5: sengge'i khri phyogs kun nas phreng ba rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104a-6: sengge'i khri spos kyi me tog padmo'i phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104a-7: sengge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104a-8: sengge'i khri rgyan dang phreng ba thams cad 'phyang zhing rta babs dang stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104b-0: sengge'i khri shing thams cad kyi yal ga las nor bu rin po che dang phye ma 'byung ba'i @104b snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104b-1: sengge'i khri spos dang rin po che'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104b-2: de dag la sogs pa sengge'i khri'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104b-3: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104b-4: shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te sengge'i khri nor bu rin po che snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi padmo sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104b-5: de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su shar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104b-6: lho'i phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho beed'urya'i 'od zer kun tu snang ba gser gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dpal dri ma med par snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:104b-8: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-1: rgyal po thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-2: rin po che aindra n'i la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-3: spos rin po che'i bla re thams cad kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-4: rin po che 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-5: nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-7: sgra dbyangs rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-10: rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-11: me tog thams cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-12: dril bu sna tshogs kun tu sgras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105a-13: padmo'i dra ba mtha' yas pa sna tshogs rin po che'i snying po can gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105b-0: gser gyi ze ba 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog @105b par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105b-1: rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105b-3: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105b-5: lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te sengge'i khri padmo sna tshogs rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105b-6: de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su lho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105b-7: nub kyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi ma'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar bas kun tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:105b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang sengge ltar snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106a-0: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par @106a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106a-2: 'od zer snang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106a-3: mu tig mang po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106a-4: nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo nas rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106a-5: rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106a-6: rin po che'i tshon rnams pa sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106a-7: rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106a-8: nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma rnam par snang ba'i lte ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106a-9: spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106b-1: de dag la sogs pa gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106b-2: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106b-3: nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten te sengge'i khri aindra n'i la yid du 'ong bar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106b-4: de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su nub dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106b-5: byang gi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mda' 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106b-7: gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106b-8: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:106b-9: rin po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107a-0: rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun @107a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107a-1: nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107a-2: me tog gi sprin gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107a-3: 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107a-4: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gyi khongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107a-5: rin po che'i yal ga'i sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107a-6: nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che beed'urya'i rigs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107a-7: sems skad cig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107a-8: sems skad cig gcig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas @107b yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107b-1: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i sgra sgrog pa nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107b-2: de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107b-3: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107b-4: byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten te sengge'i khri 'od zer 'bar ba mi zad pa'i gzi brjid kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107b-5: de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang 'dabs chags su 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho padmo dri zhim dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sengge snang zhing 'bar ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:107b-7: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108a-1: thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108a-2: spos thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108a-3: rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108a-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjed pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108a-6: me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108a-7: bskal pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par sangs rgyas yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya bar brjod pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108a-8: rin po che zad mi shes pa thams cad dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108b-0: @108b bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'og gi phyogs su brten nas sengge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108b-3: brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108b-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108b-5: rin po che kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:108b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya chen pos rnam par snang bar 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109a-2: rgyan thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109a-4: shing dang za ba rnam pa sna tshogs su 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109a-5: rdo rje sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109a-6: nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa brjod cing 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109a-7: mu tig gi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109a-8: de dag la sogs pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109a-9: bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su brten te sengge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109b-0: de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul @109b shin tu phra ba snyed nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing 'ongs par gyur te gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te sengge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul cing skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109b-1: 'khod pa'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad re re nas 'od zer gyi sprin rin po che thams cad ltar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109b-2: rin po che re re'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i khri padmo'i snying po can la 'khod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:109b-3: byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyi sbubs gang bar byas nas rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang zhing 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu 'jug par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-0: zhing re rer yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad @110a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-1: mthong zhing shes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-2: sems kyi skad cig re re la yang rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-3: sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re'i lha'i gnas thams cad du skye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-4: 'chi 'pho ba yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-5: sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-6: sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-7: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-8: sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110a-9: smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110b-0: sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag rnam par bstan cing brjod pa'i sgo dag nas yang @110b dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110b-1: sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin thams cad kyi char dbab pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110b-3: sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110b-4: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110b-5: 'od thams cad kyi sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110b-6: sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110b-7: de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang ste sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bskul ba byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag tu rab tu bdal te zhing re re yang sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:110b-9: rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111a-0: @111a *// sems can phyin ci log la nges pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111a-12: sngon chad ma bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par thob pa la yang dag par skul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111a-15: zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan chos thams cad kun nas snang zhing gzigs pa la yongs su sbyangs te rab tu 'god do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111a-16: zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed stobs thams cad kyis rab tu gnas pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-0: zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra @111b ba snyed de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu 'god do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-1: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-2: 'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-5: dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun tu bkang zhing sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-6: bskal pa rgya mtshor skye med spyad pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-7: sdug bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun 'grol kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-8: yid la skye med zhum pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-9: 'di yi tshul la rgyal sra rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-10: chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-11: tshul 'dir bskal pa rgya mtsho zad par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-12: mtha' med dbus med lhag ma gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-13: de dag chos nyid zhi ba rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-14: dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-15: rgyal sras de dag 'gro la phan dog tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-16: de dag thams cad ma lus yongs su spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-17: de dag spyod pa'i rgyan ni 'di 'dra 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-18: rgyal ba kun gyi 'khor du nyer phyin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-19: phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-20: rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho'i blo gros can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-22: 'od zer sgo rnams re rer mtha' pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-23: bsam yas zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-24: spyod pas mig ni kun nas yongs dag ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:111b-25: rgyal sras de dag spyod yul 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-0: skra rtse gcig tu de dag rab @112a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-2: zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyod byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-3: sems can rnams la 'jigs pa mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-4: sa 'di rnam dag tshul 'chang dag gi 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-5: tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis mi khyab lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-6: de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs sprul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-7: skad cig sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-8: rgyan 'di sems la chags med rnams kyi 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-9: dus gsum bskal pa gang yong ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-10: skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-11: sgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-12: de 'dra'i chos nyid chags med blos rtogs so; ;bzang po'i spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-13: 'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-14: rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-15: 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas rnam par 'phrul ba thob par bya ba'i phyir smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang ba phyogs rnam par ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112a-17: 'od zer rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog sgron ma'i sprin du brdal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 'byams klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te phyogs thams @112b cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas nas sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po thams cad rab tu bskyod pa'i rgyan gyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bskyod nas sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad dang mnyam pa dag tu rab tu spros nas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba rgya mtsho dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi char dus gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa phab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112b-2: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams cad las rab tu gdon par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji bzhin du 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dag tu dga' bar phrad par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar padmo chen po chu ba rin po che thams cad las bsgrubs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112b-5: nang rim nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs las byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:112b-6: lo ma rin po che thams cad kyi rigs kyi char 'bebs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-0: @113a *// ze ba'i phreng ba'i rgyan spos rin po che thams cad las byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-1: snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par bris pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-2: 'od kyi 'khor rnam par dag cing 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bas byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-3: rgyan thams cad rab tu 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-4: sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' yas pa ston pa'i sgra rab tu 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-5: nor bu'i rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-6: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-8: smon lam thams cad rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-9: padmo chen po de byung ba'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod spu de nyid nas byung ba ste bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te padmo chen po de'i snying po la 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113a-11: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gya [*gyi?] khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag kyang ze ba'i phreng ba de dag la 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing tshad med pas rab tu dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa @113b de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-2: zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa dang ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas kun tu khebs par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-3: sems kyi skad cig thams cad la dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kun tu sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-4: chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dus gsum khyab par byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-5: phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'chang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-6: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-7: rnam par thar pa la rnam par spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-8: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-9: chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-10: rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-11: sangs rgyas sku ni chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-12: 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba mngon sum ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-13: ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rgyas bkang nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-14: snying po byang chub de la rgyal ba bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-15: zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-16: rgyal ba spu rtse kun la rab bzhugs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:113b-18: kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mchog ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-0: @114a *// spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-1: byang chub snying por padmo'i gdan la bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-2: chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-3: spu rnams kun la rnam par 'phrul pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-4: zhing rnams re re dag na rab bzhugs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-5: zhing rnams 'byams klas kun tu rgyas mdzad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-6: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-7: kun kyang snying po byang chub drung du 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-8: zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-11: chos dbyings 'byams klas rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-12: zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-13: chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-14: kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-16: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog yul can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-17: sangs rgyas chos sprin nyan cing rab tu mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun na gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-19: zhing rnams kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-20: rgya mtsho'i chos la rnam par snang bar spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-21: de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgya mtsho zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-22: sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-23: de dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-24: sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-25: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114a-26: sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-0: de dag rnam @114b 'phrul rgya chen kun la zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-1: zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mang snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-2: lus kyi sprin ni rtag par rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-3: sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la skyob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-4: bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal padmo rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-7: sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-8: dus rnams kun tu de 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-9: chos dbyings thugs su chud pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-10: 'jig rten mgon zhes rab tu brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-11: yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-12: 'dres pa med cing gnas pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-13: sems can thams cad yid bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-14: gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-15: chos rnams thams cad mngon sangs rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-16: chos rnams kun la rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-17: thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-18: zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-19: kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-20: sems can thams cad yid bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-21: sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-22: de bzhin sku yi sprin kyang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-24: mi zad sangs rgyas sprul ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-25: zhing rnams kun tu rab sgrog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-26: chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-27: spu rnams re re kun nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-28: phyogs bcur 'od zer dra ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-29: sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-30: gdul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:114b-31: sangs rgyas 'od zer sgo rnams nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-0: sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tu @115a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-2: sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-4: sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-5: mtha' dang dbus med rab tu bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-6: ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-7: rgya chen phyogs su rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-8: 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-9: rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-10: chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-11: yang dag sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-12: sku rnams re re kun las kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-13: zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-14: sangs rgyas sems can mnyam phyung zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-15: rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu ston; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-16: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-17: chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-18: sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-19: rgya chen gsung ni rang byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-20: zhing rnams rgya mtshor shin tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-22: 'jig rten mgon po shin tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-23: 'gro ba kun gyi bsam mkhyen cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-24: byin gyi rlabs ni rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-25: sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun la mngon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-26: sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-27: thams cad gzigs pas sangs rgyas kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-28: rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-29: mtha' yas 'od mnga' sangs rgyas sprin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115a-30: chos rnams rgya mtsho'i 'brug kyang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-0: ye shes rnam @115b rgyu'i tshul bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-1: rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-3: 'byung ba yod par rnam par bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-4: gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-5: chos rnams 'byung ba nam mkha' bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-6: 'pho dang gnas pa mi mnga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-7: 'on kyang rgyal ba kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-8: sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings las byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-9: de phyir sangs rgyas rab tu brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-10: yul na bzhugs med rang bzhin med; ;de la 'byung ba mi mnga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-11: sku dang mtshan kyang de bzhin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-13: 'gro ba kun tu chos kyi sprin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-14: bsam pa kun la rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-15: yang dag sangs rgyas rnam kun tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-16: sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-17: 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-18: snying po byang chub kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-19: 'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-20: zhing rnams kun gyis rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:115b-22: yon tan rgya mtsho zad mi shes //
