K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-21: phyogs rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-22: zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-23: zhing gi rnams ni rgya mtsho'i klong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-24: phyogs kyi rnams kyang kun tu gnon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-25: zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-26: aindra n'i lar kun nas gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-27: spyi'i tshugs dag dang snrel zhi dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-28: padmo'i dbyibs dang khyad khyud dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-30: gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119a-31: chos kyi dbyings rnams gar phyin par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-0: thug pa @119b med par gram brdal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-1: de dag kun gyi 'khor rnams su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-2: shin tu bstan pa'i chos 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbyings na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-4: 'khod pa'i zhing rnams bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-5: de dag kun tu chos nyid 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-6: 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-7: tha dad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-9: gcig gi tshul gyi rnam pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-10: chos bstan pa ni kun tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-11: sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-12: tshul rnams thams cad rab tu brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-13: dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-14: mi zad tshul rnams rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-15: sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-16: rgyal ba rnams ni mig yor 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-17: snying po byang chub rnams na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-18: 'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-20: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-21: blta zhing blta zhing sangs rgyas rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-22: sku gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-23: dga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-24: chos kyi shugs ni rab tu 'phel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-25: mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-26: phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-27: rdul rnams kun tu 'jug pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-28: sangs rgyas sprin kyang de bzhin bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-29: skad cig skad cig sems kun la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:119b-31: rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-1: rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-2: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-3: rgya mtsho chos las byung ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-5: 'di yi yul la rnam par spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-6: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-7: gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-8: de dang de rnams zhing dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-9: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul kun la lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-10: ye shes zab mo rnam gnon cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-11: chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-12: mos pa rgya mtsho shes pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-13: smon lam kun gyis byung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dang gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-15: chags pa med la rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-16: spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-17: spyod yul kun kyang khong du chud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-19: ye shes spyod yul gyur pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-20: chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-21: rgyal ba rnams kyi sa gnon to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-22: skad cig sems kyis zhing gi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-23: sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul mnyam pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-24: de dag chos nyid ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-25: rdul gcig steng du rnam par spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-26: zhing rnams ji snyed thams cad na; ;zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-27: chos nyid 'di la zhugs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-28: zhing gcig tu ni sdud pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-29: de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-30: brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-31: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-32: zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120a-33: de dag gsung ni zab mo 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-0: @120b dbyangs kyi yan lag kun rgyas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-1: chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-2: brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-3: sems can kun gyi skad dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-4: sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-5: chos rnams bstan pa rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-6: zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-7: sangs rgyas rnams par 'phrul mthong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-8: sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-9: byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-10: rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-11: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-12: sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-13: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-14: chos kyi sku ni tha dad min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-15: nam mkha' bzhin te chags pa med; ;gzugs kyi skur ni rnam dmigs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-16: mig yor snang ba'i mtshan nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-17: mig yor yul la mi gnas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-18: nam mkha' bzhin du dngos po med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-19: mnyam pa nyid 'di rtogs gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-20: ye shes rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-21: sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-22: gzung ba med cing 'byung ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-23: nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-24: gzung du med las 'di bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-25: zhing rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-26: de dag spu gcig rtse la tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-27: ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-28: spu rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-29: rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-30: chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-31: bla med chos kyi 'khor lo dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-32: zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-33: ji ste bskal pa bsam yas par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-34: spu rtse gcig tu rnam sprul pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:120b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121a-0: de yi mtha' ni rnyed par @121a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121a-1: dka'; ;ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub tu phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag tu byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho byed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun nas 'dus par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121a-2: 'di na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na rab tu ston to ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121a-3: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo; sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po sengge'i khri padmo'i snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121a-8: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-0: chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par @121b btags pa'i tshogs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-1: nam mkha'i dbyings chags pa med cing rgya che ba khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-2: chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i klong mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song zhing shin tu brdal ba'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bas rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-3: phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lus kyis kun nas yog par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-4: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba rgya mtsho'i klong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-5: phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon du yang dag par ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar bas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snying po can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-7: zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-8: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su grub par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-9: bskal pa thams cad du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:121b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo ston cing rjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-0: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i @122a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-1: snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-3: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa; phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-4: dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i rigs su gtogs pa; shin tu phra zhing bsgribs pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-5: phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ris su gtogs pas rnam par non pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-7: sangs rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chud pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-8: chos kyi dbyings dang sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122a-9: chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa dag tu rdul phra mo re re la'ang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs nas zhing re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin @122b gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-1: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag pa'i rjes la de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-4: khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po 'di la mnyam par gzhag pa legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-7: khyod la phyog [*phyogs?] bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-8: khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-9: spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i yang mthus 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rnam par dbye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-12: chos thams cad kyi tshul gyis phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus par snang bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:122b-13: sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-0: @123a *// chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad yongs su gnon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-1: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-2: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-3: chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-4: chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-5: sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-7: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-8: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-9: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'jig pa dang 'du ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-11: chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123a-12: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-0: ting nge 'dzin @123b thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-2: sems can thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-3: chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams mang po thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-5: sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-6: ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa la nye bar bsgrubs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na lus 'khod pa thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrubs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-10: 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g-yas pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par mdzes par brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-12: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-13: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:123b-14: rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-0: phyogs thams cad du spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od kyis rnam par snang @124a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-1: pa; sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su sgra 'byin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-3: khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-6: da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba rnam par ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i snang ba yang dag par ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-8: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba rnams brkyangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-9: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-10: 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na yod pa thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung dag tu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab tu bzhag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-11: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis reg ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dus gsum thams cad du sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124a-12: ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-0: dus gsum du mnyam @124b pa'i rdul thams cad kyi sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-3: da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-4: sems can ma lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang mnyam zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-5: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ming gi 'khor lo las ldang ba'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-6: phyogs mtshams thams cad du chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-7: rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin mtha' dang dbus med par 'byams klas pa'i sgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-8: chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dag nas langs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-9: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ting nge 'dzin las langs ma thag tu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang so sor re zhing ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-10: gzungs rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-11: chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-12: so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:124b-13: spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125a-1: phyogs su rnam par snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba'i yon tan gyi snying po can rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125a-3: ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad la zhing gzhan dang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125a-5: byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125a-7: byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125a-8: mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125a-9: 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi khongs na yod pa kun tu yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnams rab tu zhugs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-0: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten @125b gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ma lus par bag langs pa tsam du g-yos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-1: rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-2: chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra yang shin tu grag par gyur te; de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal po chen po bcu'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-5: nor bu'i rgyal po mtshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyi sprin char mngon par bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-7: nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-9: nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur rin po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grem pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-11: nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che'i snying po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-13: nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgya thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo; ;'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-14: nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed cing snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:125b-16: nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-0: nor bu'i rgyal pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo dang mthu rab tu grag par byed pa'i sprin gyi char @126a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-3: nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-5: nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad khyab par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-6: nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-8: 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-9: zhing rnams 'byams klas kun na kun tu bzang po de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-10: padmo yid du 'ong la rab tu 'dug pa mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-11: kun tu rnam 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra ston byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-12: ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-13: lus rnams thams cad nas kyang kun tu bzang po de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-14: sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings rtag par 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-15: ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang ming dang rnam 'phrul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-16: thams cad dbyangs kyis chags pa byed par rgya che sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-17: ting 'dzin thams cad gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam 'phrul gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-19: rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-20: zhing rnams kun tu rnam par 'phrul ba mang po ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-21: zhing kun rgyal ba kun gyi zhabs drung ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-22: de ltar zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126a-23: ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ma lus ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-0: rnam par snang @126b mdzad smon lam dbyings la rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-1: kun tu bzang po'i lus ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-2: thams cad zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-3: lus kyi sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par kun bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-4: sems can kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-5: sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-6: mtha' dang dbus med kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-7: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-8: rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-9: 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rdul bral mtha' dang dbus med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-10: tshad med thams cad lus kyi nang du kun chub cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-11: dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam 'tshang rgya bstod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-12: skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-13: zhing rnams thams cad 'byams klas pa na rnam grags shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-14: rnam par 'phrul pa dam pa bstan par rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-15: phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-16: kun tu bzang po de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-17: rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes stobs la zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-18: ting 'dzin sa ni tshul rnams kun gyis rab tu mnan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-19: chos rnams 'byams klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-20: rang gi byang chub spyod pa sngon chad spyad pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-21: de ltar zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'phrul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-22: phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:126b-23: ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-0: rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon @127a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la lta zhing dbyangs kyi nga rog cig tu de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-3: rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-4: smon lam kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-5: de bzhin nyid mnyam nam mkha'i snying po ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-6: chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-7: zhing rnams 'byams klas kun la bzhugs med kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-8: kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-9: phyogs bcu kun tu yon tan grags pas khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-10: ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-11: rgyal ba thams cad sku thob phyir spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-12: phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-13: rdul sbubs kun tu de dag chud byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-14: zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-15: zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-16: rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyad pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-17: chos rnams kun la spyod cing gnas pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-18: rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-19: chos kyi dbyings rnams lus kyis khyab byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-20: zhing rnams 'byams klas kun la shin tu bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-21: sems can rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-22: rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyings su zhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-23: chos kyi dbyings la de ltar zhugs nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127a-24: rdul phran kun la mi zad tha mi dad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-0: nam mkha'i @127b dbyings ni lus kyis gang byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-1: rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-2: yon tan rgya mtsho 'od kun gzhal du med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-3: rnam yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sprin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-4: 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i don du spyod byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-5: rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-6: gang gi don du bskal pa rgya mtsho dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-7: mtha' yas par ni bzang po'i spyod spyad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-8: de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-9: thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-10: zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-11: stobs bcu rnams kyang ji ltar 'byung 'gyur dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-12: sems can rgya mtsho ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-13: sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs gtong zhing ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-14: 'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-15: kun tu gzang po khyod la mngon sum gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-16: sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang bar gyur pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-17: chos kyi 'khor lo de ring khyod kyis bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-18: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-19: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-20: kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-21: rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-23: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par bltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-24: sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par ltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-25: chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:127b-26: sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-0: @128a *// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-1: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-2: dus rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du zhing 'jig pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen pa ni; bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye shes ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa'i ye shes ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-0: dbang @128b po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig gcig la dus thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni; bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod pa rab tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yongs su dag pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par snang ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su dag pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:128b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dpal rin po @129a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-1: che'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub pa ni; bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum yongs su bstan pas sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu bzhugs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-12: bsam gyis mi khyab bo; ;sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par rgyu ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs la thub pa med pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi bsnyengs pa zil gyis mi non pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la tha mi dad par spyod pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-0: sangs rgyas @129b bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' ba chen po'i ye shes rnam par dag pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'phrog pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-6: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-10: bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rjes su bsab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-12: sems can thams cad kyi dad pa rgya mtsho tha dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-13: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-14: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:129b-15: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-1: dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho rnams de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-3: chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-4: mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-6: snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-7: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-8: ye shes kyi mig dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-9: 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-10: chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-11: snying po byang chub thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-14: yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-15: mtha' dang dbus med des ni zhing rnams khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130a-16: sems can bsam la sbyor ba ji bzhin snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-0: @130b rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-1: bsam gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-2: bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-3: sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin bya'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-4: sems can nang na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-5: sems can rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-6: sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu zab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-7: srid pa'i gnas cad dad pa chung ba yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-8: sangs rgyas byang chub shes par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-9: gzhan du gang rnams shin tu sems brtan cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-10: dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-11: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-12: sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-13: gang rnams sems dag g-yo med sgyu med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-14: snying rje'i bsam can khong nas byams dga' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-15: dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-16: 'di dag thos shing dga' ba thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-17: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sa dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-18: chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-19: gnas shing spyod pa rab tu sus spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-20: de dag rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-21: gang gis rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-22: byang chub sems dpas thob bya legs par thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-23: gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-24: 'di ni kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-26: 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med 'di dag na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:130b-27: kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab 'khor ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-2: bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-3: rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs shing rnams kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-4: de dag spu rtse kun tu blta bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-5: rgyal ba'i spyod yul shin tu bshad par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-6: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam spyod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-7: mtha' dang dbus med mngon par sgrub pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-8: kun tu mig gi yul dang lus ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-9: de dag mgon po'i spyod yul 'di nyan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-16: da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-21: 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shin tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-23: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa shin tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-25: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs dang rnam pa shin tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-27: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-29: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-31: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul shin tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131a-33: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal @131b ba'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-2: bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa shin tu bstan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-10: da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-14: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-15: rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phrag bcus byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-21: sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-23: sems can rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-24: bsod nams kyi rtsa ba skal ba mthun pa bsags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:131b-26: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas rnam par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-1: dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnam par dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las 'das pa dang rgyu mthun pas mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi smon lam gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-5: de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-10: sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bsam yas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-11: byin rlabs rnam 'phrul de dag 'di lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-12: zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan pa mtha' dbus med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-13: rnam par snang mdzad chos kyis yongs su sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-14: byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis bsam pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-15: smon lam rgya mtsho bsam yas rnam sbyangs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-16: sems can las rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132a-17: phyogs kun shing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-0: byang chub sems dpa' kun @132b gyi rnam 'phrul dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-2: smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon bsgrubs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-3: nam mkha'i dbyings la 'byams klas zhing 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-4: spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-5: spyod cing tshad med bde gshegs yul la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-6: phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun spyod zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-7: bskal pa mtha' yas zhing rnams re rer spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-8: sems can bsam dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-9: las kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-10: nyon mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-11: mos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-12: zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyan can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-13: rin chen rgyus byung sna tshogs dri med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-14: dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par spel ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-15: rgyal sras rnams ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-16: chos dbyings rdul gyi khongs su rgyal sras rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-17: kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-18: rdul gyi khongs su mtha' yas zhing ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-19: rnam dag mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dbus kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-21: snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-22: padmo'i stan 'khod kha dog mtha' yas kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-23: de dag zhing bcas lus kyi nang na 'khod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-24: skad cig sems kyis dus gsum byung ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-25: zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus gsum zhing bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:132b-27: rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing mi zad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-1: par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-2: rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyis rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-3: sangs rgyas skad cig gcig la byin gyis rlob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-4: rgyan gyi rnam pa tshul kun rab tu mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-6: de la gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-8: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-9: rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-11: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas so; ;'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-12: rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-16: rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-17: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-18: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-20: sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyis byung pa lha ma yin dang mthu bo che lta bu'i lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-21: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133a-22: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams @133b rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-3: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis byung ba'i rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-4: de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas ba shin tu bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyi sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-7: kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin chen rang bzhin dri med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-8: rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-9: 'di dag rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rgyu yis dbyibs legs 'khor bar rnam pa snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-10: de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings rnams gzhi kun rab tu khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-11: zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri med 'od can nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-12: snang ba'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-13: 'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba 'khor la chos kyi 'khor lo bzang po bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-14: 'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems can rgya chen shin tu mgu byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:133b-15: la la me tog sgron ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-1: ba'i kun nas sprin 'bar spos 'phro sprin gyi 'od can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-2: zhing mang mtha' dang dbus med rgya chen padmo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab brgyan zhing rnams 'byams klas kun kyang rab tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-4: zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs rgyas byin la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-5: yangs shing rin chen mang ldan rgya che de dag byang chub sems dpas gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-6: lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang tshogs lha dbang lus la de bzhin gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-7: de nas bcom ldan rnam par snang ba mdzad kyi 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-8: nor bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-9: chu yi phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-10: la la gos dang brag dang rgyal mtshan me tog sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-11: kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di dag rgya chen rnam par snang mdzad ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-12: zhing rnams ring dang thung dang glang gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs te; ;sna tshogs rgyan can snying po dri ma bral ba yongs dag dri med snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-13: rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-14: sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun nas yog par rtag tu nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134a-15: zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'byams klas la la spyi'u tshugs yod dang med la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i cod pa na rin chen 'khor los bzung bas @134b dag par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-1: de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-2: rin chen sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun tu gtong ldan las kyis de dag sprul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-3: chos kyi dbyings mnyam zhing rnams 'byams klas mig yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-4: mig 'phrul rnam phye rnams dag dri med sems kyis shin tu bskyed pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-5: nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-6: las kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-7: skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'byams klas 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-8: zhing rdul kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-9: de na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-10: chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun tu rnam 'phrul rgya che ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-11: rdul rnams kun na chos dbyings yangs pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-12: sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-13: ji ltar rdul phran gcig la rnam sprul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-14: rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-15: zhing rnams 'byams klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-16: snang ba med cing 'byung med phyogs bcu dag ni 'gro dang 'ong ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:134b-17: mkha' la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-0: shin tu yangs pa de dag smon lam rnam sbyangs las @135a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-3: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyi dbyibs ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni; nam mkha'i rnam pa du mar rnam par phye ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-11: kun nas 'khyil pa'i dbyibs su 'dug go /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-15: shing sna tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbyibs su 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-17: me tog sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-19: khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-21: sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-22: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni; mtshan sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135a-23: de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs shin tu bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed @135b do; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-1: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-2: rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-3: rnam phye sna tshogs mtha' yas dbyibs su gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-4: dbyibs kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-5: phyogs rnams kun na zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-6: la la zlum po la la zur gsum ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-7: de dag la la phyogs na gru bzhir gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-8: nor bu padmo 'khor lo yan lag brgyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-9: kun kyang las rnams rgya mtshos rnam par bris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-10: rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs dang tshul 'dzin cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-11: gser las grub pa rnam phye sna tshogs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-12: sgo mang mtha' yas pa nas rgyu zhing 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-13: las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag pas gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-14: zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs snying po can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-15: nam mkha' 'di la ji ltar sprin gnas bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-16: de dag rin chen mang gzhi rnam par phye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-17: de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-18: zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis rnam par brtags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-19: sna tshogs rgyan dang snang bas kun na gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-20: rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-21: zhing rnams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:135b-22: bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-0: rnam par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin @136a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-1: te; ;chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu yod pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-2: de ltar las rnams rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-3: skra gcig rtse la bsam gyis mi khyab zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-4: thams cad rdul snyed sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-5: kun na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-6: 'khor rnams rgya mtsho chos rnams rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-7: rdul gcig rtse la phra dang yangs pa'i rnams; ;thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-8: kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par brtags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-9: de dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-10: rdul rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-11: de dag smon lam rnam par sprul pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-12: nam mkha'i dbyings su las kyi sprul pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-13: sna tshogs sems dang bsam pas rnam par brtags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-14: sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams thams cad la; ;sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-15: rnam par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-16: rdul phran kun la zhing rnams shin tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-18: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-19: gzhan dang gzhan du shes par bya ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-21: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi lhun can no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-22: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136a-23: rin po che gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhun can no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136b-13: rin po che shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i lhun can no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:136b-17: rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa'i lhun can no //
