K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:140b-18: tshul gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:140b-19: sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:140b-20: tshul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:140b-21: sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:140b-22: sems can gyi khams nyung ngu rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:140b-23: sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:140b-24: sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-0: de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes @141a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-3: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-4: rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-5: sgo nas zhing rnams rgya mtshor rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-6: de dag sems can bsam pa ji bzhin mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-7: sangs rgyas thabs kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-8: sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-9: mig yor ma yin mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-10: gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-11: sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-12: sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-13: la la bskal pa bsam yas byin gyis rlob; ;chos kyi sku ni phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-14: rab tu mdzes par 'gro nang 'di na bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-15: la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-16: sbyong zhing 'byams klas phyogs bcu kun na yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-17: la la zhing gcig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-18: smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-19: la la bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'i rgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-20: sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-21: la la theg pa gcig kyang rab ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-22: rgyal ba'i thabs ni gcig kyang mtha' yas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-23: rang byung la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141a-24: sems can mi mang lam la gzhog pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-0: la la skad @141b cig gcig gis sems can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-1: rgya mtsho bsam yas byang chub don du 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-2: la la spu yi sgo nas bsam yas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-3: sangs rgyas sprul ba'i sprin rnams rab tu 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-4: 'gro ba kun tu de dag mngon bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-5: thabs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-6: la la sangs rgyas gsung gis kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-7: zhing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-8: bsam yas bskal par de dag gsung sgrog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-9: sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-10: la la zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-11: 'khor rnams yongs dag kun nas 'khod bcas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-12: zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs su gang byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-13: sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab par bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-14: de ltar sangs rgyas thabs ni bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-15: zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-16: 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon sum ste; ;sna tshogs rgyan mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-18: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-20: 'di ltar zhing rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-21: bskal pa grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-22: zhing rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-23: bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-24: zhing rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-25: bskal pa dpag tu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-26: zhing rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:141b-27: bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-1: la la ni; bskal pa mtshungs pa med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-2: zhing rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-3: bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-4: zhing rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-5: bskal pa kun nas mu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-6: zhing rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-7: bskal pa gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-8: zhing rgya mtsho la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-9: bskal pa brjod du med par byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-10: de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-13: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-14: 'jig rten rgya mtsho bskal pa tha dad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-15: sna tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-16: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-17: bskal pa'i tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-18: bskal pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-19: phyogs dbyings 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-20: bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang thung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142a-21: bskal pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i sgras kyang bsgrags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-0: rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs @142b dbyings snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-1: byin rlabs bskal pa zhing rdul snyed dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-2: la la gzhan rnams bskal pa gcig gis 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-3: la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-4: bskal pa la la dri med la la nyon mongs can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-5: la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-6: bskal pa'i ming ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-7: sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dad tshul la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-8: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed sngon chad spyod spyad pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-9: 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shin tu yangs shing dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-10: de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-11: 'di dag rgya chen bskal pa'i 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-12: bskal pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen ming sna tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-13: bcom ldan 'das dang 'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mig snang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-14: snang dang dri med bzang po bskal pa'i mig la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-15: bskal pa 'di dag rnam dag bskal pa kun las byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-16: dri med bskal pa la lar sangs rgyas gcig skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-17: bskal pa la lar mi yi gtso bo mtha' yas 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-18: bskal pa'i tshul rnams thams cad sa tshul zad mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-19: smon lam stobs mthus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-20: bskal pa la la mtha' yas rnams kyang bskal pa gcig tu 'dus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-21: bskal pa la la gcig kyang bskal pa bye ba'i mthu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-22: bskal pa rgya mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgo nas 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:142b-23: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi nang nas sgra yang 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-0: bskal pa la lar bskal pa kun gyi rkyen kyang @143a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-2: ming gi rgyan rnams rnam par dag pa'ang de la yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-3: bskal pa la la sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu yis byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-4: bskal pa'i tshul rnams kun gyi 'di ni rgyan yangs yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-5: zhing dang bskal pa rgya mtsho tshul ni gcig gis dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-6: zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang tshad med gzhal du med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-7: skad cig yud tsam nyi ma'i grangs kyi bskal par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-8: 'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnam par 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-10: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-12: 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas 'jig cing 'du ba la rab tu 'jug par gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po gsog pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-16: rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143a-18: byang chub sems dpa' mos pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa rnams skye bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143b-1: sems can rgya mtsho rgya chen po byang chub kyi sems la gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu dag par gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dong bas bskal pa rgyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143b-5: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa rgyan shin tu mang por kun nas gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi rgyan nub par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143b-9: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143b-12: de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:143b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs @144a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-2: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-3: zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di dag ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-4: chos kyis byung ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar; ;de dag 'byung zhing 'jig par 'gyur bar yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-5: zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-6: sems can nyon mongs mi bzad ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-7: las dang nyon mongs ngan pas bsgribs pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-8: de dag bsam la zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-9: kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-10: sems can rnam dag bsam pa ldan pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-11: bsod nams brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-12: rnam dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-13: de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-14: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus dag na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-15: bskal pa de ni rnam par dag par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-16: sems can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-17: de yi chos nyid bsam yas yangs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-18: byang chub bsam pa ji ltar bskyed pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-19: de dag bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'phel bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-20: de bzhin bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-21: bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyan yongs su sbyong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-22: bye ba mang po mtha' yas mi zad pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-23: byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun rgyu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-24: rgyan la rnam pa tha dad yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-25: bskal pa tha dad tshul gyi bye phrag snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144a-26: rdul rnams re re sbubs su dus kun tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-0: sangs rgyas zhing gi @144b rdul dang mnyam pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-1: rgyal sras ji tshul 'dod pa de bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-2: zhing rnams rgya mtsho de tshul dag par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-3: gal te rgyal ba rnams ni skye 'gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-4: zhing rnams rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par 'gyur; ;bsam pa yongs dag de bzhin rgyas 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-5: 'di ni zhing rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-6: gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-7: de tshe de zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-8: sems can rnams kyang snod du rung ba min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-9: zhing gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-10: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-11: bsam gyis mi khyab gang tshe ston pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-12: de tshe zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-13: kun kyang rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-15: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-20: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-25: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:144b-27: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang @145a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-1: chub thams cad nas chos kyis dbyings kyis phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-8: mtshan gyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bskal pa mtha' yas par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba tha mi dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul 'byams klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po ston cing rjod pa tha mi dad pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-0: de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par @145b bya'o; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-1: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-2: rdul gcig steng na zhing mang rgya mtsho ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-3: kun na rgyan mang rnam dag kun yod kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-4: gnod pa med cing 'dra ba gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-5: 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'di la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-6: rdul rnams kun la bsam yas sangs rgyas bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-7: sems can kun gyi bsam pa yid bzhin du; ;zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad khyab byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-8: de dag thabs la tha dad gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-9: rdul rnams kun la shing dbang mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-10: sna tshogs rgyan phyung kun nas bres sbyangs te; ;phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing du mngon bkang yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-11: de dag tha dad 'gyur ba nam yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-12: rdul phran rgya mtsho rdul phran re re la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-13: mi yi gtso bo 'khor rnams kun bskor cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-14: 'jig rten kun tu bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-15: gnod pa dag dang 'dra ba'i nyes pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-16: rdul gcig la ni mtha' yas 'od kyi sprin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-17: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-18: bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod bstan kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-19: rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-20: rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:145b-21: sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu gang byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-0: @146a *// sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can rnams 'dul yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-1: 'byams klas phyogs na tha dad gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-2: rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-3: de dag 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin 'khor mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-4: thabs dang mthu yi sgo mo sna tshogs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-5: thams cad brjod kyang de la tha dad med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-6: rdul gcig la ni rgyal ba kun gyis gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-7: 'gro ba snod du gyur la de dag brjod byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-8: rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-9: de dag gsung gi yan lag tha mi dad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-10: zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-11: thams cad rdul sbubs gcig tu rab tu 'dzud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-12: rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-13: las kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-14: rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-15: ji ltar byung ba de dag thams cad snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-16: de dag gshegs dang byon pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-17: 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-18: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-19: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-0: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang @146b mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe bskal pa rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-1: bskal pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung du smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-4: rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bzung ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-5: de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-6: gzhi kun nas rton pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-7: rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa'i gzhis rten to; ;de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-8: nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzhis rton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-9: de'i steng na rlung gyi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-10: rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i gzhis rton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-11: de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba mnyam par rton pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-12: nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gzhis rton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:146b-13: de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-1: 'khor gyi me tog gi gzhis rton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-2: de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhi kun nas dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-3: me tog thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i sengge'i khri'i gzhis rton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-4: de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs su sgra sgrog cing kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-5: mu tig dang man shel gyi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton to; ;de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-6: nor bu'i rgyal po'i shing dang me tog sna tshogs kyi glang gi gzhis rton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-7: de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-8: spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi sprin gyi gzhis rton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-9: de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor khyim kun tu rgyu pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-10: rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-11: spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi gzhis rton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-13: rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi steng ma ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-14: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-15: nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i gzhis rton to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147a-16: spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gzhis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las padmo chen po spos kyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od zer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-0: ze ba sna tshogs @147b zhes bya ba mngon par 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-1: padmo chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-4: shin tu brtan pa; rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor yug gis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-5: rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-6: shing gi rgyud rgya mtsho sa la rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-8: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-9: gzhi rgyan me tog 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-10: rin chen kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-11: rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sngon chad sangs rgyas kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-12: drung du sngon tshe rgya mtshor sbyangs pas dri ma med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-13: rgya chen snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-14: zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun btang nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-15: sngon gyi bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-16: 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-17: sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-18: 'od snang btang ba mkha' yi dkyil na gnas pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:147b-19: rlung gi phung pos btab kyang mi bskyod mi g-yo ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-2: me tog mdzod bkye gtor ba rin chen yid 'ong bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-3: sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis mkha' yi dbyings la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-4: rgya mtsho'i rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-5: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-6: nor bu thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnams; ;byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs rnams kun tu 'dong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-7: 'od zer me tog tshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-8: phyogs rnams ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-9: rin chen kun gyis 'od zer sprin rnams bkye ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-10: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-11: sdug bsngal thams cad bcil zhing byang chub mchog la bgrod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-12: 'jig rten rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-13: 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-14: rin chen kun dang spu rnams kun nas rgyal ba 'gyed; ;brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa 'ang 'khor lo sgyur 'dra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-15: 'gro ba kun gyi lus su lus rnams kun kyang gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-16: sprul pas 'od bkye chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad mnyam pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-17: 'od zer sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad mtshan kyang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-18: 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi bsam pa tshim byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148a-19: tshul rnams sna tshogs sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-0: 'jig @148b rten rgya mtsho me tog snying po de nang na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-1: rdul phran kun gyi khongs na chos dbyings thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-2: rin chen 'od bkye sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar bar snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-3: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par 'phrul ba'i zhing la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-4: bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sangs byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-5: smon lam yangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-6: bzang po'i spyod pa brnyes shing ye shes sa ldan pa'i; ;dgongs pa las ni rgyan mdzes de dag byung ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-7: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-8: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-12: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i khor yug chen po ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-13: nor bu rgyal po padmo nyi ma'i gzhi la brten pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-14: nor bu'i rigs rgya mtsho spos kyi tsandan thams cad las grub pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-15: nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis lhun shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-16: nor bu'i spos zhim po gzi brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba'i snying po can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-17: nor bu'i rgyal po rdo rje sra zhing mi shigs pa ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-18: rin po che'i chu thams cad kun nas 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:148b-19: rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad me tog shin tu rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-1: kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-2: spos kyi me tog dpal can shin tu bzang bas rnam par brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-3: nor bu'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyings lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bres pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-4: de dag la sogs pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'khor yug gi rgyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-6: yon tan yongs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-7: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rgya mtsho gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-9: mtha' dang dbus med sna tshogs rnam pa can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-10: nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mdog //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-11: de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-12: dri med khor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-13: nor bu mang po de bzhin spos mang dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-14: mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-15: kha dog mtha' yas rin chen rnams kyis brtan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-16: snying po nor bu'i sprin can sna tshogs sra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-17: 'dzam bu chu klung 'od 'phro snying po'i tshogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-18: 'od 'phro dam pa phyogs su snang zhing 'tsher //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-19: khor yug dri ma med pa rnams par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-20: nor bu rdo rjes shing tu sra shing brtan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149a-21: mtshams rnams mi phyed nor bu sna tshogs 'brul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-0: mtshan @149b ldan nor bu rin chen rnam bkod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-1: rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-2: spos chu'i sprin gyis kha dog mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-3: rin chen tsandan me tog kun tu bkram //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-4: padmo sna tshogs gos kyis kun nas yog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-5: rin chen rtsi mchog dri zhim rnams dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-6: sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-7: nor bzang kun gyis kun nas gzi brjid 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-8: 'od zer sprin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-9: gos kyi mdzod kyis shin tu 'bar bar gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-10: spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug pa'i gdugs 'chang ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-11: byang chub sems dpa' mang pos chos dbyings gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-12: sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-13: 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-14: rin chen mdzes pa de dag thams cad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-15: nor bu dag dang kun nas 'od 'phro'i shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-16: kun la rnam par snang mdzad sku gsal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-17: gzugs brnyan tshul du nang na yod pa snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-18: thams cad gzugs su sku rnams mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-19: sangs rgyas sprul mang kha dog mu med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-20: thams cad phyogs dang chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-21: sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-22: thams cad rgyan las sgra dbyangs kun 'byung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-23: rnam par snang mdzad smon lam 'khor lo yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-24: zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-25: de kun de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:149b-26: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-0: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba @150a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-1: las; 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i khor yug gi rgyan rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-4: de la khor yug chen po de'i nang ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-5: nor bu mang po'i brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-6: rdo rje ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra la brtan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-7: rin po che'i rigs thams cad las grub pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-8: rgya mtshos rnam par phye ba mi shigs pa'i snying po can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-9: mi mtho ba mi dma' ba'i thang mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-10: nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-11: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'i nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-12: rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-13: rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i padmo thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-14: dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-15: nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi mdzod thams cad kyis sa gzhi mnyam par bdal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-16: nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rgyan gyis sprin gyi dra ba rnam par bres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-0: nor bu'i dra ba mig 'phrul lta bu @150b rnam par phye ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-2: de dag la sogs pa sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu dra ba snyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-5: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-6: sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam par dag mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-7: 'khor lo'i dra bas bsgrubs pa mi shigs sra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-8: rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-9: rin chen sna tshogs kun gyis kun tu gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-10: yid 'ong sa ni rdo rje gser gyi gzhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-11: rin chen chu bo ri bo'i 'khor los bsgrubs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-12: padmo'i dkyil 'khor gzhi yin me tog sa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-13: tsandan phye ma rin chen kun tu bkram //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-14: 'od zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-16: sangs rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par bkram //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-17: sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas yog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-18: thams cad sprin ni phyogs na stug lding bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-19: mi zad yangs pa kun nas khebs par 'dug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-20: zhing rnams thams cad phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-21: sangs rgyas chos ni snyan par rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-22: rin chen nang snang sangs rgyas smon lam kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:150b-23: shin tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-1: spyod pa ji 'dra spyod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-2: kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-3: de yi rgya mtsho nor bu sna tshogs gting //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-4: de yi nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-5: sangs rgyas spyod yul de dag zhing gi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-6: rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-7: me tog snying po tshon gyi 'khor los bsgrubs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-8: der ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'dong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-10: snying po byang chub 'khor du rnam 'phrul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-11: rin chen 'od zer 'od dang ldan pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-12: sa yi nor bu rgyan las rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-13: sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di yang rtag tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-14: chos dbyings nam mkha' lta bu kun tu 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-15: sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya chen dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-16: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sus shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-17: de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-18: zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phrul la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-19: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-20: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-21: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa gzhi'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-24: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151a-25: de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-0: nor bu'i rgyal @151b po dang spos thams cad kyis klung rab tu bsgrubs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-1: nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i dra bas kun nas bres pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-2: rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang mchog tu snang ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su rgyas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-3: rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs klong du 'khyil pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-4: tsandan gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-6: smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-7: rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par snang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bur rab tu 'gyed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-9: kha dog dang dbyibs mtha' yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs par rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-10: dmigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad snang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-11: phyogs kun nas rin po che'i them skas kyi phreng ba bcur rab tu bkye ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-12: mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor ba'o; ;rin po che shel gyi rgyal mtshan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:151b-15: me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chu klung gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa bcus kun nas bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-0: nor bu thams cad kyi padmo yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas @152a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-3: nor bu rdo rje shin tu sra ba'i gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-4: rin po che thams cad kyi me tog punda r'i ka dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-5: spos kyi chu yongs su rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-7: rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba rin po che 'bar zhing kun nas 'phyang ba'i nor bu'i dra ba can gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-10: nor bu mang po sgra thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-11: sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-12: chu klung gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'gram shin tu brgyan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-17: dril bu mang po thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan shin tu rgyas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-18: rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas kun nas bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-20: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-21: sa steng de na spos kyi chu bo yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152a-22: rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnam brjod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-0: gzhi rnams rin chen gos kyis kun @152b bting ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-1: mi shigs rdo rje lta bu sra zhing mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-2: spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-3: nyi ma'i nor bu 'od 'phro stug sprin dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-4: padmo rin chen phreng ba'ang kun nas bres //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-5: gzhi rnams dri med yid du 'ong ba'o;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-6: spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-7: rin chen 'od zer sna tshogs me tog klong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-8: sgra dbyangs rab tu gtong ba'i dbyangs kyis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-9: sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul ba rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-10: them skas phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-11: gzhi ni rin chen nor bu mang pos brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-12: stegs bu kun bkod rin chen padmo yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-13: sprin stug dra ba rnam par bres pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-14: rin chen nor bu'i shing gi phreng ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-15: rin chen gser gyi kha dog yid 'ong 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-16: 'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-17: rnam par 'phrul mang dbyangs su rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-18: spos chus yongs gang rin chen bsgrubs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-19: me tog punda r'i kas kun nas bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-20: spos dang 'od dang bdug spos 'od zer 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-21: de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-22: rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'bar ba can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-23: gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun 'phyang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-24: rin chen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-25: thams cad mkhyen par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-26: padmo'i grong khyer rnams kyis kun nas bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-27: kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-28: phyogs rnams kun nas mu tig sprin bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:152b-29: grong khyer rgya mtshos de dag rab tu brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-0: @153a *// dra ba bzang pos kun nas bskor ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-1: rin chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyab kyi bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-2: rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-3: rgya mtshos bzang zhing mdzes par rab tu brgyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-4: sngon chad sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-5: sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yongs sbyangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-6: shin tu rgya che mtha' dang dbus med pa'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-7: de dag kun na rnam par 'phrul pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-8: spos chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang spos chu'i chu klung g-yas phyogs su 'khor zhing 'bab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-9: gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'khor bar byas pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-10: spos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad kyang 'khor kun nas rdo rje'i padmo kha dog dang dri mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-11: nor bu'i 'khor lo dang; nor bu'i 'od rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyis mtha' kun nas dkris pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-12: sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bus rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-13: sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i dril bu'i dra ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khebs pa'o; ;spyod pa'i 'od kyi klong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu rab tu 'byung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153a-14: nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od shin tu 'bar ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-0: @153b 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bur snang ba thams cad kyis shin tu yog par byas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-1: nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i snying po'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-3: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo dbyangs su sgrog pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-4: spos kyi chu dang rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-5: 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-6: chu klung de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi rgyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-9: yon tan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-10: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-11: chu klung dri ma med pa'i chus rgyas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-12: gzhi ni nor bu'i rdo rje padmos byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-13: rin chen mang po sil bus gzhi bkram zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-14: kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-15: them skas phreng bas de dag kun nas bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-16: padmo'i phyang ba'i mu khyud 'khor can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-17: me tog brgyan pa'i mu tig phreng ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-18: me tog lda ldis sna tshogs kun nas bres //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:153b-19: nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-0: rin chen kun gyi kha dog mdog @154a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-2: rin chen nor bu me tog mdzes par bkod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-3: sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-4: de dag rnyog pa nor bu zla ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-5: rin chen sna tshogs thams cad dba' klong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-6: phyogs rnams bcu po kun tu rtag par yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-7: spos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro'i rgyan 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-8: chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-9: 'od zer 'phro ba kun tu rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-10: me tog nor bu'i phung po gdugs rnams kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-11: rin chen kun gyi gzer du rab tu 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-12: phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan mang po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-13: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rin chen rnams las snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-14: rin chen 'khor lo'i gzhi rten yid 'ong las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-15: spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-16: rin chen gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-17: yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrog 'bab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-18: rgyal ba kun gyi byang chub spyod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-19: kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog rab tu 'dzud //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-20: sangs rgyas smon lam sgra dbyangs rnam pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-22: rnam dag nor bu'i ngos dang ngogs kun nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-23: sgra rnams sgrog pa kun na rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-24: chu bo thams cad dba' klong dag las kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen 'bar bdag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-26: chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-27: 'byams klas phyogs rnams kun na rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-28: chu klung de dag thams cad dri med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154a-29: nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-0: @154b mdzod spu'i dpal dang sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-1: nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-2: spos chu'i chu klung de dag gi bar dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-3: chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i me tog punda r'i ka'i phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-4: chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-5: shing gi gseb thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyi sprin rtag par rab tu 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-6: nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-8: shing gi bar de dag thams cad kyang 'od shin tu 'bar ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-10: me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-11: nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis smon lam bskal pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongs su gang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-12: spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sprin gyis mngon par khyab pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-13: spos kyi rgyal po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o; ;nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:154b-14: gos kyi tshogs sna tshogs sprin lta bus mngon par yog pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-0: @155a *// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis yog par byed pas rnam par rgyas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-1: nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-2: nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shin tu ston pas rgyas pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-3: de dag la sogs pa chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi bar gyi rgyan yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so; ;chu klung bar rnams shin tu rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-7: rin chen rgyan can gser gyis rnam par bres //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-8: yal ga me tog sprin rnams 'phyang lding ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-9: shing gi phreng bas kun nas mngon par khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-10: shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sgo dag nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-11: rin chen mang po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-12: me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-13: phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-14: gzhi rnams nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-15: me tog rnam bres rin chen 'bru dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155a-16: kun nas rin chen sprin gyis khyab pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-0: rgyan dang sems can @155b thams cad gzugs brnyan snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-1: sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-2: sa rnams thams cad kun nas rnam par gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-3: phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i sprin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-4: rdul phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur bar snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-5: nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-6: mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas rnam par phye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-7: nor bu'i 'khor lo kun nas rab tu bkod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-8: kun na rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul ba snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-9: 'byams klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-10: sangs rgyas sprul pa bkye ba kun na snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-11: sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-12: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-13: rin chen sna tshogs punda r'i ka yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-14: chu rnams kun rgyas snying po nor bu spos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-15: de las mi zad 'od zer rgya mtsho'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-16: rab tu 'byung ba'i padmo sna tshogs 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-17: dus rnams gsum po'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-18: nor bu de dag 'bru yi nang na ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-19: 'byung ba med cing gzung du'ang yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-20: de ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul ba'i mthu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-21: rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-22: rgyan dang sprul pa thams cad rab tu 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-23: sngon chad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-24: de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang ba med; ;rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-25: rgyal sras thams cad spyad pa rab spyod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-26: rang gi zhing dang lung bstan sa yi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:155b-27: bsam pa rnam dag tshul bzhin de dag mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i dmigs pa dag la'ang dmigs pa re re zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-6: rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-9: yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-10: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-11: zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-12: rin chen rgyan can 'od zer gnas pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-13: stug cing gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-14: rin chen thams cad 'od kyang rnam par 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-15: mu tig nor bu'i sprin mang zad mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-16: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogs su rnam par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-17: zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156a-19: sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-0: @156b nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad snyan par sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-1: rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi spyod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-2: rin chen rnams la rtag par snang zhing grags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-3: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-4: rgyan rnams thams cad nang na rnam par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-5: 'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid 'chang ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-6: sprul pa rnams kyi zhing gi rgya mtsho gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-7: sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni sgyu ma 'dra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-8: de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-9: sangs rgyas yul rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-10: zhing rnams kun nas sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-11: zhing rnams 'byams klas par ni rnam 'phrul zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-12: ji snyed zhing du de dag kun rgyu ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-13: de dag nor bu kun la rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-14: de ltar zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-15: sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-16: thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-17: 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-18: smon lam rnam par 'phrul las byung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-19: bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams byung gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-20: byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya mtsho can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-21: de dag rdul phran kun la rang rang gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-22: rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zham ring du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-24: bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-25: de dag spyod yul thams cad mthong bas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-26: skad cig sems la de dag thams cad ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-27: zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:156b-28: de dag mtha' 'dra mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-1: stobs kyis kun tu gnas pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-2: sems can rnams la phan phyir rab tu sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-4: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-9: dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-10: phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-11: rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-12: rgyan gzhan dang gzhan yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-13: gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-14: gzhan dang gzhan du 'du ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma 'dres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-16: byin gyi rlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa dag ste; kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-17: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157a-18: padmo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:157b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa @157b la la ni; rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me tog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byams klas pa'i tshul gyis lus rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te; de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-10: zhing gi rgyud rgyan shin tu brtan par grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-11: dri med dri bral 'od 'gyed snying po can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-12: nor bu padmo rgya mtsho kun la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-13: la la gangg'a'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas; ;rnam pa sna tshogs tshul gyi gzhi gnas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-14: dbyibs kyang sna tshogs kha dog gzugs kyang mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-15: ri rab grong khyer shing gi dkyil 'khor dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-16: zhing rgyud thams cad la la phyogs kun lta; ;la la 'od lus me tog snying po can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-17: nor bus byas pa kun nas sprin dang chu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-18: la la'i rgyud gsal mu tig 'od zer lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:159b-19: nor bu'i gzhi gnas kun kyang mi shigs sra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-1: klas la la kha dog sna tshogs gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-3: la la'i rgyud ni sgra dang skad kyi lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-4: de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mtha' yas 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-5: la la'i rgyud ni smon lam sgra yi lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-6: spyod pa rnam 'phrul sprin gyi sgra yi lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-7: la la bsod nams yangs dang las kyi sgra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-8: la la'i lus ni rgyal ba'i yon tan sgra; ;zhing gi rgyud rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-9: kun nas mi zad du ma'i sgo nas 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-10: rnam 'phrul yangs pa mi zad rgyan gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-11: tshad med kun gyis phyogs kun rgyas par 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-12: phyogs rnams kun tu zhing rnams 'du 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-13: yangs pa'i tshul gyis zhing gi rgyud zhugs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-14: phyogs bcu kun tu 'du bar snang ba yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-15: 'gro ba med cing 'jug pa yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-16: tshul gcig gis ni rgyud rnams kun kyang 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-17: thams cad ma lus re rer rab tu 'dug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-18: de la tha dad gang yang mi dmigs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-19: gzhi med kun 'gengs mtha' dang dbus kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-20: zhing rnams tshul gyi rgyud la rnam 'phrul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-21: sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad pa kun nas snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-22: smon lam sgra ni rgya mtshor rab brjod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-23: zhing gi dbyings na sems can kun kyang 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-24: zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku yis kun khyab snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160a-25: bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub sems dpas gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-0: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mi mnyam stobs ston @160b cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-1: sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-2: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-3: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-4: zhing gi rgyud kyi gnas shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-8: de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i dbyings de na spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig 'phrul gyi rnam pas rnam par phye ba gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-11: de la gang chen mtsho'i dbyings kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nang na spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus ma ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-12: ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-13: de'i nang nas nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi padmo chen po gzhi spos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-14: nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan can zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-15: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-16: dmigs pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:160b-17: de dag las thams cad kyi 'og ma ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-0: @161a *// dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-2: rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyun dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-3: 'od kyi 'khor lo'i sa mtshams nor bu rin po che'i ze ba mang po la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-5: rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu yog par gyur pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-8: rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshul rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-10: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs kyi padmo dpal gyi rgyan ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyi sa mtshams can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-11: rin po che'i padmo shin tu mang ba la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-13: mu tig gi 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-14: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-15: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161a-16: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161b-0: de'i steng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba @161b snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba spos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sa mtshams can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161b-1: rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa nor bu'i 'khor lo gzi brjid bzang po'i nyi ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161b-2: yan lag brgyad du dma' ba'i dbyibs can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161b-4: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:161b-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:162a-1: steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:163a-14: mu tig gi 'bru rab tu 'phyang ba dang /
