K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166a-20: gzhan dang gzhan du yongs su 'du ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166a-21: gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam par ma 'dres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-3: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas bskor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'khyil ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phung po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs 'byams klas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:166b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167a-0: @167a *// 'jig rten gyi khams padmo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams khyad khyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sa la mngon par lta ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste; de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167b-0: 'jig rten gyi @167b khams 'byams klas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa rnam par gdags pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o; ;'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa'i rnam par gdags pa shin tu bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167b-2: spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba chu klung gi 'khor dang bcas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167b-3: chu klung gi glong dang bcas pa'i khongs na 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167b-4: spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba de dang 'dabs chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167b-5: de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing kun nas 'khyil ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba spos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167b-6: rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i padmo chen po la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:167b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra rgya mtsho mngon par sgrub pa'i nga ro'i lhun can yod do; ;de dag thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams @168a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-3: rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-5: padmo 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rnam par snang ba'i mdzod spu'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-7: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-8: rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-9: dbyibs kun nas dkyil 'khor du 'dug pa mu tig grong khyer dpal gyi dpal gyi sengge'i khri'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-11: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i spos zhim po dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168a-13: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-0: rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang dril bu'i @168b dra ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-2: rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-4: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sa gzhi'i kha dog dang 'od yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-7: spos chu kha dog mtha' yas pa rin po che'i tshon dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-8: dbyibs nor bu'i 'khor lo ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-9: mu tig nyi ma'i tshul kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor legs par byung ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-11: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i las kyis khyab pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-12: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:168b-13: spos dang rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-1: spos chu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi shugs kyis dgyes pa mi zad pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-3: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-5: nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brtan par bsgrubs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-6: zur gsum gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan gyi 'od dang 'od zer gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba dri ma med pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-9: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i padmos brgyan pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-12: padmo'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169a-13: zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-0: rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dkyil @169b 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa me tog gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-2: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i dbyings dri ma med pas yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-4: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-5: rin po che'i 'od mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-6: rin po che rim gyis gzhol ba'i 'od 'phro ba snang ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-7: rtag tu spos kyi char 'bebs pa'i lus sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pa'i blo gros shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-9: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i 'od bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-10: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:169b-11: dga' ba 'khyil ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-0: me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog @170a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' yangs pa'i spyan zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-3: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs rdul dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-6: rin po che sna tshogs kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-8: sil snyan thams cad kyi sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-9: nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser shin tu 'bar ba'i ri rab mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ;de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i kha dog gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-12: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-13: brgya byin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-14: nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170a-15: nyi ma'i sprul pa'i me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes @170b kyi dpal shin tu 'phags pas chos kyi dbyibs su rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-1: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-3: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-4: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-6: snying po byang chub kyi me tog rin po che shin tu rgyas pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sgron ma kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-8: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-10: rin po che'i gos kyi glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-11: me tog gi ze ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:170b-12: nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs sgrog pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar ba'i padmo la rnam par rol pas shin tu rnam @171a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-1: par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-2: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i snying pos bsgrubs pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-4: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-5: rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-7: rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu stug po 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-9: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi mdog ltar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-11: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-12: rdo rje'i padmo rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-13: lha ma yin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i lus mig yor gyi sprin rin po che'i cod pan rab tu 'bar ba'i lus can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-0: de @171b na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i stobs bdud rtsi'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-1: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams tsandan mchog ltar yid du 'ong ba'i zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-4: rdo rje ltar ma khregs pa'i tsandan rin po che'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-5: yan lag brgyad du rnam par bkod pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-6: mu tig gi me tog mang po shin tu rgyas pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa thugs su chud pas shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-8: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-9: kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa; rin po che'i 'od kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:171b-10: spos chu'i klong gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-0: dri zhim po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas @172a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu gsal ba'i dbyangs nam mkha' rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-3: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi mdog bzang pos rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-5: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-6: me tog sna tshogs kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas dran pa'i klong gi dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-7: sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu zhal ston pas shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-9: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rtul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i dpal gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-10: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172a-11: gser gyi sengge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-0: sengge'i khri padmo kha dog sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sprin gyis kun nas @172b yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mu med par rnam par snang bas grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-2: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-5: rin po che'i gos dang spos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-6: sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-7: nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgron ma nam mkha' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-9: de dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-10: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gtsug rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i sgra'i lhun can rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-12: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yid du 'ong ba snang ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:172b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-0: @173a *// nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi snying po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-1: nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rin po che dam pa thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus su sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba padmo snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-3: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan mthun par bres pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri rab sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-5: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu sprul pa'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-7: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snying po rdo rje'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rdo rje rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173a-9: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnyog pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs la thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba @173b bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-1: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i padmos rab tu brgyan pas shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi blo gros rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-5: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral ba'i dra ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal gyi rgyal mtshan rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me tog padmo kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyis kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las bsgrubs pa'i rgyan kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:173b-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pa bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-0: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba @174a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-1: snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad pa zla ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzod dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-5: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs nam mkha'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i glog gi phreng ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo'i tshon gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad rnam par 'dul bas dga' ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174a-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ze ba yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po dang yon tan yangs @174b pa'i dbyangs rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-1: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis kun tu brgyan pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ma 'dres pa'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mi zad pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-6: rin po che thams cad kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-7: padmo'i rgyan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-8: nor bu'i rgyal po padmo snang ba'i bla re'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-10: de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dpal rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:174b-11: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rjes su sgrog pa'i lus can rab tu gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-0: de thams cad kyi 'od na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba padmo rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor @175a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-3: rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i chu'i klong rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-4: rin po che'i go cha dang mdzod spu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-6: khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so; ;de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa la chags pa med pa'i 'od kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-9: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'khor lo gzhi mnyam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tsandan gyi shing gi ze ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad rnam par dag pas gti mug med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175a-13: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba yangs pa skye ba tshangs pa'i dbyangs @175b thugs su chud pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-1: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od srab pa'i rgyan rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes shin tu yangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang dbyibs mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-5: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs su sbyangs pa'i mtshan gyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba shin tu 'byams klas pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i spyan chags pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:175b-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa bsgrubs pas dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings la ye shes kyi sku shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shin tu rgyas pa rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu mkhas pa'i sgron ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams padmo'i nags tshal zab mo'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa zab mo rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang 'od tha dad pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i me tog gi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sgo sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun nas mchog tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-10: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i mdzod spus bsgrubs pa'i ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kun tu rab tu sgrog pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-0: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs zab @176b mo'i gang chen mtsho zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phyogs su gsal bas sems can gyi rgyan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rtse mo 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i ye shes mchog gis chos kyi dbyings la mngon par 'phags pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi padmo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dri ma med pa'i mdzod kun nas snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-6: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bus bsgrubs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-11: shing thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-12: dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-13: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:176b-14: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu 'byung bas dpal chen po'i dra ba rnam par snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-0: de nas lho phyogs logs na @177a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-1: spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che aindra n'i las rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan can zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-2: de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang bas phyogs rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba spos thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi padmo'i sprin la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-3: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-4: gsung mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhun can mngon par 'byung ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-5: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi mdzod phyogs su mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-8: rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-9: zur du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-10: rgyan mig 'phrul lta bu thams cad kyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad padmo'i spyan rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-12: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i tshogs kyis rab tu grol ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177a-13: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i sengge'i blo gros chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-0: de'i steng 'jig @177b rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams padmo'i gdan yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings su dpal gyi 'od zer 'byams klas pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-2: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgra mnyam par sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu rgya che ba'i grags pas kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma ltar shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dbang phyug gi me tog gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi 'khor lo'i gzhi dang snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba yangs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-10: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:177b-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen po'i dpal bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-1: na 'jig rten gyi khams blta na don yod pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs ri rab kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i rgyan dang dbyibs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i zla ba smon lam gyi tshul gyi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-6: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog sna tshogs rab tu bkye ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i smon lam rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi klong gis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-10: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sra zhing mi shigs pa'i gzhi yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs kyi gsung snyan dam pa'i lha zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-12: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi thams cad nas 'od kyi sprul pa bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178a-13: de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus zhi ba mchog gi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-0: de'i @178b steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan shin tu bsrungs pas spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba mngon sum du dga' bar lta ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams aindra n'i la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-3: tsandan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul ba zab pa 'od zer rnam par snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-5: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog rgya mtsho sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od rab tu 'gyed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i sprul pa shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi gzi brjid dam pa mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyi 'od tshangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams padmo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:178b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-0: nor bu'i char kha dog mtha' @179a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-1: yas pa 'bebs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-3: rgyan dang theg pa mang pos kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba brtson 'grus nyi ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-5: de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje brtan pas bsgrubs pa gzhi'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-6: de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul rnam par phye ba'i dra ba'i bye brag ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i dbyangs kyi lhun can yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-7: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams padmo'i dra ba 'khor lo'i sprin ces bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-10: man shel gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtshos brtan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-11: ri rab kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-12: nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul mig 'phrul lta bu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-13: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku kun nas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179a-14: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer phra mo mi zad pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs @179b pa dam pa'i mchog shin tu yangs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-1: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi chu bo kun nas snang ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams chen po bla na med pa'i sprin mi zad pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing dang me tog nye bar gyur pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings mu med pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-5: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig gis yog pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i 'khor lor dbyangs rab tu gtong ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-9: brtson 'grus shin tu thugs su chud pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-10: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing mdzes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs par 'gro ba mngon du ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:179b-12: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sengge'i dpal gyi 'od dra ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od dri ma med pa nyi ma'i 'od 'phro @180a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-1: ba'i sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che mang po rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po dam pa'i blo gros kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi snang zhing dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs dang dri ma med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-7: bsngags pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid kun tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro mthon po'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i sprul pa rgya chen po'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snying pos brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180a-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa med par mkhas pas spyod pa rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-0: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten @180b gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi klong rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la thugs brtse ba'i rnam par thar pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim dga' bas rab tu brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa'i ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-7: mthong ba don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-9: nor bu mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ;de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgo kun tu lta ba'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-12: lus dang khyim sna tshogs kyi spos kyi chu po la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-13: rnam par rgyal ba rab tu phye ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-14: rin po che thams cad kyi sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:180b-15: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dam pa'i sa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-1: shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-2: de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho padmo'i dra ba'i dbang po shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-3: de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs su yongs su gzhol ba'i 'od ces bya ba spos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-4: rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-5: padmo la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-7: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgya mtsho sems can gang chen mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-9: mu tig gi sbubs kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-10: nor bu thams cad kyi phreng ba bskyil ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-11: nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs kyi sprin rab tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par snang ba dam pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181a-13: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs tshad med pa'i dpal zhes @181b bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-1: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes par snang ba'i tshon gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa padmo'i 'od phyag bzang po rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-5: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyi rgyan gyis spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sengge'i khri'i tshul rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i 'od zer tshad med pa'i stobs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mtshan nyid kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad yongs su dag par ston pa'i rig byed mchog ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:181b-13: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mar me du ma zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-1: pa mya ngan dang rnam par bral ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la mngon sum zhes bya ba yod de; de na de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dam pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing dri ma med par sprul pa zhes bya ba yod de; de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi padmo snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kun gyi dbyings su rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu gzigs pas bsgyings pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'gro ba'i dpal shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa shing mi'am ci'i rgyal po rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi mar me shin tu sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-10: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi chu bo tshad med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan sgo kun nas ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-0: de'i steng na 'jig @182b rten gyi khams kun nas dge ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi 'od rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su sprul pa yangs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi ze ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings grol ba'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i sengge'i khri ri bo zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i stobs rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog mtha' yas par rin po che rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-14: nags tshal gyi gzhi rgya mtshal rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:182b-15: nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa'i char 'debs pa'i mig 'phrul gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par @183a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-1: snang ba 'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-2: de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-3: spos kyi mdzod rab tu bsags pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-4: de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan dang 'od thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-5: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-9: rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-10: rdo rje dang rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa padmo'i ze ba 'phags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-12: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams blta na dga' ba'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-13: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dang spro ba yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183a-14: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-0: de @183b na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-1: spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i ze ba sna tshogs kyi gzhi zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med cing zhi ba'i dbyangs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dri ma med pa'i ye shes zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sprin stug po'i mtshan gyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sgra snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar mdzad pa'i gtso bo sprin gyi dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-10: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams padmo'i tshal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro rnam par grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:183b-12: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi 'od rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs pa'i spyan gyis mthu rnam par phyung ba zhes @184a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs bzang po'i ze ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi zad pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams padmo'i grong khyer gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan nyi ma'i snying po snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing gi phung po tshad med pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi 'brug sgra'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rol pa brjod pa zhes bya ba yod de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-10: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams autpa la'i 'dab ma la brten pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams thams cad kyi ri bo shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-12: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rlung mnyam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-13: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po nyi ma'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184a-14: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba yongs su ston pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs @184b pa 'od zer gsal ba sku'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-1: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sgra rdo rje rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi rgyan la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-6: stegs bu rgya mtsho'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-7: rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-8: 'od zer gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bzang pos mi bzhengs pa ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-10: de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che dang ldan pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-11: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dri ma med cing yongs su gsal ba zhes bya ba rdul thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:184b-12: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa dri ma med pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185a-3: rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185a-9: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi mtshan nyid 'khor lo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
