K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185a-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po blta na dga' ba mnyan na don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185a-13: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi me tog legs par bsags pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa @185b stobs dang ye shes tshad med pa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-1: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi tshon 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprul pa kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-5: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i gtsug phud ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa don grub pa shin tu grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'phrul pa las mngon par byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi mar me'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi sgron ma shin tu chags pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams tshul bzang po'i sgo sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:185b-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-1: rten gyi khams tsandan gyi ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gsung tshad med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ;de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi dra pa shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yongs su dag pa'i glong gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nyi ma'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che padmo'i nags tshal yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-10: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rin po che ltar gzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i dpal gyi 'od gzi brjid kyi rgyal bo zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186a-12: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-0: nor bu @186b shin tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu phra ba 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs gzhal du med pa'i dbyangs kun tu brjod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams brtan par bsgrubs pa phyogs thams cad du rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rdul nyi shu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-7: rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po yan lag brgyad du rnam par phye ba'i 'khor lo rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa; rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-8: bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spyan yongs su gsal ba'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-10: de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i rdo rje ltar brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-11: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyis spyod pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:186b-13: sa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-0: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid shin tu dag pa zhes bya @187a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-1: ba; 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-3: mu tig bskyil ba'i dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-4: rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu tig gi phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-5: nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug phud rab tu snang ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu 'phags pas rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid du 'ong bas khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-9: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sengge'i khris brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa klu 'brug chen pos gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i khri padmo gnon pa'i lte ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187a-13: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi dbyangs padmo can zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs @187b pa ye shes kyi phung po rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-1: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin gzi brjid bzang po'i rgyan ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba dang bde ba'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yang dag par gnas pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-5: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mig 'phrul gyi nor bu'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa blta na don yod cing dga' bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sa sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro ba'i tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi 'od kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi spyod pa dag par mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi sprin kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:187b-13: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing gi tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin po che'i me @188a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-1: tog shin tu rgyas pa'i zla ba'i blo zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dam pa'i gser gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams klu'i grags pa dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par gzigs pa tha dad pa med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i go cha yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i nyi ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro bas rab tu brgyan pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs kyi dpal rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-10: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi na bun gyi 'od zer ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pas dgongs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-12: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khon med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188a-13: de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus kyi dpal blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-0: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan thams cad kyi rgyal @188b mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa padmos kun tu rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzod spus bsgrubs pa'i mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-4: zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-5: rin po che'i me tog gi ri rab la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-6: nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad 'bar ba'i 'od kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-8: de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho lha'i grong khyer rin po che'i shing thags kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-9: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mar me'i 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-10: rnam par snang mdzad gzhan dang gzhan thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha ma dad pa'i dbyangs kyi lhun can rab tu gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-11: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i zla ba 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:188b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-2: rin po che'i rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-4: dngul gyi sengge'i khri sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de; de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ltar bdag po med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-5: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi ri bo 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-7: gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal mtshan gyi sgo sna tshogs kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'byung gnas rgya chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i nor bu rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra skad sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189a-13: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shing mi'am ci'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs @189b pa klu'i grags pa bsod nams tshad med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-1: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dag pas 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che'i ze ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-3: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi rgyan thams cad kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-5: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che rnam par phye ba rab tu mang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i ri'i ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su snang ba'i gtsug gi ri rab kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad kyi 'od shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi char pa phra mo'i gdugs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-11: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi dra ba sengges rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgo'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:189b-13: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i me tog shin tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-1: gshegs pa smon lam thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-2: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams chos thams cad kyi sa'i 'od ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi don shin tu yangs pa'i gtsug ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig gi bye mas gzhi mnyam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi dra ba mchog gi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams beed'urya'i ze ba shin tu 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che brtsegs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten khams 'od tshad med pa'i 'khor lo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes la thub pa med pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-10: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs rmongs pa med par lta ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad yongs su sbyangs pa'i yon tan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190a-12: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-0: sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dbyibs @190b ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-1: rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-2: rgyan thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis kun nas yog pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od la thogs pa med pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-4: spos chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho dri ma med pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho sprul pa'i lus bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-5: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs tha dad par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-6: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i mig gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-7: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos dbyings la yang dag par 'jug pa'i rgyan ces bya ba mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-8: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho padmo'i tshul rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-9: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs bcur sprul pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-10: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-11: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud padmo'i lo ma sprin stug po zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:190b-12: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sprul pa'i spos kyi 'od 'phro bas kun tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191a-0: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam @191a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191a-1: par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa rgyu ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191a-2: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gram bu 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de; de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi yul zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191a-3: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kha dog kun tu 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191a-4: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od dam pa zhes bya ba mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191a-5: de dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan thams cad kyis yul brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191a-6: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i lce rab tu snang ba shin tu 'phro ba zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191a-7: de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol shar phyogs logs kyi khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po shel zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191a-8: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud grol ba'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i bskal pa rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi lhun can mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-0: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig @191b rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-1: gcig tu dag pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-3: brtson 'grus kyi blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-5: gcig tu dag pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-7: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi mdzod rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa'i ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:191b-9: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams lus dam pa'i spos gya nom pa zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i @192a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-1: rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-2: gcig tu dag pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi yan lag me tog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-4: spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dri zhim po mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzi brjid bzang po dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-5: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gzhi gsal zhing dri ma med pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-7: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan mtha' yas pa la gzhol ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-10: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi gsung zhi ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-11: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rab tu rnam par phye ba'i gnas yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192a-12: de dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho spos kyi rgyal mtshan ri rab kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192b-0: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing yongs su @192b gsal bar snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192b-1: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tsandan shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192b-3: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho byin gyi rlabs kyi rlung zhes bya ba yod de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192b-5: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho brgya byin gyi gdong dang lus shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192b-6: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu tig gi rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192b-7: de dang 'dabs chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gnas shin tu mnyam par yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192b-8: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bee d'urya'i gram bu sna tshogs bkram pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:192b-10: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs yangs ba'i zhing yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad bdud kyi 'khor yongs su 'dul ba'i gsung gi lhun can zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193a-0: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi @193a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193a-1: khams kyi rgyud skar mda' 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba gcig tu dag pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193a-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyis mchod pa yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so; ;de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sprin sengge'i stobs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193a-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams gos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193a-6: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dang po la 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba sengge'i rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa padmo shin tu sprul pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193b-0: spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan rnam par bres pa thams @193b cad kyis rnam par klubs pa'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193b-4: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho padmo'i ze ba me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193b-5: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rin po che'i cod pan shin tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193b-6: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i gos kyis yun ring po nas bkab pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193b-7: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mu tig rnam par dag pa rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193b-8: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho me tog bzang po yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang ba'i sprin 'od zer rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193b-9: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nam mkha'i phyogs dang mnyam par rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:193b-10: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che kun tu snang ba rnam par dmigs pa shin tu zab pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:194a-8: de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol lho phyogs logs kyi 'khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gzhi 'khor lo tshad med pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:194b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyad par gyi blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:194b-4: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi nyi ma padmo'i sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:197a-1: pa de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho dngul gyi padmo sna tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:197a-2: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud yongs su gsal bar kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:197a-3: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho beed'arya'i spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin stug po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:197a-4: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs su dbyangs sgrog pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:197a-8: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho tha dad pa med pa'i sprin 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:197a-10: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i me tog zad mi shes pa shin tu rgyas pa'i dpal gyis gzi brjid ces bya ba yod de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:197b-9: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:199a-5: de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:200b-6: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun tu snang zhing tha mi dad pa zhes bya ba /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:201b-9: de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chags pa med pa'i rdo rje kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:201b-10: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho kun nas padmos brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:201b-11: de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho'i ngogs mtha' yas pa'i klong zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so; ;de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i yan lag dam pas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-0: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing gi gzhi rnam par dmigs @202a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-1: pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-2: de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho mi phyed par brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-3: de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud padmo'i dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs la 'jug pa shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-4: de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams spos shin tu zhim pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dang sprul pa tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de'i dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan dang tshul gyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tshad med pa'i tshangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-8: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i phyogs me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i spyan 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-0: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thog ma la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya @202b ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i lha 'od 'phro ba'i sgo zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-2: spos chu'i rgya mtsho lha'i grong khyer dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-3: nor bu'i shing thags kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho snang ba'i 'khor los rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-4: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i phyogs kyis gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-5: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshon gyi srang rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-6: de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brgyud pa du mas 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-7: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan thams cad kyis kun tu gang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-8: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rin po che rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-9: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che'i dra ba rnam par phye ba kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-10: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-11: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan dam pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:202b-12: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa rgya mtsho'i sgra zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-0: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho nyi ma'i gnas yongs su sbyong ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod @203a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-1: de; de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mig 'phrul gyis rgyas par 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-2: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho sil snyan thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-3: de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud klong thams cad kyi gting du rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-4: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho rgyan dam pas bsgrubs pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-5: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'od dri ma med pa'i sprin stug po 'bar ba zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-6: de dang 'dabs chags su spos chu'i rgya mtsho mar me 'od 'phro bas kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-7: de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi dbyibs tha dad par byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-8: de dag la sogs pa spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyi rol khor yug gi mtshams na spos chu'i rgya mtsho phreng ba dang gos kyis shin tu bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-9: de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kun nas snang ba'i gos bzang po shin tu sprul pa zhes bya ba; sangs rgyas 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203a-11: da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shin tu sgrog pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203b-0: de thams cad kyi 'og na spos chu'i rgya mtsho @203b dbang po'i me tog ze ba 'khyil ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203b-1: de na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu grol bas dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203b-2: gcig tu dag pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203b-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i ye shes kyis pham pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203b-4: de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi dbus na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'bru'i dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203b-5: gcig tu dag pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203b-6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba tshad med pas dgyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203b-7: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba gzhi mnyam pa yod pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdan padmo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:203b-8: sengge zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs dri ma med @204a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-1: cing mnyan na don yod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-2: de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud klu'i rin po che'i kha dog gi 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba; gcig tu dag pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings yongs su gsal bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-4: kye de ltar rgyal ba'i sras dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-5: spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag thams cad kyang spos chu'i rgya mtsho de dag la nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dmigs pa'i mig yor gyi rgyal mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa dang ldan pa'i padmo la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can mang po dang mtshams 'dabs chags su gnas pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-8: 'od rin po che gzhan dang gzhan gyi kha dog tu 'gyed pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204a-9: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun nas yog pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-0: rgyan rnam @204b par bres pa'i 'od gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-1: bskal pa'i grangs gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-2: sangs rgyas gzhan dang gzhan skye zhing gshegs pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-3: chos rgya mtsho'i sgra gzhan dang gzhan rab tu bsgrags pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-4: sems can gyi lus gzhan dang gzhan gyis kun tu yog pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-5: phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la 'jug pa ma 'dres pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-6: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs gzhan dang gzhan can sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams nas rab tu byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba rgyan sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-9: snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad yongs su gang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-10: ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rgyud nas byung ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-12: sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sna tshogs thams cad las byung ba kun gyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:204b-13: snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di thams cad yongs su gang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu @205a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-1: bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud mtha' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa'i tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-4: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-5: 'jig rten khams ni rgya mtsho rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-6: yangs dang mi yangs sna tshogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-7: nam mkha' dag gi dbyings la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-8: chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-10: zhing gi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-11: tha dad min par rnam par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-12: rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-13: rnam phye sna tshogs shin tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-14: kha dog tha dad rab tu 'dug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-15: zhing gi rgyud dag rnam phye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-16: 'jig rten khams kyi gang chen mtsho //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-17: lhun dang dbyangs rnams tha dad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-19: zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-20: las kyis de dag shin tu bris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-21: ri rab rgya mtsho'i dra ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-24: de dag de yis kun nas bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-25: rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan brtsegs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-26: rdo rje kun nas 'khor gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-27: 'byams klas bsam gyis mi khyab pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-28: de dag rgyud ni kun nas bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-29: 'od kyi dra ba bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-30: mu tig mdog kyang rgya mtsho ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-31: zhing gi rgyu rnams kun kyang 'bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205a-32: padmo la yang kun gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-0: re @205b re dag gi rgyud las kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-1: 'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-2: 'od zer dag gi zhing gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-3: rgya mtsho phyogs rnams kun tu 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-4: zhing gi rgyud rnams thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-5: dmigs pa kun gyi sgo nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-6: thams cad tshul la 'jug pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-7: mi zad tshul rnams rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-8: zhing gi rnams ni bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-9: rgyud rnams mi zad shin tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-10: rgyan rnams bstan pa tha dad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-11: drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-12: zhing gi rgyud rnams de dag na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-13: 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab khams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-16: ji ltar shing la lo ma rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-18: de bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-20: ji ltar shing gi skye gnas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-21: shing tog sna tshogs 'byung ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-22: de bzhin zhing gi rgyud rnams na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-23: sems can sna tshogs 'byung ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-24: ji ltar sa bon khyad par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-25: 'bras bu sna tshogs snang ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-26: de bzhin las kyi khyad par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-27: sems can rnams dang zhing byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-28: yid bzhin rin chen rgyal po rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-29: kha dog kun tu snang ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-30: sems can bsam pa rnam dag pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-31: de bzhin zhing rnams rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-32: klu yi rgyal po'i sprin gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-33: nam mkha'i dbyings la ston pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-34: de bzhin sangs rgyas smon lam gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-35: zhing gi rnams ni 'byung ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-36: sgyu ma'i mkhan po sngags dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:205b-37: sgo rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-2: bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-3: ji ltar ri mo'i gzugs kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-4: ri mo'i las kyis bris pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-5: de bzhin zhing rnams 'di dag kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-6: sems kyis ri mor bris pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-7: sems can lus kyis rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-8: ji ltar sems kyis brtags pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-9: de bzhin du ni zhing gi mtshams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-10: thams cad las kyis rnam par bris //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-11: ji ltar gzhan dang gzhan gzugs su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-12: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-13: mgon po rnams ni snang ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-14: de bzhin zhing rnams snang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-15: padmo'i dra ba'i phyi rol gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-16: sems can zhing gi mtshams dag na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-17: dbyibs dang kha dog gzhan dang gzhan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-18: dri ma med pa sna tshogs snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:206a-19: padmo'i dra ba de dag la //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-0: sems @209b can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-1: zhing rnams la la 'od med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-2: mun pa 'jigs pa shin tu che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-3: reg na sdug bsngal spu gri 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-4: blta na mi bzad skyi yang g-ya'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-5: zhing rnams la la lha 'od can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-6: la la khyim gyi 'od can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-7: la la nyi zla'i 'od dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-8: zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-9: zhing rnams la la rang gi 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-10: shing gi 'od can dri ma med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-11: gang du sdug bsngal mi mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-12: de dag sems can dag las byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-13: la la ri yi 'od can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-14: zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-15: la la mar me'i 'od can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-16: sems can rnams kyi las kyis byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-17: zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-18: byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-21: zhing rnams la la me tog 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-22: spos chu'i 'od dang ldan pa'ang yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-24: smon lam dbang gis rnam par sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-25: zhing rnams la la sprin 'od can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-26: nor bu'i go cha'i 'od kyis gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-27: sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-28: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-29: rin chen cod pan 'od dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-30: rdo rje gser gyi 'od kyis snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-31: yongs su dag pa'i sgra dbyangs can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-32: de dag na ni sdug bsngal med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-33: thams cad rgyan gyi 'od can dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-34: zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-35: la la snying po byang chub 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-36: 'khor rnams kun tu rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:209b-37: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i snang ba can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-2: kun tu 'od kyis rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-3: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-4: zhing rnams la la 'jigs sgra can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-5: mi bzad 'jigs pa'i nga ro can; ;rtsub cing brlang ba'i sgra rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-6: yid myong 'jigs pa chen po sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-7: dmyal ba byol song skye gnas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-8: gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-9: mya ngan rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-10: nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-11: la la dag na yid 'ong sgra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-12: dga' bar byed cing ston 'doms pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-13: dge ba'i las dang 'bras bu'i dbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-14: zhing gi 'khor na rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-15: la la brgya byin lha dbang dbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-16: gzhan dag tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-17: 'jig rten kun gyi dbyangs su yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-18: la la'i zhing na rab tu grags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-19: zhing rnams la la sprin gyi sgra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-20: rin chen rgya mtsho'i 'od zer dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-21: nor bu'i shing gi gzugs sgra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-22: rol mo'i sgra yis kun tu khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-23: 'od zer glong gi sgra rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-24: sangs rgyas sprul pa mi zad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-27: chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-28: kha cig zhing na bsam yas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-29: smon lam rgya mtsho'i nga ro dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-30: spyod pa'i sgra yang snyan pa 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-31: dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210a-32: mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-0: de dag zhing rnams 'byung ba'i @210b sgra; ;zad pa med pa'i dbyangs su sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-1: sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sgra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-2: tshad med sa dang pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-3: chos kyi rang bzhin sgra dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-4: kha cig zhing na rab tu grag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-5: kun tu bzang po smon lam gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-6: sgra ni zhing rnams bye ba 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-7: bskal bar gnas shing rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-8: sgra dbyangs 'byin pa zad mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-9: zhing gi dbyings rnams la la na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-10: sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-11: sgra yis chos kyi dbyings bkang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-12: de dag kun na rab tu grags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-13: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-14: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-15: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-19: sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol de bas kyang pha snga'i dus de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus su 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-21: rin po che'i padmo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-22: rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-23: 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:210b-24: kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-0: gzhi rgyan mtha' yas pas brgyan @211a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-1: pa; rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi khor yug brgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-2: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-5: khang khyim dri ma med cing 'od rnam par snang bas brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-8: gos kyi longs spyod yid kyis bsam pas 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-9: rgyan gyi rnam pa brjod pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-11: de las me tog gi ri rab me tog 'od 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rin po che'i khri 'phang bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing brgyan pa zhig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-12: ri rab de'i steng na nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba spos kyi rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin tu bsgreng ba'i rgyan can me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-13: dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba rnam par bres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-14: nor bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-15: rin po che'i rdo rje'i rgyan mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-16: rin po che'i me tog punda r'i ka dpag tu med pa'i phreng gis kun nas bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211a-17: spos dang rin po che'i padmo mang po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-0: @211b rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-1: spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas snang bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-2: grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-3: 'di ltar nags tshal chen po'i yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs logs na grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-4: mi'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-5: rin po che'i 'ba' zhig las byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-6: mchu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-7: rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thags dang phru ma'i ra ba bdun gyis brgyan cing kun nas bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-8: rin po che'i 'obs spos chus gang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-9: rin po che'i me tog autpa la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-12: me tog punda r'i kas rnam par brgyan pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-13: shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po 'byin pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-15: khang pa brtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-16: steng nas gser gyi dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-18: me tog gi phreng ba'i dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:211b-19: aindra n'i la'i dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-2: rin po che'i shing drung me tog gi dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-3: rol mo'i sgra mang po thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun tu khyab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-4: spos dang phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-5: de'i 'khor kun na sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-6: sgo de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-7: sgo de dag re re'i mdun yang rin po che'i rdo'i rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-8: bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas bskor ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-9: bza' shing gi ra ba de dag thams cad kyang spos dang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kun nas spos kyi dri kun tu 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-10: bya sna tshogs thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-11: grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba der mir skyes pa thams cad kyang las kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag ste; nam mkha' las rgyu ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-12: mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-13: yid bzhin gyi yul la longs spyod pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-14: de nas lho phyogs logs na lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212a-15: de nas lho phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-0: de nas lho phyogs logs na gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo @212b rje'i dpal sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-1: de nas lho phyogs logs na dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po zhes bya ba yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-2: de dang 'dabs chags su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon ces bya ba yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-3: de dang 'dabs chags su 'dab ma bzang po'i grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba zhes bya ba yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-4: de dang 'dabs chags su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-5: de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o; ;grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang rgyan mang po du mas brgyan pa nas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i bar du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-6: nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i dbus na snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi shing yal ga stug cing rgya che ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-7: rin po che'i me tog gzugs dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po shin tu rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-9: me mar rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i sprin kun tu bkres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:212b-10: rin po che'i 'od thur tu 'phro bas zhing kun tu khyab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-0: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i @213a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-2: phyogs bcu 'od zer mang pos rnam par snang bar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-3: rgyan thams cad rin po che sna tshogs mang pos spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-4: rol mo thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin tu 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-5: nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-6: phyogs bcur me tog sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'byung ba yod de; de'i mdun du padmo chen po me tog gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-7: rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-10: rdo rje'i rgya mtsho la zug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-11: chu ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-12: rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa'i 'dab ma can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-14: spos kyi ze ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-15: snying po la rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i tshon bkye ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-16: padmo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-17: phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-18: ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de @213b dag las bskal pa'i thog ma pa thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-1: yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dbyangs zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-2: des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der lo brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-5: zhes bya ba'i tshe nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-6: 'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'phro'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i snying po can du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-7: phyogs bcu dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-9: khang khyim gyi rdul thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-10: rin po che'i me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-11: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yang rab tu 'gyed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-12: sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:213b-13: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rab tu gtong ba'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam @214a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-3: 'byung ba mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i ltas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-7: rgyan de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa las mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-9: sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-10: snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol ba de dag thams cad kyang ltas sngon du byung bas yang dag par bskul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba rab tu 'phros pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-13: sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-14: gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-17: mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214a-18: sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214b-0: 'gro ba thams cad la @214b mngon du ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214b-1: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab par mdzad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214b-3: 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu gtong ba de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214b-4: padmo chen po de la mngon par byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214b-5: ji ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab tu gnas pa'i ri rab me tog gi 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gser shin tu 'bar ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse mo la nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra kun tu yang ri rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse mo la bzhugs par kun nas snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:214b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshul rgya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pa zhes bya ba 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba @215a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba thams cad yang dag par bskul to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis 'od zer de dag bkye ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-4: sgrib pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu bsal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-5: sangs rgyas blta ba'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bcom /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-6: sems can thams cad kyi rnyog pa yang rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-7: dge ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-8: mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yongs su dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-12: 'jigs pa thams cad kyang rnam par bsal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-13: lus dang sems kyi gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-14: sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-16: de dag 'od zer des yang dag par bskul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215a-17: 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-0: de la grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i 'od ces @215b bya ba der rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-1: grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-2: de la bud med bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-3: de la bu gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa lnga brgya yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-4: rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid chen po la yang bud med blta na bzang ba la sogs pa stong phrag bcu yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-5: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyus chos bcu khong du chud par gyur to; ;bcu gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-11: tshul yangs pa'i sprin gyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-13: 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-15: sgra'i sprin gyis kun nas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:215b-17: yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pas yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i dga' ba chen po khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-1: ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-3: tshul gyi gzhi rgya chen po rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa chen po khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-5: mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi tshul gyi sgo chen po khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'od la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-8: de nas rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-9: chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-10: nyi ma mang po stong gi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-11: mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-12: snying po byang chub dri med la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-13: sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-14: bskal pa bye ba stong dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-15: mgon po 'jig rten byung ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-16: sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-17: rgyal ba kun ni rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-18: ltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-19: sangs rgyas sprin ni bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-20: gnas rnams kun na kun kyang snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par bzhag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216a-23: 'od zer sprin la zad mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-1: sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-3: 'od zer rnams ni dri med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-4: sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-5: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rgyas 'gengs ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-6: sangs rgyas gsung ni yid 'ong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-7: 'gro ba kun tu rab tu bsgrags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-8: 'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-9: sangs rgyas yon tan rnam par brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-10: sangs rgyas 'od kyis phog pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-11: sems can kun kyang bde bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-12: sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-13: 'gro ba kun kyang dga' ba skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-15: rin chen sprin rnams rab 'gyed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-16: bstod pa'i sprin gyis rgyal ba'i drung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-17: phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-18: snying po byang chub 'di la yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-19: sgra yi rgya mtsho zab mo grags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-20: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-21: sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-22: kun kyang sri zhu ldan gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-23: dga' zhing shin tu mos byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-24: chos kyi rgyal po blta ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:216b-27: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun tu shin tu grags par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-0: de nas rgyal po blta na dga' @217a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-1: ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-2: rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa; zhang blon rnams dang gzhon nu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-3: rgyal po'i mi dang blon po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-4: tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-5: yul mi rnams kyang kun 'dus shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-6: grong khyer rnams ni kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-7: rnga sgra dag gis myur du sgrogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-8: kun kyang mthun par lhan cig tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-9: rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir dengs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-10: srang rnams thams cad kun tu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-11: dge ba'i dril gyi sgra sgrogs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-12: bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-13: rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir yang 'deng //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-14: grong khyer rnams kyang brgyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-15: rgyan rnams kun dang bla re bres //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-16: rgyal mtshan dam pa bzang po'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-17: nor bu sna tshogs brgyan pa sgreng //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-18: rin chen dra ba'i bla re rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-19: nam mkha'i dkyil du bres par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-20: nam mkha' 'di las thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-21: sil snyan sprin gyi sgra dag phyung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-22: lam gyi srang yang brgyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-23: rin chen char yang kun tu phob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-24: bzhon pa rin chen bstad par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-25: rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-26: rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-27: sna tshogs sprin gyi char phob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217a-28: rgyan gyi sprin rnams thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-0: nam mkha'i dbyings kyang dgab @217b par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-2: me tog gdugs rnams bsam yas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-3: se mo do dang phreng sprin rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-4: gos kyi sprin gyi char phob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-5: ri rab rnams dang spos kyi ri; ;nor bu'i 'khor los brgyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-6: dri med tsandan phye ma rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-7: nam mkha'i dkyil la rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-8: nor bu'i phreng dang me tog phreng //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-9: rin chen phreng ba dri med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-10: rin chen sgron ma'i phreng ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-11: nam mkha'i dbyings la sgrub par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-12: thams cad sangs rgyas mngon gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-13: dga' zhing spro ba'i sems bskyed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-14: bu dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-15: rgyal ba blta phyir kun 'dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-16: de nas rgyal bu blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal la sogs pa bud med stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-17: gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-18: blo gros kyi stobs la sogs pa blon po stong phrag drug cu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-19: de dag la sogs pa 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba nas byung nas sde'i 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha'i dbyings su mngon par 'phags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:217b-20: rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218a-0: rgyal po'i mthu chen pos nam mkha' thams cad rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba @218a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218a-1: der dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218a-2: lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas kyang lha'i dbang po rab mtshe ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218a-3: klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa nas kyang klu'i rgyal po bcu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba klu bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218a-4: gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kyang gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpa' bas rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnod sbyin bye ba bdun cu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218a-5: dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang bzang po nas kyang dri za'i rgyal po blta na dga' ba zhes bya ba dri za bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218a-6: lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon nas kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag pa las sems dpa' zhes bya ba lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218b-0: nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba nas kyang nam mkha' lding gi bdag po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba nam mkha' lding gi 'khor dgu bcu @218b rtsa dgu dang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218b-1: mi 'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas kyang mi 'am ci'i dbang po rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba mi 'am ci bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218b-2: lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po che rdo rje sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rin po che grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218b-3: tshangs pa'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyis pham pa med pa zhes bya ba tshangs pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:218b-4: de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag nas sems can gyi ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sems can de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste 'khor gyi @219a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho der dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i mdo'i 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bcas ba bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos chos kyi gzhung 'di bstan pa thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sngon yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219a-4: chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219a-6: thog ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219a-8: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i mig rnam par dag pa la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo //
