K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-0: yon tan chen po rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug @219b pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-2: sgo yangs pa nas snang ba zab mo yang dag par 'byung ba rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-4: phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-5: mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-7: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par sprul pas brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-9: yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med par rab tu 'jug pa la mngon par sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing mos pa rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyan yang dag par sgrub pa rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-13: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-14: 'gro ba thams cad mngon du bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-15: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:219b-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyi sngon gyi @220a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-1: sbyor ba rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-2: rgyal ba'i chos nyid 'di thos nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-3: bdag gi ye shes snang ba skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-4: des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-5: rgya mtsho rnams kyang rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-6: sku tshe kun tu ji lta bur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-7: phun sum tshogs gyur kun kyang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-8: mtshan gyi rnam pa rnam dmigs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-9: gang gis sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-10: sngon chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-11: bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-12: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang mchod nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-13: zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-14: sku yi rgya mtsho mang po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-15: rgyal chen yongs su kun btang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-16: spyod pa'i dam pa rab spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-17: rgya mtsho'i zhing yang shin tu sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-18: snyan dang shangs mang rgya mtsho dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-19: phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-20: rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor btang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-21: zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-22: zhing rnams so so re re la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-23: bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-24: byang chub spyod pa rab spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-25: zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-26: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-27: spyod pa rgya mtsho kun spyad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-28: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-29: zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-30: ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220a-31: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-0: sangs @220b rgyas ye shes 'od snang pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-1: sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-2: byang chub 'tshang rgya zhi ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-3: chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-4: zhing gi rgya mtsho dag pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-5: dri med 'od can kun kyang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-7: byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-8: zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-9: de ltar bdag gis spyad par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-11: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-13: mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon par khong du chud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-16: sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-17: rab tu rjod; byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i tshul ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-21: chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-23: snying po byang chub thams cad la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-27: ye shes tha mi dad pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:220b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs shing mthong ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-1: rjod; sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-3: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rgyan ni; rab tu ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-4: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-6: mngon par sgrub pa byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-7: sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub tu sems bskyed de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin du btsud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-9: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-10: byang chub don du khyod zhugs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-11: gzi brjid chen po legs so legs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-12: bsod nams snying po grags pa che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-13: snang ba khyod kyis rab tu non //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-14: chos kyi dbyings ni khyab byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-15: bsod nams chen po sprin ldan pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-16: sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtshor 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-17: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-18: zhing gcig na yang spyod spyad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-19: nga yi ye shes ji lta bur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-20: khyod kyis mthong ba de ltar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-21: tshul 'di kun nas shes par ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221a-22: brtson 'grus chung ngus mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-0: brtson 'grus stobs chen ldan pa'i @221b rnams; ;rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dag par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-1: thams cad rdul la 'jug tshul du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-2: bskal pa rgya mtshor su spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-3: rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rgyan gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-4: de la 'di 'drar rab tu 'gyur; ;sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-5: bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-6: 'khor kyang skyo ba med pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-8: bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-9: rgyal ba re rer mchod byed kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-10: gang gi sems la skyo med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-11: de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-12: dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-13: khyod kyi smon lam dbang gis gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-15: khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-17: mtha' dang dbus med rgya mtsho la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-18: blo chen gang rnams 'jug pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-20: nga la mchod pa byas pas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-21: gzi brjid chen po'i stobs chen gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-22: sems can ri rab rdul mnyam pa; ;byang chub yongs su smin par byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-23: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-24: kun tu bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-25: chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-26: zhing gi rgya mtsho dag par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:221b-28: de la bskal pa rgya chen po rig pa zhes bya ba de la bskal pa bar ma chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed cig byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-0: de'i dus na mi rnams kyi tshe @222a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-1: yang bskal pa bar ma gnyis thub par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-4: lo bye ba phrag lnga bcur gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-5: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-7: mthong nas kyang sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-8: ye shes rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-9: chos kyi klong gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-10: kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po yang rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-11: dmigs pa'i sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying po yang rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222a-13: byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-0: chos kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa @222b zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po yang rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-1: rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa'i lus zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-2: chags pa med pa'i dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-3: rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma med pa'i klong la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa yang rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu thob bo; ;de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo stong phrag bcu kun nas non par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-5: de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-6: bskal pa bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-7: 'jig rten gtso bo'i dam pa shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-8: sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob rab thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-9: de dag sangs rgyas gnyis pa 'di yang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-10: sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab bkye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-11: kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-12: 'od zer sprin gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-13: kun tu rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-14: 'od kyis reg pa rmad kyi dga' ba skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-15: 'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:222b-16: phan tshun sri zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-1: rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag kun kyang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-2: sprul pa'i dra ba'i sprin rnams bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-3: rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-4: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun kyang gang byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-5: sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-6: rgyal ba rnams kyi spu rtse re re nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-7: dbyangs sprin bkye bas nam mkha' kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-8: mun nag chen po kun nas snang bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-9: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rnam par sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-10: sangs rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnams bcu po na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-11: sems can rnams kyi sngon dge rgya mtsho rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-12: thams cad dbyangs kyis kun tu sgra yang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-13: sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-14: sangs rgyas 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-15: mtha' dang dbus med yang dag rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-16: de na rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-17: sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-18: tshad med rnam par 'phrul ba dag la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-19: zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-20: de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-21: sems can don du rnam pa mngon sangs rgyas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-22: dga' zhing mos par kun kyang 'dong bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-23: bde ba'i yid dang sri zhu spro ba yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-24: bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223a-25: de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-0: byang @223b chub sems ni yang dag bskyed byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-1: 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-2: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam kun btab cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-3: chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-4: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-5: de thos pa'i sems can tshad med pa rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-6: de yang pha dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-7: sems can bye ba phrag khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gis bskor cing mdun du byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-8: rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin lngas nam mkha' thams cad du kun nas yog par byas te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-9: 'ongs pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-10: 'jig rten khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-11: des de thos nas tshul thams cad rnam pa dag pa la 'jug pa 'byung bar rab tu skyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:223b-12: ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang non par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-0: pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya ba la @224a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-2: zhing thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-3: snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang rab tu zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-4: spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-5: rjes su rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba yang rjes su rtogs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-6: 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs kyi rgyan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-7: rang byung du 'gyur ba shin tu mthong ba'i shugs kyis dbang bskur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho la yang zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-9: smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa rgya mtsho'i snying po'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam pa dag par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224a-11: legs so yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-0: sangs rgyas byang chub @224b smon lam yang dag gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-1: sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-2: rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyi mi khyab 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-3: ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-4: chos kyi dbyings su thams cad rgyas byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-5: sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-6: bsam gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan sprin mthong pa'i; ;ye shes sa yang mi zad non par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-8: pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-9: grags pa chen po yongs su rgyas par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-10: gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-11: so so yang dag rig tshul mi zad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-12: spyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngon bsgrubs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-13: gzhal med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-15: smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-17: 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-18: chos dbyings dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-19: bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyangs byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-20: sangs rgyas sprin la rnam pa blta bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-21: rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-22: nga yi byang chub spyod la 'jug par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-23: sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-24: spyod pa ngas ni ji ltar rnam sbyangs su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-25: de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:224b-26: zhing rnams re re sangs rgyas mang po ngas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-0: @225a *// rgya mtsho brgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-1: sngon spyod de yi 'bras bu 'di yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-2: 'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-3: las kyi rgya mtsho mi zad rgya chen dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-4: zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag bya'i spyod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-5: smon lam bsam yas go cha bgos pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-7: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-8: zhing rnams rgya chen rgya mtsho sbyangs byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-9: bskal pa 'byams klas kun tu sbyangs byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-10: rgyal pa'i yon tan 'od chen mnga' bar 'gyur; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-12: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-13: nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba gsum pa byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225a-14: des de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas 'khor thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225b-0: dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs @225b dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225b-3: yul mir bcas te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa gang na bzhugs pa der dong nas des bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225b-4: der de bzhin gshegs pa des kun tu lta ba'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'ang yang dag par bshad par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225b-6: de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos bsod nams chen po rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225b-7: ting nge 'dzin de thob pas kyang dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho mngon du gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225b-9: yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:225b-10: byang chub mchog tu smon lam yid ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-0: 'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya @226a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-2: nga yi drung du khyod 'ongs legs so legs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-3: snying rje'i snying po khyod ni sems can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-4: sdug bsngal gyur pa kun grol don zhugs pas; ;'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang skyabs su 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-5: byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-6: byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-7: skyo med yid kyis spyod pa spyad pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-8: mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags med pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-9: ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-10: de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-11: mthu chen smon lam spyod par zhugs bas na; ;bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-12: bsod nams 'byung gnas bsod nams mchog kyang yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-13: bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal pa rgya mtsho dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-14: mtha' dang dbus med mang po khyod kyis shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-15: mtha' dang dbus med de dag mthong gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-16: de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtogs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-17: khyod kyi phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-18: rgyal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-19: de dag spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-20: sngon chad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-21: 'di tshul rgya mtsho 'di la su zhugs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-22: ye shes sa la su dag gnas gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-23: de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226a-24: thams cad gzigs par gdon mi za bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-0: khyod ni zhing @226b kun rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-1: bskal pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa spyad byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-2: rgyal ba kun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-3: bslab nas rang byung nyid du 'gyur bar 'ong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-4: zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-5: phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-6: khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-7: smon lam kun kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-8: 'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-9: khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur rab tu dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-10: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-11: byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-12: mtha' dang dbus med zhing rnams 'byams klas bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-13: bskal pa rgya mtsho dag tu spyad pa spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-14: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-15: smon lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-16: nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan padmo'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to; ;rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos nas rgya mtsho'i steng na lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i gnas zhes bya bar phyin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-17: der bsod nams dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:226b-18: de nas de lha'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char 'bebs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan padmo'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-2: der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan padmo'i dpal gyis tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-4: des de dag thos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-5: chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyings su yang zhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-6: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-7: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-8: rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ste; bcu pa'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-13: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-15: kun tu bzang po tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227a-16: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-0: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus @227b kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-1: stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-3: 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-4: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-5: dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-6: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-7: gnas kyi dam pa mtshe ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-9: byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-10: grong rdal gyi mdzod mtha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-11: bza' shing gi ra ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-13: snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-15: kun nas smad du med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa na bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-17: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pas kun nas bskor ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-19: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la gnas par ming mthun pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:227b-21: gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228a-1: kyi lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad nyan thos kyi lus kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228a-2: gzhung de bzhin du lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228a-10: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming mthun pa thams cad kyang mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228a-12: sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bar snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228a-13: sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228a-14: sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phrag pa'i lhun dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228a-16: snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba chen po rgya @228b mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lto dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228b-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228b-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa'o; ;nyan thos kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bral dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228b-4: 'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228b-5: sems can gyi khams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa ste; 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228b-7: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:228b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229a-1: lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa snyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa shangs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ljags kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa sku'i khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thugs kyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yid dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-0: de bzhin @229b gshegs pa zhi ba rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sgra dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-2: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-4: rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-5: chos kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi skom dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-6: sems can yongs su smin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zas dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-9: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog par khebs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:229b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par 'bab pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-1: dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bla re 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par bkram pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-5: ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun tu khebs par bkang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-7: kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-13: chos kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-14: mig sna tshogs kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-15: de bzhin du rna ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-19: yid kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230a-20: kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho re re nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang me tog autpa la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-0: punda r'i ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i @230b rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te me tog autpa la de dag re re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-1: me tog punda r'i ka de dag re re la yang me tog autpa la'i 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-2: me tog punda r'i ka'i 'khor kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-4: me tog punda r'i ka'i bar de dag re re las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnam par phye ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ba dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi padmo'i tshal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi smig ma'i tshal mang po dag kyang mngon par thon pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-8: ci'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-9: de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-11: khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-21: thag nye ba yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:230b-22: gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad khongs na snang bar so so'i mig gis mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231a-6: chos kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231a-7: ci'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ba zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231a-8: de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231a-10: khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na gzugs su snang ba 'das pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231a-20: gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nang na snang bar rang rang gi mig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231a-21: gzhan gyi mig gis mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231a-22: de bzhin du rna ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231a-26: yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231a-28: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis lhun shin tu brgyan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231b-0: sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu @231b phra ba snyed kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i lus can no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231b-1: chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o; ;'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar 'byung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231b-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na rdul shin tu phra ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231b-6: de'i nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:231b-7: de dag gi steng na chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so; ;de dag gi steng na nam mkha'i dbyings rgya mtsho sa mtshams yongs su chad pa med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232a-0: @232a *// de dag gi steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232a-1: de dag gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232a-2: de dag gi steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232a-3: de dag gi steng na me tog mtshan ma med pa las skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232a-4: me tog de dag kyang so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi tha gru dang ldan pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232a-5: de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya'o; ;de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232a-6: yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-0: mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten @232b gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na yon tan ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-3: tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spo mngon par 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po'i khri 'phang du 'dug pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:232b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:233a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yang med de; der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmigs par byed pa'i dmigs pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs @233a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:233a-2: de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:233a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:233a-4: de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:233a-5: mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni; 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:233a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:233a-7: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:233a-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:233a-9: lha'i rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238a-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog autpa la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238a-9: punda r'i ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238b-1: grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang ngang tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238b-4: ci'i phyir na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238b-5: grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de'i sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238b-6: chu'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238b-7: me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238b-8: rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238b-9: nam mkha'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:238b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma bzhag pa de lta bu gang yang med pas /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-0: de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod @239a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-2: yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-3: mdor na gang byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de snyed ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-4: grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na yod do; ;grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-5: bza' shing gi ra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-6: bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na nags tshal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-7: nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyu las grub pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-8: chos kyi dbyings kyi 'od rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-9: rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa'o /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239a-10: sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyob pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lo ma dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-0: sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya @239b mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-1: sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-3: rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-4: dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa'i gdugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-6: ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgrengs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-7: bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-8: rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su brgyan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-9: rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas rgya mtsho'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-10: rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog autpa la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:239b-12: punda r'i ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-0: @240a *// bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can ji snyed cig 'dong ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gang chen mtsho'i sku dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-2: 'phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par 'gyur ba sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-3: dus gsum thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-4: ci'i phyir na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-5: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-6: de dang mthun pa'i rgyus grub pas de'i phyir na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-7: bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-8: de dag la sogs pa bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-9: yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-10: mdor na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240a-11: bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240b-0: bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten @240b gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240b-1: khang pa brtsegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240b-2: khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las byung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240b-4: sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dam pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su 'dong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240b-6: khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240b-7: ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:240b-8: ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi @241a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241a-1: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bsgrubs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas mngon par grub pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241a-2: ci'i phyir na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya zhe na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241a-4: de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241a-8: khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241a-9: de lta bu'i pho brang brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa'i sengge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241b-0: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i @241b rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241b-3: da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241b-6: da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241b-15: mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241b-21: da ltar byung ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:241b-23: da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa /
