K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242a-1: rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242a-4: da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242a-12: mi dang mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242a-14: da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242a-16: 'khor gyi 'khor gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242a-17: byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242a-18: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam pa tha dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242b-0: lus rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las lus re re la yang mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho @242b bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242b-1: mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las mgo ra re la yang mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242b-2: de bzhin du rna ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242b-6: yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242b-7: mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag re re la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242b-8: de bzhin du rna ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:242b-12: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-0: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod @243a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-1: pa de dag las rnam par shes pa re re la yang ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-2: ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la ye shes ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-4: de bzhin du nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-13: mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang shes par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-14: ye shes la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-15: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-16: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243a-17: stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243b-0: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod @243b pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243b-1: rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243b-2: gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243b-3: byang chub sems dpa' nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin tu phra ba re re nas lus kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243b-4: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du bstan cing brjod kyang zad par mi rung ngo;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis sku'i ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243b-7: 'od zer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho padmo rgya mtsho la bzhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243b-8: sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par thon to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:243b-9: de dag las yang dag par skul pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244a-1: shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244a-2: rdul shin tu phra ba re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyad cig yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244a-3: rang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244a-4: nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244a-13: mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su skul ba byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244a-14: shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du'ang de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244a-16: mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag na sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te gnang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244a-17: mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag re re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-0: byang chub sems @244b dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-1: mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig yod pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-2: mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-3: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-4: lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-5: lus re re la yang mgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-6: mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-7: kha'i sgo re re la yang lce rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:244b-9: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g-yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba byas te; lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas de bzhin du mar me dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245a-5: ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod de; lce re re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas rang rang gi stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245a-6: rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245a-7: 'khod nas kyang lce re re zhing zhu ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su zhu pa byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245a-10: mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de dag thams cad la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par phye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-0: de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying @245b po zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-4: tha mar yang dge ba'i chos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-10: tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-11: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-14: sku tshe'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-15: sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-16: sku yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-17: chos bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:245b-18: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du gsungs te bstan kyang zad par mi rung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba de ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bdag po lha dang mi'i dbang po yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-3: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che mang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-4: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-5: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-9: thugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-16: thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-17: don thams cad sgrub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-18: kun tu rnam par phye ba'i blon po rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-19: nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i rta rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246a-20: yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-0: chos kyi dbyings @246b rdo rje'i lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-1: kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-2: nam mkha' rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-3: rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-4: zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i rdul yab rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-5: shes rab kyi lam gyi rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-6: 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong ba'i spyi gtsug bsgribs pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-7: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lha ma rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-8: ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par bzhag pa thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-9: chos gang chen mtsho thams cad kyi klong dang ldan pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-10: de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-11: rin po che rgya mtsho de dag la rin po che ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:246b-12: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu rgya mtsho kun kyang mi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247a-2: lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247a-3: phas kyi rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'joms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247a-4: sa bcu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247a-5: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob pa; snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su gnon pa la mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa'i bud med rin po che dang 'dra bar yid kyi lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247a-8: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-0: byang chub kyi sems bla @247b na med pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgo dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-1: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-2: bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-3: shes rab dang ye shes yangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-5: sdom pa chen po yang dag par blangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-6: chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-7: chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pas 'dzum par dgod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-9: snying rje chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:247b-10: sems can thams cad kyi don yongs su sgrub pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248a-0: @248a *// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248a-1: chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lte ba dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248a-2: dmigs pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i mthar thug pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su rtogs pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248a-3: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la brtan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248a-5: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis legs par 'brel ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248a-6: byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248a-7: phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mdzes par thogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang par gyon pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis legs par @248b brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spos kyis lus shin tu byugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248b-3: thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248b-4: de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248b-5: de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsandan gyi spos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248b-6: spos rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248b-7: de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ji snyed cig yod pas dri zhim po rgya mtsho de dag tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:248b-8: sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249a-0: thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba de dag gis gzugs kyi @249a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249a-1: yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249a-2: ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249a-3: gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249a-4: gang gis lag nas bzung ba de dag thams cad kyang byams pa chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249a-5: snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249a-6: gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams cad kyang bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249a-7: gang dang stan gcig la lhan cig tu 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub kyi sengge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249a-8: gang gi kha dang khar phrad par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249b-0: gang gis @249b bang du 'khyud pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:249b-1: gang dang chos kyi dbyings su brtan par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:254b-22: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-0: nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs @255a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-5: yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-7: gal te khyed sangs rgyas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-10: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-11: chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-13: 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang mi gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-14: sems can thams cad gsod phod kyang zhe sdang ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-16: mu stegs can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya mtsho la 'jug cing spyod kyang log pa'i ye shes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-17: yang dag pa'i ye shes la mi gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-18: chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang ston la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-19: chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g-yo zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-21: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa'i tshe chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-22: bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las chung ma re re dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255a-23: bu mo re res kyang mig gi khams re res chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-0: rna ba'i khams re res kyang nam mkha' khong du chud pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa byang @255b chub sems dpa'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-1: sna'i khams re res kyang gcig la brten pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-2: lce'i khams re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-3: lus kyi khams re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa dri ma med pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-4: yid kyi khams re res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs rgya mtsho la sogs pa stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-5: de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-6: bu mo rgya mtsho de dag gis theg pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi gting rnyed nas spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-7: rgyal po rin chen mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-8: bdag cag kun gyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:255b-9: yongs su mchod de bsnyen bkur zhu ba bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-1: thos; ;sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-2: da ni sangs rgyas 'phrin las sgrub pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-3: sa mang rgya mtsho'i mig kyang thob par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-4: byang chub don du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-5: rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-6: sna yi khams kyis rang rgyal sa thob ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-7: rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-8: lces kyang nyan thos sa mang rgya mtsho thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-9: des ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshor bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-10: lus kyis sa mang rgya mtsho thob pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-11: sgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu bsgrub par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-12: yid kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-13: 'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la bstan par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-14: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-15: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa phal po che'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-19: bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga dha'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub na bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-20: blo shin tu rnam par dag pa mi gnyis pas yang dag par spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-21: chos mtshan nyid med pa la shin tu gzhol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-22: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256a-23: bsgribs pa med pas rtogs par thugs su chud pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-0: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul 'phrog pa med @256b pa; rnam par dgod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la shin tu byung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-1: pho brang kun tu 'od na sengge'i khri padmo'i snying po can la bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'dus pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-4: sems can gyi khams la dpyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-5: chos kyi dbyings la dpyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams la dpyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-7: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la dpyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-8: las kyi rnam par smin pa la dpyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-9: bsam pa'i rgyud la dpyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-10: don dang yi ge la dpyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-11: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la dpyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-12: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa la dpyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-15: da ltar byung ba la dpyod pa sha stag dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-18: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-19: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid yongs su bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-21: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:256b-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa yongs su bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:257a-1: rang bzhin yongs su bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:257a-2: sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:257a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:257a-4: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bstan kyang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:257a-5: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bkod pa bcu ji ltar rnam par bkod pa de dag yongs su bstan kyang rung /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:257a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:257a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nye bar nyon mongs pa med par bya ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:257b-3: the tshom thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:258a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:258a-5: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa de dag mngon par 'du mdzad pas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:258a-7: shar phyogs su brten nas sengge'i khri padmo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyel mo krung bcas nas 'khod do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:290b-7: 'di ltar rig byed mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:290b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-0: gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams @291a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-1: cad thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-2: gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-3: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-4: 'jig rten rang byung de las mchog med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-5: mi gnas dam pa phul dang mchog gi rnams; ;drang srong chen po srid pa'i rgyud 'grel pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-6: yon tan kun ldan rnam dag 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-7: 'du 'dzi med cing chags pa mi mnga' la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-8: 'du shes dngos med gnas pa med pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-9: phun sum dge ldan smad pa mi mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-10: mgon po rnams kyi chos nyid thub par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-11: shin tu 'od snang dag par gyur pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-12: brgal du glags med rnyog pa med pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-13: g-yo med mtha' ma rnam par spangs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-14: bde gshegs rnams kyi ye shes tshul 'di yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-15: lus dang sems la rnam par rtog med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-16: bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'jug 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-17: de dag chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-18: nam yang nem nur dbang du mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-19: 'jig rten dag na dmigs pa gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-20: de dag kun la bstan pa'i chos 'jug ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291a-21: gang dag phyir rgol med pas bstan mdzad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-0: rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ba gang yang @291b med; ;dngos po rab shes las rnams yod min par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-1: the tshom thams cad rnam par spangs byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-2: sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu rtogs pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-3: sems la rnam par 'byed pa nam yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-4: mi shes chos rnams rnam par phye ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-5: byung med tshig gi lam gyis rab brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-6: sangs rgyas gsung gi rjes su 'brangs byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-7: gcig kyang ma yin mang po'ang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-8: mang dang gcig pa nam yang yod min te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-9: mang po rnams la gcig pa yod med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-10: mang dang gcig pa rnam par bsgoms byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-11: sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas shes par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-12: 'jig rten kun tu sems can zhing rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-13: shin tu zhi ba'i chos rnams rnam bltas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-14: mi gnas sems la rtog pa med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-15: dran ldan sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-16: sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing gi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-17: de dag rang bzhin ji bzhin brtags byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-18: gcig dang tha dad gyur pa ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-19: de ltar sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:291b-20: de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba'i bar du snang bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan @292a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-1: pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-3: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-5: thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-7: 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-9: 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292a-10: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-0: 'di ltar rig byed mi @292b g-yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-2: gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-3: thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-4: gcig na ji lta ba bde bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-5: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to; ;shes rab dpag med chos rnams mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-6: srid pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-7: tshe ring nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-8: yon tan che mnga' 'di dag sbyor 'di'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-9: gang gis sangs rgyas chos rnams dngos rtogs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-10: dus gsum kun tu brtags kyang mi ngoms te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-11: dmigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-12: bsam yas mos pa de dag sbyor 'di'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-13: sems can yul mos sems can 'du shes med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-14: 'jig tshogs chos shes lam gyi rgyud dang bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-15: bsam gtan nang dad sems la bcings pa med; ;chags med yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-16: rtogs mkhas rab tu rtogs pa'i chos can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:292b-17: mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la brtson pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-1: brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-2: zhi ba thob pa de dag sbyor 'di'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-3: ded dpon rjes song sangs rgyas byang chub mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings bzhin rtogs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-5: bden 'jug mkhas pas sems can rnam 'dul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-6: bde gshegs bsam gtan de dag sbyor 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-7: sangs rgyas don tshig rjes su shes bya zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-8: chags med blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-9: kun tu 'gro bar song bas rtsol spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-10: rang byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-11: nam mkha'i dbyings dang sprul pa yid ldan rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-12: gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-13: mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-14: thob dka' thob pa rnams kyi sbyor 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-15: zla ba zla phyed nyin dang nub bgrang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-16: lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su sems pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-18: grangs tshul sus rtogs de dag sbyor 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-19: zhing gi sems can ji snyed skye 'chi ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-20: gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-21: de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-22: bsam gyis mi khyab rtogs pa'i sbyor 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-23: 'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs da ltar la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293a-24: ngag gi lam gyis gang na rtog byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:293b-0: dus gsum rang bzhin ji ltar rtogs gyur @293b pa; ;mnyam med de dag sbyor ba 'di yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-0: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes @294a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-1: bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-2: 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-3: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-4: 'di ltar rig byed mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-6: gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-7: thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-8: gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-9: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-10: 'das dus gang gis sgrub dka'i brtul zhugs che brtsams shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-11: nam yang zhum pa'i sems su gtong bar mi byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-12: brgal dka' rgal te bdag gis sems can kun 'dul zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-13: sengge'i sgra sgrog de dag spyod yul 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-14: gang zhig 'dod dang sred pa 'byung zhing 'jug pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294a-15: ma rig gzhol ba gti mug mang bsgribs 'jigs chen rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-0: sems @294b can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-1: bdag kyang 'jig rten mgon 'gyur zhes pa de yul 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-2: 'jig rten sems can mang po 'dod dregs 'dam bying ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-3: med pa'i chos la rtog pas sdug bsngal mthong gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-4: sangs rgyas spyod yul chos la bag yod gang spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-5: bdag gis sems can kun bsgral de dag spyod yul 'di; ;mngon mtha' shes dka' tshad med brtan pas mthong gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-6: bdag rten sems can pha rol mtha' yas 'khor gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-7: de dag rgyal bas theg pa zhi ba mchog la bkod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-8: bdag gis de 'dra'i chos bstan de yi spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-9: sems can khams rnams mgon med nad kyis gzir gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-10: ngan song gzhol pa 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gdungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-11: me lce 'bar phung 'jigs gzugs mi bzad bsregs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-12: mthong nas dgrol phyir zhugs pa de dag spyod yul 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-13: lam gol lam ma yin pa'i rkyen la spyod gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-14: mun pa chen po rtol bar dka' rnyed 'gro mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-15: snang ba chen po bskyed de sangs rgyas chos bstan ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-16: 'di skad tshig brjod de dag spyod yul 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-17: srid pa'i mtshos g-yengs sems can rab tu mang ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:294b-18: mtha' ma mi mthong skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-1: bskyed chos kyi gru sbyar cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-2: pha rol su 'gro zhes brjod de dag spyod yul 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-3: sems can rtsa ba med la gnas pa mi mkhas kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-4: g-yang sa chen por lhung zhing sems nyams rmongs mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-5: snying rjes chos kyi zam la mkhas pa su dgod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-6: dran par gyis shes su smra de dag spyod yul 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-7: shin tu dog pa'i brtson rar sdug bsngal sems can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-8: na dang rga bas gzir cing tsham gyis mnar ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-9: mthong nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams kun brtsams te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-10: sems can kun 'grol sems dpa' de dag spyod yul 'di 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-11: sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad thos gyur the tshom ma med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-12: chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-13: 'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog kyang mi gzigs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-14: sems can kun la snyoms byed de yi spyod yul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-15: de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-18: / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang @295b bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar bya so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-6: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-12: brjod du med pa dag kyang snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-14: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang snang bar bya so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-15: gzhung de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-16: de bzhin du nub phyogs dang de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-17: de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-18: de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-19: de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-20: de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-21: de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:295b-22: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas nas nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-0: de ltar phyogs bcu shin tu rgyas par byas nas chos @296a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-1: kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas gzhung de bzhin du 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ril gyis bstan to; ;ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-5: thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ong par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-7: 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296a-9: 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-0: byang chub sems dpa' de @296b dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-1: 'di ltar rig byed mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-3: gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-4: thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-5: gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-6: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-7: bskal pa gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-8: gang gis mthong yang bsags med 'gro dang dngos po'i tshul med pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-9: lam du rab tu 'jug pa de na thams cad shes 'gyur te; ;stobs bcus tshul 'di ji ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-10: grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun tu mtshungs med grags gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-11: bgegs rnams kun las 'das te chos nyid 'di la dgar spyad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:296b-12: tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-0: de phyir phyogs rnams kun bkang bde gshegs @297a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-2: dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni spyod pa'i 'bras bu mthun pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-3: 'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa yang byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-4: de dag thams cad so sor mthun par ye shes rnams bsgoms pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-5: sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra phyogs bcur ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-6: thog mar nyan 'dod bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa des byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-7: rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab rtog bsam gtan bsnyen byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-8: bde gshegs nyid ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnam sgom sems tshim byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-9: chos nyid de 'dra spyod pa myur du bde gshegs thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-10: snying nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams rgyal byed rtse gcig thub byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-11: rgyal ba'i yon tan mos las mi ldog spyod pas tshim byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-12: dngos dang dngos med thams cad shes byas spangs shing dngos zad pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-13: sangs rgyas bdag med dpe med mthong ba de dag lus 'di yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-14: bzang po'i spyod yul can gyi sems kyis phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-15: zhing rnams thams cad chos kyi gter gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-16: ji bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la the tshom med pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297a-17: stobs bcu ci 'dra de bzhin gyur pa'i lus ni 'di dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang sgra brjod @297b de la 'jug byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-1: chos kyi 'khor lo ji bzhin blta dka' gzhal yas rtag bskor ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung kun byang chub yan lag rtogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-3: de ltar 'jug pas rtag tu sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-4: mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-5: rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin pas mig stong stobs bcu mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-6: 'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-7: shin tu chags med yul med de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-8: sems can las mang bsags pa de dag shin tu blta dka' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-9: nang dang phyi dang dbyibs dang mdog tu phyogs bcu kun na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-10: de bzhin rang byung sku ni gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'gengs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-11: shes par dka' ba 'dren pa chen po bsgribs pa med pas brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-12: nam mkha' dag la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-13: de nas 'ong ba med cing phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-14: gcig cing gnas par 'gyur yang de dag ci la'ang gnas pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-15: de bzhin rang byung rnams kyi sku ni mkha' dbyings rtag tu 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-16: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-17: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:297b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' @298a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-1: 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-3: rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye brag tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-7: dbang po ma tshang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-9: skye ba mi mthun pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-13: sdug bsngal myong ba snang ba dag la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-17: las mi shes so; ;tshor bas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-18: rnam par smin pa mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-32: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-33: sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-34: gang 'di yongs su dris pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-35: chos rnams chos nyid ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-36: 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-37: chos rnams 'di dag g-yo ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298a-38: shin tu dngos po med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-0: de phyir gzhan gyis @298b gzhan dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-1: ngo bo nyid kyang mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-2: ji ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-3: gzhan dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-4: gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-5: chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no; ;ji ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-7: gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-8: chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-9: ji ltar rlung ni bsten tshul gyis; ;gzhan dang gzhan du rab tu rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-10: gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-11: chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-12: ji ltar sa yi khams kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-13: gcig la gcig ni gnas gyur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-14: gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-15: chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-16: mig dang rna ba sna dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-17: lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-19: byed pa po ni gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-20: 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-21: 'byung ba nye bar bstan byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-22: bstan par byas pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-23: bstan pa la ni dngos med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-24: mig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-25: rna ba sna yang rang bzhin gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-26: lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-27: med de yongs su brtags pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-28: gang zhig rang bzhin dngos med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-29: tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-30: de yi mig la 'khrul pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-31: chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-32: yang dag pa dang yang dag min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:298b-33: bden nam 'on te rdzun yang rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-2: tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-5: sems can thams cad sems can med mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-6: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-7: sems can 'dul ba'i dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-8: sems can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-10: spyod pa ji lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-11: mos pa ji lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-12: mtshan ma ji lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-13: bsam pa ji lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-14: sbyor ba ji lta ba dang; sems ji lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-15: spyod pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sems can 'dul ba'i phyir mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-17: gang rnams rab tu zhi spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-18: thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-20: 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-21: bdag gi lus la su gnas shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-22: gang gis nad ni rab shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-23: yang dag yod dam med pa'i don //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-24: des ni rab tu shes pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-25: lus kyi rnam par dgod pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-26: phyogs na mi gnas brjod pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-27: de bas shes pa de gnas la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-28: nam yang chags par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299a-29: lus ni rnam par spyod pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-0: dngos po kun @299b kyang rnam par bsgoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-1: sems ni phyir ldog mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-2: dngos po kun ni brtags pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-3: gang gi tshe ni rjes su 'brang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-4: gang gi tshe ni phyir ldog 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-5: ji ltar mgal me 'khor lo yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-6: thog ma tha ma 'khor ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-7: dngos po thams cad mi rtag par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-8: skye bo gang rnams rtog pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-9: lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-11: bdag med rmi lam lta bu yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-12: las ni kun tu rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-13: rnam par smin pas rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-14: phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-15: sems ni dbang byed yin par bshad; ;dad pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-16: tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-17: 'jig rten thams cad ston par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-18: ji snyed 'jig rten brda yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-19: de dag thams cad brtags pa ste; ;chos nyid de ni nam du yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-20: chos gcig la yang mi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-21: rkyen rnams la ni rten bcas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-22: chos rnams so sor rab tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-23: de dag ldog par de bzhin 'gyur; ;phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:299b-26: sems can thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams yongs su 'dzin pa med cing bdag gi med la mnyam pa yin yang 'on kyang bde ba'i tshor ba dag kyang snang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-0: @300a *// sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag kyang snang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-1: yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-2: yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-4: phyi rol tu byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-8: tshe gzhan la myong ba dag kyang snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-11: yid du mi 'ong ba yang med pa 'di ci zhig ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-20: ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-21: gcig gis gcig ni mi shes kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-22: rang bzhin nye bar ston par byed //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-27: las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-29: sna tshogs sgra mang rjod byed kyang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300a-32: ji ltar bya rnams mang po yi //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:300b-17: de dag 'ong ba gang yang med //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-2: ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-3: rin chen mang po bgrang byed kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-4: nam phyed tsam yang mi 'thob pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-5: chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-6: ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-7: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor skyes kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-8: zas dang skom dag mi bdog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-9: de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-10: ji ltar 'on pa rol mo yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-11: sil snyan glu la mkhas pa zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-12: gzhan dag de yis dga' byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-13: chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-14: ji ltar dmus long ri mo mkhan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-16: bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-17: chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-18: ji ltar mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-19: skye bo mang po sgrol byed kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-21: chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-22: ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-23: phun sum tshogs pa kun brjod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-24: bdag gis thob par mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-25: chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-26: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-27: de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-28: ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304a-29: de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la la la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-18: btang snyoms brjod pa mdzad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-19: chos gcig 'gas 'byung bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-21: sems can gzhan gyi bsam shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-22: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-23: de ltar gang gi don dris pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-24: sangs rgyas sras po bdag las nyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-25: smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-26: chos gcig gis ni byung ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-27: gang yang 'byung ba yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-29: skal pa gang la gnas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-30: bsam pa mkhyen nas don mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-31: gang la ci dag tshul mthun pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-32: de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-33: ser sna can la sbyin pa brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-34: tshul khrims ngan la tshul khrims rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-35: mi bzod la ni bzod dang des //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-37: rnam par 'khrugs la bsam gtan brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-38: shes rab 'byor ba shes med la'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-39: gdug pa'i sems la byams pa bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:304b-40: 'tshe ba rnams la snying rje ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-2: 'khor ba'i sems la btang snyoms te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-3: sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-4: rim pas de ltar 'byung ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-5: ji ltar sa la las bya ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-6: khyim gyi dngos la rim pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-7: de bzhin sbyin pa tshul khrims dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-9: rgyal ba'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-10: rub pa'i phyir ni ra ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-11: de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rub phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-13: ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-14: sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-15: de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-17: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-18: bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-19: de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-21: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-23: de ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'byung ba gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-24: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-25: chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-26: sems can 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305a-27: tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-0: 'od kyi @305b dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-1: rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-2: 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-3: bstan pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-4: chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-8: chos kyi rgyal po'i chos nyid ni; ;'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-9: bsgribs pa med pa gzigs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku; ;shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-13: mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-14: sngon chad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-15: ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-16: 'khor du chos rnams bstan pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-17: de dag zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-18: zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-19: sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-20: sems can ji ltar sbyangs pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-21: de yi rnam pa de ltar mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-22: ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-23: kun gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-24: sangs rgyas zhing dang sku dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:305b-25: 'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-2: sngon chad bsam pa yongs sbyangs pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-3: thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-4: ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-5: sems can bsam pa ji bzhin dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-6: las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-7: de lta de ltar mthong 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-8: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-9: sangs rgyas zhing la rtog mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-10: de dag byams sdang yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-11: bsam pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-12: srog chags rnams kyis de bzhin mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-13: rnam pa tha dad 'jig rten khams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-14: de ltar snang bar gyur pa de; ;drang srong chen po kun gzigs pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-15: nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-16: gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-17: 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-18: skyes bu drang srong rnams kyang snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-19: de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-22: bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa rnams smras pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-23: da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul las brtsams te spobs par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-24: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yul ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-26: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshogs ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306a-28: sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-0: sangs rgyas kyi yul @306b la 'jug pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-2: sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-4: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-6: sangs rgyas kyi yul shin tu bstan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-8: sangs rgyas kyi yul shes par byed pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-10: sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-12: sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-17: nam mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-19: sems can thams cad 'jug pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-20: chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-21: tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-22: bskal pa bye bar mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-23: ji snyed rgyal ba'i tshogs mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-24: de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-25: blo gros sems kyang de bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-26: sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-27: de la bstan pa thogs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-28: de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-30: 'jig rten rgyu ba gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-31: de dag kun la ye shes gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-32: gzugs su snang ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-33: sangs rgyas ye shes chags med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-34: dus gsum kun la chags pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-35: nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-36: de ni ye shes yul yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:306b-37: chos kyi dbyings ni tha mi dad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-2: dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-3: de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-4: sgrar gdags ji snyed yod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-5: sems can kun gyi sgra skad du; ;sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-6: rnam par rtog pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-7: rnam shes rnam par shes bya med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-8: sems kyis brjod pa'ang ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-9: ye shes rang bzhin shin tu dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-10: sems can rnams la'ang rab tu bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-11: nyon mongs med cing las med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-12: dngos po med cing gnas pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-13: snang ba med cing rgyu ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-14: 'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-15: sems can kun gyi sems kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-16: dus gsum kun tu rab yangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-17: sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-19: de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-20: chos kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-21: las kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-22: 'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-23: lus kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-24: dbang po'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-25: skye ba'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-26: tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang; tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307a-27: yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-0: @307b ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rab tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-2: grangs med pa; bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-9: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa; nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-10: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-11: de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-12: de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-13: de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-14: de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-15: de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-16: de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang; de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-17: de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:307b-27: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:308a-1: dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:308a-2: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:308a-3: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:308a-4: byang chub sems dpa' dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:308a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:308a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:308a-10: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:308a-11: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin /
