K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-3: lag mthil de nas sgra rab snyan par 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-4: de dag 'od zer las dges yongs bsags pa; ;lag pa g-yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-5: rgyal ba'i zhing rnams spos chus ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-6: kun tu btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-7: 'od zer yid 'ong snang zhing rgyan ldan pa; ;lag pa'i mthil bkye padmo bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-8: padmo rgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du ma'i gzugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-9: mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba mchod pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-10: 'od zer me tog rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-11: me tog rgyan dang me tog bla re dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-12: me tog sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-13: bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-14: 'od zer spos kyi rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-15: spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-16: sna tshogs spos kyis kun tu yongs bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-17: bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-18: 'od zer phye ma'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-19: phye ma'i rgyan dang phye ma'i bla re dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-20: phye ma sna tshogs kun tu yongs su bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-21: bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-22: 'od zer na bza'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-23: na bza'i rgyan dang na bza'i bla re dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-24: na bza' sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-25: bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329a-26: 'od zer rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-0: rin chen rgyan dang rin chen @329b bla re dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-1: rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-2: bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-3: 'od zer padmo'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-4: padmo'i rgyan dang padmo'i bla re dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-5: padmo sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-6: bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-7: 'od zer phreng ba'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-8: phreng ba'i rgyan dang phreng ba'i bla re dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-9: phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-10: bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-11: 'od zer rgyal mtshan mchog rgyan rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-12: de dag rgyan mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-13: sngo dang sna tshogs rnam mang rgyan can gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-14: rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas brgyan pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-15: de dag de gshegs dbu la gdugs kyi mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-16: rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-17: dar gyi lda ldi ba dan yongs dpyangs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-18: dril phreng rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog 'dzin pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-19: lag pa'i mthil nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-20: mchod pa rgyal ba gcig la byed pa ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-21: ma lus rgyal ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-23: de dag 'gro ba yongs sdud ye shes kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-24: rnam par 'phrul ba'i ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-25: bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-26: thams mang stong gis sems can 'dul ba byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-27: la la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-28: sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong ba'i sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:329b-29: sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-0: bzod pa mi zad mi sgul @330a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-2: la la brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson 'grus sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-3: bsam gtan rab tu zhi gnas sgo dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-4: don dam rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-5: tshul rnams kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-6: tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-7: bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan tshol sgo dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-8: bsod nams yongs su bsags dang ye shes sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-9: bden pa rten pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-10: la la stobs dang dbang po lam gyi sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-11: nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-12: rang rgyal theg pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-13: theg pa dam pa rnam 'phrul sgo dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-14: la la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-15: la la bdag med srog med sgo dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-16: mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags 'bral ba'i sgo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-17: la la zhi 'gog ting 'dzin sgo dag tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-18: 'gro ba'i spyod sgo ji snyed yod rgyu ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-19: de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab tu zhugs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-20: de dag kun gyi chos nyid sgo dag nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-21: bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul; ;gang rnams kun gyi sgo yi sgo dag nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-22: bsam pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-23: de dag mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-25: de dag dga' ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-26: 'gro ba thams cad yongs smin byed mthun pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330a-27: dga' ba de spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-0: bsam gyis mi khyab yongs ston sems @330b can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-1: gang tshe lo nyes thams cad dkon gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-2: de tshe 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-3: thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-4: sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing 'gro don byed; ;de dag zas mchog skom dang ro mchog dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-5: gos dang dgab pa rin chen sna tshogs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-6: rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug yongs btang bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-7: sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba byed; ;de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-8: gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-9: phreng bas rnam brgyan spos kyis bskus byas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-10: gzugs rnams yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-11: mthong bas dga' bde rab tu mos pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-12: de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang cha byad mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-13: gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-14: gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-15: de dag ka la pingka'i sgra snyan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-16: ko kil kun la ngang pa'i sgra dbyangs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-17: rnga dang tshangs pa mi 'am ci yi sgras //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-18: mos pa thams cad tshul bzhin chos kyang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-19: de dag stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-20: gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-21: chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-22: bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-23: de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-24: don dang don med grogs kyang de bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-25: sems can dgos la grogs su 'gyur byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:330b-26: grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-0: @331a *// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-1: grogs kyi don du de dag bzod par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-2: 'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-3: de dag grogs don mi bde nyams su len //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-4: gang na 'byung ba med cing chos med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-5: dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa mi dmigs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-6: de dag kun tu rgyal srid che spangs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-7: zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-8: de dag khyim gyi btson ra srid gnas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-9: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-10: 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-11: mngon par byung zhing thar pa yongs su brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-12: de dag spyod pa bcu rnams spyod byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-13: skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-14: drang srong spyod pa thams cad ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-15: yongs su sgom zhing 'gro ba'i don kyang byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-16: gang na sems can tshad med tshe ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-17: bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-18: de dag kun tu nad gzer na bu can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-19: bdag la dbang med tsam gyi dbang sgyur ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-20: 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-21: gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten mer 'bar zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-22: rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-23: 'jig rten bstan cing sems can 'dul ba byed; ;de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-24: chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331a-25: sangs rgyas bdag nyid che brjod byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-0: sangs rgyas yon tan rnams @331b kyis 'gro don byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-1: de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjes ston gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-2: gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-4: rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul bas sems can 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-5: de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-6: 'gro ba'i don du 'jig rten rim gror byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-7: 'jig rten mi chags chu la padmo bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-8: dga' ba mos pa skye bar rnam par spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-9: de dag rjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal ba byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-10: gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-11: mdzes shing sdug par bzhad gad byed pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-12: sgyu mkhan gzugs med kun tu ston par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-13: grong ba grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-14: ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag de bzhin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-15: rgyal po blon po mnga' rab pho nya dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-16: sman pa mi 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa byed; ;de dag nags tshal sdong po chen por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-17: sman dang rin chen mi zad gter dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-18: yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin shing dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-19: lam gol 'khyams la de bzhin lam ston 'gyur; ;'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-20: sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-21: de dag kun la rmos thabs tshong thabs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-22: sna tshogs bzo rnams kun kyang rjod par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-23: 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-24: sems can bde skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:331b-25: rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna tshogs rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-0: kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par @332a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-1: brjod; ;drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-2: gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dad gyur dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-3: brtul zhugs dka' spyod dka' thub mchog gi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-4: kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-5: de dag rgyu dang kun rgyu mu stegs can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-6: dka' thub spyod yul mi smrar spyod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-7: sgren mo gos med ri yi dge sbyong la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-8: mu stegs can gyi mkhan po mkhas pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-9: de dag yongs 'tsho chos la spyod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-10: bla na yod dang bla na med pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-11: ral pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul zhugs can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-12: de dag tu yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-13: nyi ma'i rjes spyad dka' thub lnga ldan dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-14: khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dvags spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-15: gle'u can mu stegs bcu gsum spyod pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-16: de dag kun na'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-17: lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-18: mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-19: rtsa ba 'bras bu chu la spyod pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-20: chos sems nang na de dag dam par 'gyur; ;gnas btegs gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-21: tsher ma rtsva dang thal ba'i mal can dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-22: dbyig pa'i mal can gcig pu spyod pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-23: de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-24: phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-25: de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332a-26: sgrub dka' mi bzad drag shul dka' thub kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-0: mu stegs can gyi sdug @332b bsngal spangs pas 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-1: 'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-2: lta ba ngan la zhen pa'i mu stegs can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-3: kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs tshul gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-4: bden pa ston pa de dag kun tu byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-5: la lar dra byi la yi sngags tshig tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-6: shin tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bden pa ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-7: la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-8: la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis; ;la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-9: don nges rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-10: rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-11: brtan pa thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-12: la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-13: kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-14: la la dag la lha'i tshig nges tshig dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-15: klu yi tshig nges gnod sbyin tshig rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-16: la la dag la srin po 'byung po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-17: dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i tshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-18: mi ci lha min nam mkha' lding tshig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-19: bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-20: de dag bden pa'i nges tshig tshul shes bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-21: de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-22: chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-24: de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-25: 'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-26: 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:332b-27: 'od zer bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-2: sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-3: de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-4: bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-5: sangs rgyas bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-6: dge 'dun bstan nas mi rnams lam bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-7: rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-8: des ni mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-9: lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-10: 'od zer 'od byed rab tu bkye byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-11: mun pa kun dang rdul rnams kun bsal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-12: 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-13: 'od des sems can ji snyed yongs bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-14: de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar 'dzin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-15: rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar bzung byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-16: 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-17: 'bru mar me mar mar gyi me mar dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-18: shing dang rtsva dang smig ma spa yi sgron //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-19: spos dang ro mchog rin chen sgron ma dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-20: rgyal ba rnams gsol 'od byed de thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-21: 'od zer sgrol zhes bya ba rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-22: sems can ji snyed 'od zer nges bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-23: de dag sred pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-24: sems can bsgral don go cha brtan pa gyon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-25: gang rnams sred pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mtshor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-26: sems can bsgral phyir go cha brtan gyon pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-27: de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333a-28: mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-0: stegs dang zam pa @333b gcig min byas pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-1: chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-2: 'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-3: des ni sgrol ba'i 'od zer de grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-4: 'od zer skom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-5: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-6: 'dod pa'i yon tan sgom pa rab spangs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-7: chos kyi rnam grol ro la don du gnyer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-8: 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-9: chos kyis grol ba'i ro la don gnyer bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-10: sangs rgyas bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-11: 'jig rten sred pa'i skom pa rnam par sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-12: rdzing dang chu klung khron pa lo ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-13: mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-14: 'dod pa rnam smad bsam gtan bsngags pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-15: skom pa rnam sel de ni des sgrub pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-16: 'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-17: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-18: dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-19: rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-20: thugs rje mnga' rnams sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-21: padmo'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-22: rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-23: dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni des sgrub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-24: 'od zer mos par byed pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-25: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-26: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-27: chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos pas dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:333b-28: de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mos dga' ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-1: mos dga' dag 'dun mos dga' bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-2: sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-3: rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-4: sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-5: sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-6: byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-7: des ni 'od zer mos par byed pa grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-8: 'od zer bsod nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-9: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-10: bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-11: sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongs su gtong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-12: de dag mchod sbyin lhug pa byed pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-13: slong mo ba yi bsam pa rdzogs byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-14: bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa byin pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-15: des na 'od zer bsod nams bsags grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-16: 'od zer ye shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-17: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-18: chos gcig sgo nas chos gcig min pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-19: chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis rjes dran nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-20: chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-21: nges rtogs don gyi ye shes rnam phye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-22: chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-23: des ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-24: 'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-25: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-26: stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334a-27: rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-0: bdag po med chos stong pa byed @334b med pa; ;sprin dang smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-1: rmi lam lta bu gzugs brnyan rang bzhin rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-2: bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-3: 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-4: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-5: mi zad gzungs kyi mdzod rnams rab thob cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-7: chos 'chad rnams la yongs su phan btags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-8: drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrungs byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-9: 'gro pa kun la chos bzhin phan btags pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-10: 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul de grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-11: 'od zer gtong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-12: sems can 'jungs pa ji snyed des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-13: skyed pa mi brtan mi rtag shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-14: de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-15: 'jungs pa gdul dka'i sems can ma dul dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-16: nor rnams rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-17: dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa rnam spel bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-18: gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-19: 'od zer yongs su gdung med rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-20: tshul ngan sems can ji snyed des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-21: tshul khrims rnam dag rab tu gnas gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-22: rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems skyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-23: dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-24: tshul khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-25: byang chub sems la yang dag bskul byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:334b-26: yongs su gdung med 'od zer des grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-1: rnam brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-2: mi bzod sems can ji snyed des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-3: khro ba'i tha ba nga rgyal yongs spangs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-4: de dag bzod mos rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-5: sdig sems ldan la nyes pa bzod byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-6: byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-7: bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-8: des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan de grub bo; ;'od zer brtson dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-9: le lo'i sems can ji snyed des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-10: rigs par brtson zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-11: sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa 'byed par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-12: rigs par brtson pas dkon mchog gsum rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-13: sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-14: de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las yongs 'das te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-15: myur du byang chub bla med rab tu thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-16: sems can mang po brtson 'grus bskul byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-17: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-18: tha ma'i dus su dam chos yongs bzung bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-19: des ni brtson ldan 'od zer de grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-20: 'od zer zhi bar byed pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-21: rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyed des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-22: de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-23: nyams su mi gnod mnyam gzhag sems su 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-24: sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyod can dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335a-25: 'du 'dzi yongs su rnam par spangs byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-0: bsam gtan zhi ba'i dgon pa rang @335b bsngags pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-1: des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-2: 'od zer shes rab rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-3: shes rab 'chal ba ji snyed des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-4: bden dang brtan dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-5: dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs par shes gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-6: nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-7: shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-8: rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-9: byang chub don du chos rnams gang btsal ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-10: de dag rim gror rab tu brjod byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-11: shes rab rnam brgyan 'od zer des grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-12: 'od zer sangs rgyas ldan pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-13: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-14: sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab shin tu mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-15: padmo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-16: sangs rgyas bdag nyid che dang rnam thar dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-17: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-18: sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-19: sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-20: 'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-21: 'jigs mnar sems can ji snyed des phog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-22: 'byung po bza' dang bsad cing brdog pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-23: nad kyi 'jigs pa kun las rab tu 'grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-24: mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can bskyabs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-25: srog gcod las las sems rgyud phyir bzlog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:335b-26: 'jigs pas skyabs tshol rnams la bskyabs byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-1: grub bo; ;'od zer thams cad bde ba rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-2: nad pa na ba ji snyed des reg pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-3: thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par 'grol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-4: bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-5: nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-6: rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-7: bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-8: 'bru mar zas skom byin pas de grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-9: 'od zer sangs rgyas ston pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-10: tshe zad mthar ni ji snyed des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-11: sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-12: de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-13: 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-14: dgar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-15: 'chi khar sangs rgyas skyabs su btang byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-16: sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer des thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-17: 'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-18: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-19: chos nyan rjod cing de bzhin 'dri ba byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-20: chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-21: chos kyi mu ge'i dus su chos brjod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-22: chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-23: mos pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-24: brjod pa chos rab rjod pa des thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-25: sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336a-26: 'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-0: khams gsum @336b sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-1: kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-2: gsal ba'i dbyangs sgrar drang srong cher brjod de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-3: rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-4: 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba'i gsung don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-5: yongs su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs ldan thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-6: 'od zer 'chi med sbyin pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-7: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-8: bag med spyod pa thams cad rnam spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-9: yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-10: 'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-11: sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos yongs su gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-12: 'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi dga' zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-13: brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-14: 'od zer khyad par ldan pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-15: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-16: tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-17: shes rab khyad par rgyal ba rnams la nyan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-18: tshul khrims 'phags pa ting 'dzin 'phags pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-19: shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal chen zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-20: byang chub don du bsngags shing bstod byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-21: des ni 'od zer khyad par ldan pa thob;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-22: 'od zer rin chen rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-23: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-24: rin chen gter mang mi zad thob gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-25: drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-26: rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:336b-27: rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-0: rin chen bsdud de rin chen sbyin @337a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-2: rin chen rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-3: 'od zer spos mchog snang ba rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-4: sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-5: mi la med pa'i spos dri tshor gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-6: sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-7: mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-8: mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-9: spos kyis rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-10: byas pas 'od zer spos mchog snang ba grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-11: 'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-12: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-13: rol mo sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-14: pho brang dam pa yongs brgyan me tog 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-15: sngon chad rgyal ba rol mos bsu byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-16: me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-17: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan mchog dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-18: mchod pa byas pas sna tshogs rgyan grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-19: 'od zer shin tu dar byed rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-20: sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-21: mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyangs byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-22: des ni 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-23: 'od zer chen po'i sprin ldan rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-24: spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun nas gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-25: mchod rten gam yo spos chus yongs btab pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-26: 'od zer sprin dang ldan pa rab tu thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337a-27: 'od zer lhab lhub rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-0: gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par @337b 'gyur; ;gos dang bgo ba phreng ba sna tshogs dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-1: yongs su btang bas lhab lhub rnam brgyan grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-2: 'od zer bro mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-3: bkres pa kha zas bro mchog thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-4: zas dang skom dang bro mchog sna tshogs rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-5: byin pas bro mchog ldan pa'i 'od kyang thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-6: 'od zer nor ston rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-7: phongs pa rin chen gter rnams thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-8: gnas dang gter rnams mi zad dkon mchog gsum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-9: gsol pas nor ston 'od zer de thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-10: 'od zer mig sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-11: long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-12: rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-13: mar me gsol bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-14: rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer rab bkye zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-15: rna ba nyams pa sgra mang thos par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-16: rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-17: sil snyan phul bas rna ba rnam spyod thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-18: 'od zer sna sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-19: sngon chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-20: rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-21: spos zhim gsol bas sna sbyong 'od zer grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-22: 'od zer lce sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-23: sgra snyan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bstod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-24: mi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnams spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-25: 'jam par smra bas lce sbyong 'od zer grub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-26: 'od zer lus sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:337b-27: dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-0: rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod @338a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-1: rten la; ;lus kyis rab btud lus sbyong 'od zer thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-2: 'od zer sems sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-3: smyos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-4: ting 'dzin rjes su sems 'gro rab byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-5: des ni sems sbyong 'od zer de grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-6: 'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-7: bsam yas sku mnga' mi yi dbang po mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-8: sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-9: mchod rten rgyan byas gzugs sbyong thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-10: 'od zer sgra sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-11: sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes; ;rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan 'dra 'o zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-12: sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-13: 'od zer dri sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-14: dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur; ;spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-15: khrus byas byang chub shing gi 'od de yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-16: 'od zer bro sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-17: dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur; ;sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-18: bro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-19: 'od zer reg sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-20: reg na mi bde thams cad 'jam bder 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-21: tri shul mdung dang ral gri mda' yi char //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338a-23: gos mang 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-0: rgyal ba gshegs pa'i lam du @338b bting bkram ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-1: me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-2: phreng ba bla re gsol ba'i 'od de yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-3: 'od zer chos sbyong rab tu gyes byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-4: ba spu kun nas 'jig rten phan mdzad pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-5: bsam yas chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-6: mos pa'i lam tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-7: rkyen las byung bas ma skyes rang bzhin yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-8: rgyal ba'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-9: chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin du rtag gnas zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-10: brjod pas chos sbyong 'od zer de thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-11: 'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-12: drang srong rnams kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-13: gangg'a'i bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-14: kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul can no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-15: ji ltar ba spu gcig gi sgo gcig nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-16: 'od zer gangg'a'i bye snyed yongs 'byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-17: de bzhin ma lus spu rnams thams cad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-19: yon tan gang gis 'od zer grub 'gyur ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-20: yon tan de la bstad grogs sus byas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-21: de dag 'od zer de dag nyid kyang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-23: de dag bsod nams bstad grogs byas pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-24: rjes su yi rang smon lam sus btab dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-25: gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-26: de dag kun kyang 'od zer de dag shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-27: gang gis bsod nams byas shing dge bsags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-28: sangs rgyas yang dang yang du mchod byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:338b-29: sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod cing don gnyer ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-1: kun la 'od zer de dag skul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-2: dmus long rnams kyis nyi ma mi mthong yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-3: de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-4: mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-5: kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-6: de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-7: med pa ma yin kun tu 'phro ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-8: de dag mos med log pas mnar ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-9: phal gyis mi mthong blo gros yangs la mos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-10: rgyan dang nor bu gzhon pa gzhal med khang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-11: rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-12: de dag che bar gyur la yod mod kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-13: nyon mongs phongs pa rnams la yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-14: gang gis 'od zer bye brag 'di thos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-15: dad pa yid ches mos pa skyes gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-16: bdag ni yon tan chen po'i rgyal mtshan du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-17: mi 'gyur snyam du nem nur des mi bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-18: de dag 'khor gyi rgyan du rnam 'phrul bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-19: ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-20: phyogs bcu kun tu dpe zla med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-21: rgyal sras 'khor rnams yongs su ston pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-22: de dag padmo mdzes pa stong gsum tsam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-23: 'od kyis rnam brgyan byin gyis brlabs byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-24: lus gcig skyil mo krung gi padmo de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-25: yongs su rgyas ston ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-26: de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed padmo gzhan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339a-27: 'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-0: rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs @339b bskor ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-1: de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-2: drang srong des ni yongs su smin byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-3: rgyal ba'i legs la yongs su gang bsgrubs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-4: de dag padmo chen po'i 'khor byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-5: kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor yang lta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-6: skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de 'dra ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-7: gang rnams ting 'dzin rnams spyod zhugs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-8: kun kyang rang rang slob mas bskor 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-9: zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-10: de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jug byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-11: sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor rnams ston byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-12: de bzhin ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du; ;ston te ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-13: de dag ting 'dzin rab rnams mngon sgrub cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-14: phyogs kyi dra bar snrel zhir spyod pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-15: la la mnyam bzhag la la rnam langs par; ;rang rang lus kyang phyogs rnams kun tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-16: de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-17: dpa' bo de dag nub kyi phyogs nas ldang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-18: nub kyi phyogs su de bzhin mnyam bzhag cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-19: shar gyi phyogs nas bdag nyid che ba ldang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-20: de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu 'jug byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:339b-21: phyogs rnams gzhan du mnyam par bzhag byas shing //
