K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-6: sgyu rtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-7: de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-8: sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse; ;glang po de yang klu yi lus btang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-9: lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'dra bar rdzu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-10: spyod pa'i tshul dang ldongs spyod kun dang mthun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-11: glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul ci 'dra ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-12: de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-13: 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-14: shes rab thabs kyi stobs la byang 'gyur rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-15: ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ci rab 'phrul mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-16: sgra gcan ci dga'i tshul du lus rdzu na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-17: rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa'i mthil bor zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-18: rgya mtsho'i zab ring lte bar phyin tsam byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-19: ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-20: de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-21: 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-22: 'jig rten sgron ma bdun rnams yongs 'dul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-23: rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci rob ston mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-24: bsam yas brgya byin 'phrul yang ltos shig dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-25: lha dang lha dbang 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-26: lha min bye ba 'byed pa ji snyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-27: de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus 'phrul byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:343b-28: lha min dbang po lha min phal kun gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-1: byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-2: de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung gyur ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-3: lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-4: 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis mig stong rab bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-5: rdo rje me lce 'bar bar rab gzas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-6: lus la go bgos gzi brjid thub dka' ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-7: brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-8: de ni bsod nams phal gyi stobs dang mthus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-9: lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-10: 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon gyur ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-11: bsod nams mi bzad rnams ko cir mi 'phrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-12: lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas lnga yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-13: lha yi las rnams rnam par smin pas byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-14: lha rnams bag med spyod par shes gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-15: mkha' las rnga yi dbyangs kyang rab tu sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-16: 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag mi brtan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-17: 'jig cing mi gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-18: sgyu ma smig rgyu chu yi zla ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-19: srid pa kun kyang rmi lam sprin gyi dngos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-20: bag med thams cad gcugs can mya ngan ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-21: chems kyi lam yin 'chi med lam ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-22: ji snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-23: bdud kyi chu srin chen pos zos pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-24: yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad sdug bsngal rtsa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-25: skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyis smad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-26: 'dod pa'i yon tan mthar zad rang bzhin gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344a-27: chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-0: brgya byin lhar bcas @344b rnga yis bskul byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-1: kun kyang chos bzang mdun sar dong phyung te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-2: lha mang kun la chos gtam zhi ba'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-3: 'dod chags bral dang rjes su mthun pa brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-4: rnga rab de ni gzugs med mi mthong yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-5: don chen rnga yi sgra ni sgrog byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-6: bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-7: 'gro ba kun gyi don chen cir mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-8: lha dang lha min 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-9: lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-10: lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga yi mchog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-11: lha rnams 'jigs sa re zhes sgra yang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-12: rngas bskul lha rnams yongs su dga' ba skyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-13: 'jigs med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-14: lha min dbang po 'jigs shing dngang gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-15: de ma thag tu 'jigs shing kun tu 'byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-16: de bzhin rnga 'dra 'jigs med stobs pa'i rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-17: 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang dpung 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-18: bdud dang nyon mongs bcom pa'i snying rje can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-19: zhi ba'i sgra sgrogs nyon mongs rab tu sel //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-20: dbang ba'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-21: dbang po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-22: gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin brtse bar shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-23: gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-24: lha mo kun kyang dga' bar gnas snang yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-25: chos bzang mdun sa kun na'ang de bzhin 'dug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-26: lha rnams kun la chos rab ston par yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:344b-27: brgya byin skad cig gcig gis rnam par 'phrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-0: brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug @345a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-1: can; ;sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-2: 'gro don mi skyo spyod pa ci yi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-3: rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten dgar mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-4: bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-5: de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-6: las dang nyon mongs kun tu 'khri zhags kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-7: so so'i skye bo bdud 'khrug des kyang bcings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-8: de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-9: 'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-10: dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ci rab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-11: 'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi gzhog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-12: stong gsum bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-13: stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i gnas rnams na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-14: ma lus kun tu 'dug par rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-15: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong rnams kyang sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-16: de ni 'jig rten pa yi lam gyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-17: bsam gtan mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-18: 'jig rten yongs 'das bla na med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-19: bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-20: dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-21: rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char rnams rab bkye ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-22: skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'grang ba byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-23: thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma lus des shes na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-24: bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab tshul bslab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-25: sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345a-26: ci rob 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-0: skad cig gcig la sems @345b bsam shes mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-1: sems can las smin bsam gyis mi khyab pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-2: rlung las 'jig rten thams cad yongs su byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-3: rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-4: sa bon rnam mang kun kyang de las byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-5: rlung las sprin 'byung char pa kun tu 'bab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-6: sprin mang zhi bar 'gyur ba'ang rlung gis 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-7: lo rtog rnam par 'phel ba'ang rlung gis te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-8: 'jig rten kun la rlung ni bde ba skyed; ;de ni pha rol phyin la ma bslab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-9: sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bslab min na'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-10: 'jig rten rnam grub bsam yas ston byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-11: rang nyams thob pa ci ro ba ston mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-12: rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi chu tshogs ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-13: bya skad rnams dang ji snyed ri dvags skad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-14: khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-15: thams cad skad bzhin 'gro la rnam par sgrog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-16: de bzhin sgra snyan rang bzhin sgra shes nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-17: sgrib pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-18: 'gro ba kun tu sgra snyan brjod byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-19: 'jig rten thams cad yid 'ong sgras tshim byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-20: rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-21: 'gro ba thams cad rgya dang mnyam snang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-22: chu dang 'byung po rin chen yongs mi zad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-23: chu rnams bzung bas yongs su ngoms pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-24: de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgyar stsal te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-25: bsod nams bsam gtan rnam thar zad mi shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-26: shes rab ye shes yon tan de bzhin kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:345b-27: bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyis ngoms pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-2: sa yi gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-3: gling bzhi bcas par sprin chen rgyas par 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-4: de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs ldan; ;de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam bu chu klung gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-5: gser gyi mdog tu sprin mang rnam par sgrub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-6: 'phrul dga' mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-7: dga' ldan gnas su kha ba ba mo'i mdog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-8: mtsher mar mthon mthing bee d'urya yi mdog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-9: sum cu gsum du aasma garbha 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-10: rgyal chen gnas su shel gyi mdog lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-11: rdo rje mi phyed sra mdog rgya mtshor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-12: mi ci gnas su spos mchog 'dres par te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-13: klu yi gnas su padmo'i mdog lta bu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-14: gnod sbyin gnas su ngang pa chu skyar mdog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-15: ri yi mdog tu lha min gnas su 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-16: byang du gser gyi kha dog 'od ston te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-17: gling rnams gzhan du'ang sna tshogs rgyan du ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-18: 'dzam bu'i gling du ri gnag 'dra bar te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-19: sprin rnams gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-20: dbang sgyur gnas su gser gyi sprin bstan nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-21: nyi ma'i mdog 'dra klog kyang rab tu 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-22: dbang sgyur gnas su zla 'od bzang 'dra dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-23: dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-24: kha ba ba mo'i mdog tu mtshe mar te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-25: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su gser mdog tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-26: rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346a-27: mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtshor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-0: @346b mi ci gnas su mthon mthing bee d'urya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-1: klu yi gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-2: gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-3: aasma'i mdog tu lha min gnas su 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-4: byang du ngang gis snang ba'i rin chen mdog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-5: gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam phye gzhan dang gzhan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-7: sprin gyi mtshan nyid tshul 'thun glog kyang 'gyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-8: de ni tshangs pa'i dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs dbyangs su //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-9: 'brug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dga' rnga yi dbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-10: rol mo'i sgrar yang dga' ldan gnas su ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-11: lha mo'i dbyangs su mtshe ma dag tu 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-12: sum cu gsum du mi'am ci'i skad du ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-13: rgyal chen gnas su dri za'i skad du 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-14: ri 'thab dbyangs su rgya mtsho kun tu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-15: mi'am ci yi gnas su gling bu'i sgra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-16: klu yi gnas su thal mo brdabs pa'i sgra; ;gnod sbyin gnas su klu yi bu mo'i sgra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-17: lha min gnas su lha rdzas rnga yi sgra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-18: rgya mtsho'i shugs sgrar mi yi gnas su 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-19: dbang sgyur gnas su lha rdzas gsung zhim pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-20: me tog sna tshogs rgyan mang char yang 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-21: zla ba bzang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul dgar te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-22: me tog mand'a ra ba'i phred [*phreng?] char 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-23: dga' ldan gnas su rin chen chen po'i char //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-24: rgyan gyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-25: gtsug gi rin chen zla ba 'dra ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-26: gser 'od zer bzang po'i char pa rab tu 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:346b-27: rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ba dan bzang po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-2: mu tig dmar po la ltar btags mdog tu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-3: rol mo yid 'ong char pa mtshe mar 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-4: sum cu gsum du rin chen sna tshogs te; ;tsandan dam pa'i spos dang aa ga ru //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-5: gur gum ge sar lha rdzas ta ma la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-6: spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog 'dres par 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-7: nyams su 'gyur ba'i kha zas skom gyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-8: kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-9: de min rin chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-10: rgyal chen bzhi yi gnas su klu dbang 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-11: de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun du yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-12: char rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa gnya' shing tsam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-13: mi zad rin chen shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-14: rin chen char ni mtha' yas rgyun du 'babs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-15: mi ci gnas su phreng ba sna tshogs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-16: padmo autpal dngos dang rin chen dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-17: me tog par shi ma li phye ma spos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-18: pi wang rnga dang gling bu snyan par ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-19: klu yi gnas su mu tig dmar po ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-20: gnod sbyin gnas su rin chen dvangs snang ba; ;lha min gnas su ral gri mde'u thung mdung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-21: dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char 'bebs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-22: byang du de ni phreng ba rin chen dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-23: me tog par shi ma li tsam pa ka'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-24: phreng ba bzang po ku ran mukta ka /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-25: gling rnams gzhan du'ang char pa sna tshogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-26: 'dzam bu'i gling du chu 'dang rab gsal gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347a-27: char rnams sna tshogs shin tu phra bar 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-0: @347b me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-1: lo las de bzhin 'jig rten bde 'phel byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-2: de ltar sprin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-3: glog dang 'brug dang char pa rnam phyed kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-4: khyim nas mi g-yo rnam par rtog pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-5: klu yi 'phrul yang de ltar bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-6: de ltar chu yi rgya mtshor gnas pa yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-7: klu yi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-8: chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan bdag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-9: mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang po cir mi ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-10: dper bya de dag kun gyis mgo smos tsam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-11: skyes bu de dag brjod byas yangs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-12: dpa' bo de dag dpe dang rnam par bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-13: de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang bsgyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-14: mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i blo gros can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-15: ma nor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-16: ye shes mchog dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-17: rnam thar dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-18: gang gis rnam thar 'di dag thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-19: yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-20: ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos dang de ldan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-21: mi yul kun na de ni dka' ba byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-22: 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-23: so so skye bo'i tshogs na'ang shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-24: dge bsags bsod nams byas pa de dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-25: rgyu yi stobs kyis 'di la yid ches 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-26: gang rnams nyan thos theg la'ang yid ches pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:347b-27: mi rnams 'jig rten kun na dkon pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-0: de bas rang rgyal theg pa dad @348a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-2: theg chen dad byed de bas shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-3: theg chen 'di la zhugs pa dkon pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-4: 'di 'dra'i chos la dad pa shin tu dkon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-5: 'dzin cing spel byed smos kyang ci dgos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-6: yang dag ma nor 'jug pa smos ci dgos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-7: la la stong gsum ri dang rgya mtshor bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-8: bskal par 'dzin cing mgo la khyer byed na'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-9: 'di 'dra'i chos la dad par byed pa las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-10: de 'dra dka' bar brtsi ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-11: la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-12: bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur na'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-13: 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-14: bsod nams ci 'dra thob pa de la min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-15: la la zhing bcu ri dang mtshor bcas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-16: lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings 'dzin kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-17: 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-18: dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-19: la la zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-20: bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-21: 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dad byed pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-22: bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-23: la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-24: bskal par bde ba kun gyis bsnyen bkur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-25: la las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-26: bsod nams 'di ni de las khyad par 'phags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348a-27: rnam thar de dag yongs su bstan pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-0: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams @348b thams cad g-yos par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-1: lha dang bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis mnan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-2: 'od mang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-3: phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi sengge rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-4: thams cad kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-5: phyag brkyang mtha' yas yon tan mang bdog pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-6: bzang po'i dpal gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-7: phyag gi mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-8: sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis gsung brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-9: rnam thar 'di dag khyod kyis legs bshad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-10: legs par bstan la rjes su nged dgyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-11: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-12: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-13: bzang po'i dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-16: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-17: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-20: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-22: lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-23: nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-25: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa re re na yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag de bzhin du bzhugs par snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:348b-26: byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-1: pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par yang so so nas shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ma btul bar byang chub kyi shing drung nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal ba ga la ba der gshegs par snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-3: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mar gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par snang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-4: byin gyi rlabs snga ma dag kyang ma nyams par snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-5: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa logs su mngon par gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin sengge'i gdan phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-6: bog re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-7: gser gyi dra ba stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-8: gnam yol stong phrag bcus bla rer bres pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-9: gdugs stong phrag bcu shin tu bzung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-10: dar gyi lda ldi stong phrag bcu rab tu dbyangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-11: mu tig gi se mo do stong phrag bcus dga' dga' ltar byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-12: gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349a-13: lha'i bu stong phrag bcus mdun du byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349b-0: tshangs pa stong phrag bcus @349b kun nas bskor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349b-1: 'od zer stong phrag bcus shin tu snang bar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bshams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349b-2: ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnam par rgyal bar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bshams pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo dag tu yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan dag tshul de 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349b-3: rgyan de 'dra bar bshams par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349b-4: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan sengge'i khri bcas nas rje sa dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam zhes gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis spyan drangs nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:349b-11: de ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag tu'ang gshegs par snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-0: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang pa @350a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-3: sil snyan brgya phrag mang po dag btang ste zhi bar byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-4: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-5: thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srung rigs skyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-6: rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-7: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-8: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-9: gser thub bsgribs pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-10: rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-11: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-12: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-13: bsod skyabs gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-14: rtse mo mchog tu gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-15: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-16: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-17: thams cad mnga' ba dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-18: mdzod spu'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-19: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-20: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-21: sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zil gyis mi non pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-22: rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-23: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-24: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350a-25: rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-0: rin chen rgyan @350b du gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-1: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-2: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-3: shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing bstan pa de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-4: ma la ya yi rtse mor gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-5: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-6: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-7: sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-8: dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-9: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-10: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-11: grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po padmo'i bla //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-12: dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-13: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-14: bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-15: mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-16: 'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-17: des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:350b-18: ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa glur blangs te tshigs su bcad pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag glur len cing tshigs su bcad par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs @351a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-1: so; ;bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de dag la bzhugs par snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-2: bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa de yang sum cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-3: lha'i ris tsam du che bar snang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-4: 'di na ji lta ba ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-5: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-6: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las; de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-8: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-9: byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs pa sha stag ste; byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-10: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351a-11: 'di ltar chos kyi blo gros dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-5: dam pa'i blo gros dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-7: 'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-9: rin po che'i me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-13: yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-16: nam mkha'i me tog dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-17: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-18: 'di ltar zla ba gzhan ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-19: zla ba ma mnyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-20: zla ba mi g-yo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-21: zla ba mi sgul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-23: zla ba thogs pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-25: zla ba rdul med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-26: zla ba rnams par grub pa dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-27: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:351b-28: sengge'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-0: ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub @352a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-1: sems dpa' rnams lhags pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-2: lha'i dbang po'i khang pa kun na yang de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-3: byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad ces bya ba sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad ces bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa yang mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod par sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mtho bong gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag stong pa kye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-7: phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-9: ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-11: snang ba dri ma med la ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-12: ri rab rtse mo thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-13: mgon po dag ni rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-14: rnam par rgyal ba kun na bzhugs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-15: lha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-16: spyan drangs shing ni gshegs par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352a-17: kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-0: rab tu @352b gshegs pas mngon par bstod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-1: kun gyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-2: byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-3: phyogs bcu dag nas 'ongs gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-5: kun gyi ming yang 'di nyid de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-6: ji ltar nged la btags pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-7: 'jig rten khams kyi ming dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-8: de skad dag nas kun kyang 'ongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-9: 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-10: drang srong chen po'i mtshan kyang de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-11: de na tshangs spyod bla med la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-12: the tshom med par de dag spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-13: kye ma rgyal sras khyed ltos shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-14: drang srong chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-15: 'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams cad na; ;rgyal ba 'di na bzhugs snyam byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-16: bdag cag rnams ni 'di snyam du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-17: ri rab rtse la bde gshegs snyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-18: 'jig rten khams rnams kun na yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-19: sangs rgyas ngo mtshar rmad re che; ;'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-20: byang chub mchog tu sems btang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-21: de dag smon lam 'di btab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-22: byang chub spyod pa rab tu spyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-23: kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-24: gang zag mchog ni spyod byed kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-25: chos kyi dbyings la mi chags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-26: de dag sus kyang mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-27: gang gis 'jig rten mun bsal cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-28: thams cad dus su rnam snang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-29: de la 'dra ba gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-30: de ni shes par ji ltar rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:352b-31: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-2: bskal pa mang po 'das gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-3: 'jig rten mgon skyob de dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-4: chos nyid de ni shes pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-5: mtshan ma dag la spyod pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-6: gti mug dra ba 'phel bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-7: sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-8: 'khor ba'i btson rar ldongs pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-9: chos rnams 'di dag brtags byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-10: rang bzhin shes par mi rung ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-11: skye dang shi 'phor gyur pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-12: ming tsam du ni bstan pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-13: chos rnams gang yang 'pho ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-14: gang yang de bzhin skye ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-15: chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-16: sangs rgyas kun na rab tu snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-17: gzung du med cing bltar med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-18: chos kyi rnams ni rang bzhin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-19: dngos med pa yi mtha' shes na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-20: sangs rgyas rnams la tshang kyang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-21: tshad med pa yi chos rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-22: rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-23: des ni ci zhig yod ces par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-24: mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-25: gang rnams mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-26: de dag byis pa'i chos nyid de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-27: de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-29: dus gsum byung ba'i thub pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-30: mtshan rab kun dang ldan pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-31: mi gnas tshul du bzhugs pa yin; ;chos kyi dbyings la g-yo ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-32: la la dag gi chos nyid shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-33: la la dag ni chos kyang brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-34: gang la the tshom mi mnga' ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353a-35: yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-0: @353b sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos nyid 'di //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-1: chos kyi blo gros 'dis brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-2: de thos nas kyang bdag gis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-3: sangs rgyas byang chub bsam yas shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-5: kye ma sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-6: ye shes shes rab shin tu che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-7: de la 'jig rten shin tu rmongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-8: sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-9: tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-10: byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-11: de phyir 'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-12: sangs rgyas rnams ni mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-13: shes rab chung ba thams cad ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-14: phung po'i 'du shes rnams la gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-15: phung po rnam par ma bsgoms pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-17: dngos med dngos su bshad pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-18: bdag gi dngos zhes bya ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-19: chos rnams thams cad shes bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-20: rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-21: sngon chad phung po'i tshul bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-22: ma 'ongs rnams kyang sus mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-23: ma 'ongs pa yi tshul shes pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-24: sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-25: ji ltar snang ba med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-26: mun pa'i nang na gzugs mi snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-27: de bzhin chos rnams bshad pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-28: mkhas kyang shes par mi rung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-29: ji ltar dri ma ldan mig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:353b-30: gsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-2: sangs rgyas chos ni mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-3: ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-4: rab rib can gyis mi mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-5: de bzhin phug na gnas sems kyis; ;sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-6: de bas mig ni rnam par sbyongs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-7: gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par sgoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-8: chos rnams mthong ba med pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-9: 'od mdzad rab tu mthong ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-10: ji ltar sngon blos kun bshad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-11: bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-12: sangs rgyas byang chub mi rnyings pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-13: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyis mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-15: gnas med pa yi chos rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-16: gnas ni yongs su brtags pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-17: de phyir srid pa'i brtson ra na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-18: byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-19: brjod pas brjod du mi rung chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-20: zlo zhan rnams kyis rnam par brtags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-21: des ni yongs su bsgribs byas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-22: bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-23: shes rab chung la lam nor cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-24: bdag gi sems la mi mkhas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-25: phyin ci log gi blo dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-26: mi bzad lus ni 'phel bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-27: gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-28: de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang nga //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-29: chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354a-30: mig kyang de la yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-0: de bas mig @354b ni sbyang bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-1: bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-2: gang phyir bdag cag sngon chad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-3: bde gshegs ma mthong chud kyang zos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-4: yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba na'ang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-5: gang gi sems la chags med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-6: des ni sangs rgyas cis byung ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-7: chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-8: gang gis shes rab che mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-9: chos su bde gshegs mthong ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-10: de dag 'jig rten mig can te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-11: gang gis mthong ba mthong zhes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-12: lhag mthong med par mthong ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-13: chos rnams ngan par mthong ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-14: lhag mthong gis ni mthong gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-15: thams cad mthong ba med pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-16: kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-17: yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-18: de ni rang bzhin thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-19: shi ba med cing 'tsho ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-20: sangs rgyas byang chub ji 'dra ba; ;dpal gyi blos ni sngon bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-21: de las bdag gis thos nas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-22: sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-23: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-24: rnam par rtog pa spyod pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-25: mig ni shin tu 'khrul pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-26: 'khrul par mthong ba log pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-27: sangs rgyas la ni log mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-28: gang gis log par shes gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-29: yang dag ji bzhin ma nor la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-30: yang dag ma yin bden shes na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:354b-31: sangs rgyas dri med mthong ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-2: rnam par mthong na de med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-3: sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong dang bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-4: de bas rnam par gzigs zhes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-5: de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-6: 'jig rten de yang rnam par brtags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-8: snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-9: 'jig rten rnams kyi snang pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-10: 'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-11: yang dag ji bzhin bsam byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-12: de ltar mthong na mthong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-13: de ltar mthong na nyon mongs med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-14: dbang du gyur cing zag pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-15: gang gis tha dad med mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-16: dngos por brtags pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-17: rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-18: sangs rgyas chos rnams brjod pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-19: de dag yod pa ma yin pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-20: rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-21: de dag rang bzhin rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-22: nam mkha' bzhin du mtshan nyid med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-23: de dag la ni ston pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-24: mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar ltos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-25: chos rnams la ni mos med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-26: chos kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-27: shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-28: des ni thub chen mthong ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-29: ji ltar yon tan blos brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-30: de ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-31: de mthong bas na 'du byed kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355a-32: rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad @355b pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-1: kye ma sangs rgyas dpa' chen rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-3: rnam grol thugs ni sdig mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-5: yang dag ji bzhin ma nor bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-6: bskal pa rnams ni tshad med pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-7: ji ltar mkhas pas mthong ba bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-8: 'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-9: 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-10: so so'i skye bo de dag 'gengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-11: nam mkha'i khams ni bzung byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-12: de dag de phyir khom pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-13: khom pa med ces bya ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-14: ci yang brjod du med pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-15: khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-16: khom pa bsam gyis mi khyab thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-17: gang la dngos po med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-18: mi zad khom pa med par bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-19: yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-20: des ni grags chen mthong ba yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-21: mthong ba med pa mthong zhes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-22: yod pa med pa'ang yod ces bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-23: mthong ba dag gam yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-24: ma bsgoms pa ni rnam par bsgoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-25: ji ltar blta ba sus mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-26: de dag gis ni lta ba bshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-27: gang la sangs rgyas smos pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-28: de dag chos rnams zhig pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-29: ji ltar thub pas bstan pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-30: sangs rgyas yongs su sus mthong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-31: de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-32: rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-33: chos rnams kyi ni snang ba gcig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-34: de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-35: des ni brtson blo brtan pa de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:355b-36: chos mang bye ba rab tu ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-1: byas te; ;gang gi 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-2: des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-3: yang dag mtha' la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-4: de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-5: rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di thos pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-6: snang ba bdag cag shes par gyur; ;phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-7: yang dag sangs rgyas des kyang mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-8: sems can rang bzhin yod gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-9: de ni sems can g-yang sa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-10: 'di la ci yang yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-11: tshig gi lam rnams bsdus pa 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-12: byis pa 'dzin dang bcas pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-13: bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-14: sangs rgyas snang bar mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa gzung ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-16: yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-17: gang rnams mig yod ma yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-18: de skad bskal pa grangs med du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-19: srid pa'i gang chen mtsho na 'khor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-20: nyon mongs can ni 'khor bar bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-21: nyon mongs med pa mya ngan 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-23: rang bzhin rnyed par mi rung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-24: 'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-25: mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-26: 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-27: bla ma dag ni mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356a-30: de dag sangs rgyas mi mthong ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-0: tshul bzhin ma yin @356b phyin ci log /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-1: zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-2: gang gis zhi ba shes gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-3: des ni tshig gi lam 'das pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-4: yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-5: chos rnams kun gyi spyod pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-6: rab tu brjod kyang bstan pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-7: 'on kyang mnyam pa nyid du blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-8: rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-9: yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dbus med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-10: thog ma dag dang tha mar yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-11: 'gal med rtsa ba med pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-12: de ni sangs rgyas de phyir brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-14: sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-15: bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-16: sems can dmyal bar gnas kyang bla //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-17: de ni bde ba bsam mi khyab; ;ci phyir zhe na bskal pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-18: grangs med sdug bsngal sngon chad byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-19: 'on kyang bde gshegs ma thos pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-20: bdag cag 'khor las ma grol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-21: de bzhin ma nor chos kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-22: yang dag nyid du rtogs gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-23: gang la 'grogs pa med pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-24: de dag byang chub bla na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-25: sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon sum pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-26: sngon chad ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur; ;gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-27: de dag mtshan nyid med pa 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-28: chos rnams blta dka' ji bzhin du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:356b-29: gang zhig de ltar rtog pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-0: de dag sangs rgyas kun gzigs @357a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-1: pa; ;yang dag lta bas shin tu mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-2: yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-3: yang dag min par yang dag min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-4: 'di yi mtha' ni ston pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-5: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes kyang bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-6: khor du ma chud chos bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-7: sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-8: 'di ni sangs rgyas sgom pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-9: gcig tu dmigs pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-10: de ltar mang dang gcig gnas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-11: mang po dag tu rnam par shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-12: gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-13: bsags pa dag kyang rab tu byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-14: byas pa med cing byed pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-15: las kyi 'du shes rnam bsgoms shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-16: las 'di ji bzhin shes byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-17: rnam pa dag kyang mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-18: gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-19: nges pa'i gnas ni dmigs med pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-20: gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-21: sangs rgyas g-yo ba gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-23: sems can chen po bla na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-24: sems can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-25: 'jug par bya ba gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-26: de bas bla na med ces bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-27: gang la phra ba yod min pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-28: de la sbom pa'ang yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-29: de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357a-30: rnam par mi rtog 'dus ma byas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-0: gang zhig sangs @357b rgyas spyod yul ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-1: de la phra ba yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-2: yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-3: de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-4: mun pa rnams ni rnam gsal cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-6: de la snang ba gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-7: mi snang ba yang ci yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-8: thams cad chos la kun nas dga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-9: skyes pa med cing gnas pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-10: 'dod chags med cing rten pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-11: chos nyid de yang sbed pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-12: gang la gnyis su bgrang med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-13: gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-14: ji bzhin rab tu gnas pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-15: shes rab chen po legs par mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-16: mi gnyis pa la gnyis pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-17: gnyis pa med pa stong pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-18: stong pa de yang khams gsum kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-19: de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-20: byis pas byang chub mi shes kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-21: de dag de la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-22: gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-23: rang gi lus ni rjes su blta //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-24: lus med pa ni lus su bshad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-25: 'byung ba med cing bstan du med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-26: 'jig tshogs mang po bltar med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-27: sangs rgyas sku ni bla na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-28: sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-29: de skad bden pa'i blos smras te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-30: de thos pas ni mig kyang sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-31: shin tu 'od kyang dang zhing snang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-32: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:357b-33: drin gzo med pa'i sems can phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-2: dpa' chen sems can gtso bo dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-3: 'od mdzad pa ni rab tu byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-4: thugs rje chen po bskyed mdzad de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-5: sems can khams la rnam gzigs kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-6: srid pa'i bcings pas sdug bsngal ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-7: sems can rnams ni de nas gzigs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-8: 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-9: yang dag sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-10: sems can gtso bo ma gtogs par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-11: skyob pa gzhan ni gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-12: gal te sangs rgyas ma skyes la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-14: med na 'jig rten khams kun na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-15: sems can bde ba gcig mi 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-16: sems can gtso bo 'dren mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-20: gang gis de bzhin gshegs mthor ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-21: de dag 'thob pa legs par thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-22: gang gis thos shing dad 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-23: de yang 'jig rten mchod rten no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-24: gang gis sangs rgyas mthong gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-25: bdag cag rnams kyis thob legs thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-27: kun kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-29: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-30: shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-32: rnam par snang mdzad thub mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358a-33: da dung phyir zhing dad pa skye //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-0: de yi ye @358b shes mtha' yas pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-1: da dung brjod du yod pa min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-2: gang zhig mchog gi blos smras dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-3: rgyal sras gzhan gyis bshad pa rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-4: de dag da dung bdag gis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-5: bskal pa bsam yas bshad par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-6: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-7: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-8: ri rab kyi rtse mor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-11: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:358b-12: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-4: brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-15: de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-16: 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-17: mchog gi chos dang ji snyed dam pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-18: 'phrul gyi chos dang bla na med pa'i chos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-19: de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-20: 'di ni skyon med rnams kyi gdams ngag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-21: gzhan gyis mi thub ji snyed gnas yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-22: 'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis mi non rnams //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan kun ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373a-26: 'jig rten mgon po'i bdag nyid che ba kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-0: de la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhag @373b ste; ;'di ni skyes bu khyu mchog gdams ngag go /
