K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-2: ji ltar 'grogs par 'gyur ba thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-3: byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-4: 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-5: ting 'dzin zhi ba ji snyed gang yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-6: de dag gdams ngag ji snyed ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-7: byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya; ;'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-8: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-9: chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-10: 'jig rten kun gyi chags par mi 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-12: sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba ji snyed dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-13: ji snyed ngan song gtses par gyur pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-14: skyabs dang mgon dang rten du 'gyur bar yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-15: byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-16: rnam pa 'di 'dras rgyal sras dang po de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-17: byang chub don du sems rab skyer 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-18: de ltar gdams ngag rjes su bstan par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-19: 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam bkod pa 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-20: de nas gnyis pa las kyi dang po pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-21: thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-22: sems bcu nye bar gzhog cing smon byed pa; ;'di ni skyon dang bral ba'i gdams ngag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-23: phan pa'i sems dang de bzhin bde ba'i sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:373b-24: snying rje'i sems dang de bzhin byams pa'i sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-1: dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-2: slob dpon sems dang de bzhin ston pa'i sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-3: de 'dra'i sems rnams nye bar gzhag pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-4: kha ton lung la yongs su bskul bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-5: mang du thos pa dgon par gnas par bskul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-6: dben par gyur pas dge bshes bsnyen bkur bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-7: dge bshes gyur nas ngang bder 'gyur bar bya; ;ngang tshul bde bas dus tshul shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-8: dus rnams shes nas mi 'jigs 'gyur bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-9: mi 'jigs gyur nas don la brtson par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-10: don shes gyur nas chos rjes shes par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-11: chos shes gyur nas rmongs pa med par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-12: rmongs med gyur nas legs par bshad chos la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-13: rgyal sras des ni rnam par gnas par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-14: de tsam gyis ni las kyi dang po pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-15: byang chub don zhugs byang chub sems dpa' 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-16: gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa'ang de yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-17: sangs rgyas sras po de ltar slob par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-18: gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gsum brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-19: chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung la shin tu brtson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-20: mi rtag sdug bsngal de bzhin stong pa nyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-21: bdag med de bzhin byed pa med pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-22: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin ro med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-23: 'du byed ma yin de bzhin gnas med dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374a-24: ched du spyod med de bzhin rtog med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-0: kun la byang chub sems @374b dpa' dpyod pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-1: de ni 'gro khams yongs su brtag pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-2: de bzhin chos dbyings brtag par bskul bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-3: 'jig rten khams yongs ma lus mthar thug pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-4: brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-5: sa dang me dang de bzhin chu khams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-6: de bzhin rlung dang phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-7: 'dod pa gzugs dang de bzhin gzugs med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-8: brtag par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-9: khams rnams yangs pa de bzhin kun rtog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-10: khams kyi rang bzhin ma lus mthar phyin pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu brtson byed pa; ;des na der 'gyur gdams ngag de yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-12: cher skyes pa yi byang chub sems dpa' ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-13: 'phags pa'i gsung rab 'di las skyes pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-14: dngos po rang bzhin med rtogs dran pa can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-15: chos kyi rjes byung rigs ldan legs par skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-16: de yi gnas las phyir ldog mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-17: sangs rgyas rnams la shin tu mos pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-18: chos rnams de bzhin nges par rtogs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-19: sems can rang bzhin med par rnam par bsgoms //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-20: chos dang 'jig rten de bzhin zhing rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-21: rnam smin 'khor ba de bzhin mya ngan 'das //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-22: rnam bsgoms rgyal sras de ltar cher skyes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-23: thugs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas sras zhes bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:374b-24: 'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-0: sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par bsgoms pa'i @375a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-1: phyir; ;yongs su bsdu ba ci 'dra mthar thug pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-2: de ltar de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-4: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes song bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-5: mnyam pa nyid la sna tshogs mi dmigs shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-6: dus gsum kun la tha dad med par 'jug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-7: de tsam gyis ni rgyal sras bzhi pa ste; ;de yi bsngags pa rnam pa de 'dra 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-8: de ltar 'di la nan tan bsgrubs byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-9: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog tu 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-10: de las gzhan yang rgyal sras lnga pa ni; ;sbyor ba phun sum tshogs zhes brjod pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-11: thabs mkhas tshul la rjes su zhugs gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-12: bsod nams las rnams brtsams pa'i mthar phyin byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-13: 'jig rten dag na bsod nams gang byed kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-14: sems can kun gyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-15: phan tshol de bzhin bde ba skyed pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-16: snying brtse skye rgu 'grol bar 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-17: 'jig rten rnams kyi gtse ba bsal ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-18: dran zhing de bzhin dang bar bya ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-19: sems can mang po thams cad gdul mos shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-20: mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyi mthu yang che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-21: sems can thams cad kun tu mtha' yas dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-22: de bzhin tshad med grangs las 'das pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375a-23: bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal med dpag med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-0: de 'dra'i chos rnams de la @375b brjod par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-1: de tsam gyis na rgyal sras lnga pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-2: sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa snying rje can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-3: de yi gdams ngag tshul ni de 'dra ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-4: yon tan thams cad mnga' bas bstan pa yin; ;gang yang bsam pa phun sum tshogs bya'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-5: chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rmongs med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-6: rnam rtog rtog bral dran dang ldan pa de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-7: lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyis bslu mi nus; ;sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-8: spyod pas bsngags sam rnam par smad kyang rung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-9: sems can nyung zhe'am 'on tam mang ngo zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-10: thos par gyur kyang bsam pa zhum mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-11: sems can nyon mongs nyon mongs med ce'am //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-12: gdul sla 'on tam shin tu gdul dka' dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-13: chos kyi dbyings de chung ngam rgya che dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-15: chos dbyings de ni yod dam med ce yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-16: byang chub sems dpa' thos gyur dus gsum tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-17: nges par rtogs byed thams cad rnam rtog cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-18: sangs rgyas chos la bsam pa shin tu nges //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-19: mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-20: dngos nyid yod min rdzun dang bden pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-21: sgyu ma rmi lam mi rtog rang bzhin med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-22: 'di 'dra'i chos tshol de dag nyan pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-23: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:375b-24: sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-2: 'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'das she'am ma 'das dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-4: ma byon to zhe'am ma byon ma yin dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-5: skyes so ma skyes zad 'gyur zad mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-6: de bzhin mtshan gcig tha dad mtshan de bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-7: gcig pa rnam pa tha dad mang po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-8: don dang de bzhin yi ge'i dngos rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-9: thams cad phan tshun yongs su 'dzud byad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-10: mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' bstan par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-11: mtshan ma med la mtshan ma yod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-12: mtshan nyid med la mtshan gyis dmigs pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-13: rnam phye phan tshun yongs su sbyar ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-14: thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug pa byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-15: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhon gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-16: lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kun gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-17: kha na ma thor 'gyur pa nam yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-18: ci 'dod tshul bzhin de ni skye bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-19: gzhan gyi bsam pa ji bzhin rab tu shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-20: de dag mos pa yongs su rtogs par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-21: phyogs rnams gang du yid kyis smon byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-22: kun tu mngon shes myur ba yid bzhin 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-23: bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa'i chos thos shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-24: de la zhum pa skyed pa gang yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-25: zhing rnams yongs su bskyod pa shes pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376a-26: de bzhin byin rlabs rnam par rgyu ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-0: sangs rgyas zhing rnams yongs su @376b mnan pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-1: grangs med kun tu 'gro ba brjod par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-2: grangs med chos rnams yongs su 'dri ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-3: ci nas yid kyi rang bzhin lus 'gyur zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-4: dbyangs kyi rnam pa shin tu yangs 'gyur dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-5: sems gcig sangs rgyas grangs med bsnyen bkur brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brjod pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-7: sems can rnams kyi skye ba rab tu shes; ;nyon mongs rgyud dang rnam par rgyu ba shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-8: de 'dra'i spyod yul de 'dra'i sbyor ba can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-9: chos kyi rgyud mang rnam pa tha dad dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-10: sngon mtha' phyi mtha' 'jig rten rnam phye dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-11: brda yi bden pa don dam bden pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-12: ma lus rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-13: de yi rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas par bskul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-14: der yang ji ltar yongs su spyad bya dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-15: 'gro bar bya dang gnas par bya ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-16: rgyal po'i gnas su ji ltar rnam spyad brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-17: de la chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-18: byin gyis brlabs dang de bzhin mthu chen dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-19: chos su gnas dang 'gro bar bya ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-20: brjod par bya ste rgyal tshab de 'dra yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-21: de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-22: gdams ngag des kyang rlom sems byed pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-23: khong du chud byed dran ldan rgyal tshab de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-24: rgyal ba kun gyi drung na slob par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:376b-25: bde gshegs sras po gtso bor dbang bskur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-0: thu bo mchog dang dam par @377a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-2: 'jig rten khams mang grangs med bskyod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-3: yongs su snang bar bya ba'i sems kyang mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-4: byin gyis brlabs dang yongs su 'da' bya dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-5: yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems kyang rab tu mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-6: grangs med 'jig rten shes par bya ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-7: dbang po phun ldan rnam par dpyad la mkhas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-8: de dag gzud cing rnam par gdul ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-9: thams cad mkhyen gyi sems kyang shin tu mang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-10: zhing mang brjod du med par 'gro byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-11: dam chos khams rnams ma lus rnam par dpyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-12: de yi lus dang lus kyi las rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-13: rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'ang shes par mi nus te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-14: dus gsum shin tu rgyal ba'i sems dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-15: rgyal tshab gyur pa'i bar gyis shes mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-16: de la thams cad gzigs pas dus gsum dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-17: sangs rgyas chos shes chags med de bzhin brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-18: chos dbyings mtha' yas mtha' dang dbus med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-19: rgyas par 'gengs par bde gshegs brjod pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-20: ci nas 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-21: yongs su snang byed byin gyis rlob pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-22: sems can chos rnams de bzhin ma lus dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-23: sangs rgyas mtha' yas de bzhin brjod pa'i mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377a-24: rgyal sras brtan pa rnam pa bcur bgrangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-0: rnam par dgod la gnas pa de @377b dag kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-1: rang rang spyod yul rab tu brtson byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-2: 'jig rten lhar bcas kun gyis shes par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-3: 'on kyang dang por sems bskyed mtha' yas pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-4: phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad rgyas par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-5: dus gsum kun tu gang tshe sems gtong ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-6: de tshe thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-7: zhing rnams kun la mu mtha' yod ba min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-8: sems can chos dang 'jig rten kun de bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-9: las dang nyon mongs gnas kyang mtha' yas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-10: byang chub sems rab de la gnas pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-11: skad cig sems la byang chub gzhol ba'i sems //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-12: gang skyes 'jig rten kun gyis shes mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-13: rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos kun gyis min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-14: de nas gong du spyod pa ji skad brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-15: gang zhig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-16: spu gcig srang la tshad du 'jal byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-17: des ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-18: 'on kyang sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su tshol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-19: phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-20: spu rtse'i thigs kyis yongs 'jal shes byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-21: de ni rgyal sras spyod pa 'di 'dra dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-22: sems kyi skad cig gcig la sgrub par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-23: ji ltar zhing rnams rdul rab phrar glags shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-24: sems can la la ma lus bgrang byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-25: 'di snyed yod ces grangs su gcod byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:377b-26: de 'drar rgyal sras spyod pa brjod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin ma byon dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-2: gang rnams phyogs bcur byung bar gyur pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-3: rang rgyal de bzhin nyan thos rab mang bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-4: rnam par dmigs shing byang chub sems skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-5: sems can khams rnams ma lus rgyas bkang zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-6: byang chub don du thog mar sems bskyed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-7: de yang bgrang bar nus pa ma yin na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-8: de las gong du ci zhig smos kyang dgos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-9: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-10: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-041-001:378a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu bstan pa'i le'u ste; nyi shu pa'o ////
